} } } Length:: 0:26 MinsThis is a great little camera for its price. I was a little hesitant on purchasing this after reading all of the negative reviews. However, I am really glad I decided to buy the camera. The quality of pictures and videos are pretty good and I was surprised to see how well they looked. Battery life is good. I took about 300 pictures and a few minutes of video in 1.5 sets of batteries. Only negatives about this camera is that there is no view finder and pictures come out blurry if you don't hold the camera perfectly still.edit: the quality of the video looks much better than the one uploaded on Amazon

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good for the price
Reviews.Author: StuartM
Reviews.Content: Having had a number of disappointing results from disposable film cameras, I was not expecting this 'basic' digital camera to be much better ... however using it in Maui to photograph turtles and other spectacular marine life, I was delighted with the clarity.  The white balance was adjusted with iPhoto but the photos were great!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Gino_Reggie
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with picture and video quality; used this for snorkeling in salt water and around a pool.  No issues to date.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera poor software
Reviews.Author: jd
Reviews.Content: i purchased this camera for my father for Christmas. He wanted a good digital camera that he could easily upload photos to the internet. the camera arrived quickly. It is super easy to use and comes with batteries. the problem came when attempting to load and use the software. the easyshare software claimed to be a one button upload to the location of your choice (email, facebook other social media)After attempting to load the software which should load automatically when plugging the camera into the computer, the software failed to load. after numerous attempts, i finally went to the kodak website and had to load the software from there. after doing that, the photos can be uploaded to the easyshare software and then later to the net site of your choice but they are not uploaded by pushing the "one touch" on the camera. It appears that button does nothing. i do not know if that is a camera issue or software issue but at any rate it does not work. As for the camera alone, it takes great pictures, does video, and is water proof and drop resistent. would have given 5 stars based on the camera and price if the software and the one touch function worked.

Reviews.Title: Great vacation investment!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera before going on a cruise where I would be kayaking, snorkeling, etc. It worked perfectly! It held up great and took impressive underwater photos. It doesn't take the best pictures when in dark lighting, but they were of better quality than those taken with my Nikon. Overall, this was a great purchase for a vacation, especially given the price!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jason White
Reviews.Content: We have 2 of these and have taken them on 2 vacations.. Spent a day at a water park, being banged around and such, and still works great with no leakage..I believe if you use some common sense, they wont leak.. I do have to say I don't like thet if you set it for underwater, and then turn off the power, it goes back to regular setting.. maybe it was user error, but i shot a bunch of bad pics while snorkeling.. IE, set it to underwater, took pics.. turned off.. 20 min later turned on and took more pics, and it defaulted to Normal, instead of underwater.. if you are careful of this, i would say these work great.

Reviews.Title: This camera EATS batteries!!
Reviews.Author: Michael LeFevre
Reviews.Content: We took only 82 pictures and had to put in 4 sets of AA batteries.  During this time, the camera was off between uses.  The underwater pictures were all right.  It was great to have to use to take pictures of people snorkeling.  A couple of times though, water must have gotten into the lense because I had six or seven pictures that look like they are foggy.

Reviews.Title: So easy a 7 year old can use it
Reviews.Author: Joe'sMom
Reviews.Content: My 7 year old wanted his own digital camera. I did a Lot of homework, searching for just the right one. It had to be easy to use, with not too many buttons. It had to be durable enough that if he drops it, it won't shatter. And, I didn't want to deal with extra parts - camera lens covers, swiveling screens, etc that could break easily. This camera fits all of that and more.I spent maybe 10 minutes showing my son how to turn on the camera, switch from stills to video, and how to access the pictures in the camera's memory, scroll through and delete. That's it - then he was off taking a million pictures, videos, etc. We uploaded them to the computer at the end of the day, and he was thrilled to see a slide show of all his work.My son wasn't interested in any of the fancy camera modes like sunset, sports mode, etc but it's great that the camera has these. These are nice features he can grow into later. I love that the camera is waterproof, and we can't wait to take it to the pool and the beach.This camera was not designed for kids though so I will add that from an adult perspective, if I didn't already have a camera, I would be perfectly happy using this myself. At 12 MP, it takes great pictures. It is easy to use, has all the nice features I look for in a camera, stills and video, zoom works nicely, and even comes in fun colors (ours is blue). It is easy to download pictures, and has a great feature that allows you to take a picture for "sharing" - which means quick upload to facebook, twitter, email, or several other sources. You take the picture and then tag it with the click of a button; then later when you connect your camera to your computer, it autotmatically pushes the pictures to the sources you've tagged. This allows us to skip having to review all our pictures at the end of the day/party to find our favorites, and lets us quickly share the pictures we know came out great.I do wish that you could hear the audio when playing back a video. This threw us a bit when we first recorded a video and tried to play it back on the camera, it played with no sound. We thought we'd done something wrong, and couldn't find mention of it in the instructions. Later when we uploaded the video though, the sound came through loud and clear on the pc. Otherwise though, GREAT camera. I plan to borrow this camera from my son next summer when ever we go to the beach. Can't wait to take those underwater pics!

Reviews.Title: Great above & below the water
Reviews.Author: Speaky2k
Reviews.Content: I got the red camera to use on a trip to St. Croix were I knew I would be snorkeling.  I had another camera along for the trip that I had been using for several years, but I used this one for everything.  There are several limitations to this camera that you need to be aware of, but once you understand them, this camera will work well for everyday and wet conditions.  The main limitation on this camera is the fixed focus.  This means you can't use an optical zoom or a macro setting.  This also means that underwater you have to get fairly close to your subject matter, 5-10 ft.  Also for underwater photography the brighter the day, the clearer the water, the better the photos.  I was able to take photos of fish, coral, turtles, and even an Eagle Ray while snorkeling.  I was happy with all the photos I took and some of my friends who were with me and saw the photos were equally impressed for the quality compared to the price of this camera.  Another thing to be aware of is that the sound is recorded when using video even in underwater mode, so if you are snorkeling all you may hear is your breathing.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Buyer/Planner "Smart Consumer"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, wish it had come with a larger disc. It took only 7 or 8 pics before it was full. I have since ordered a 8gb disc to give the optimum performance for pics and video clips. Quality of pics is great!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a under water camera for our cruise...I had been looking for one that was a cheep camera but that would deliver results.  I read the reviews of this Kodak, and thought it was a risk, but I am a gambler and bought it.  I am so glad I did... as of now, I have not had one issue with it.  it worked great in the water, and also around the ship when I didnt want to carry the bigger camera! totally recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice and easy point and shoot
Reviews.Author: MadMatter77
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best little cameras ever. It's. Very rugged, and since the lens doesn't extend beyond the body you never have to worry about that breaking. The only negitive thing I could say about the camera is that batteries don't last to long in it. But it's so good otherwise it is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Nice priced Waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: john w hoagland
Reviews.Content: If you want a waterproof camera, but don't want to waste money or plan to use it a ton, you should look at this one. There are times it is hard to tell if it is on or off, with he sun on the screen. It does shut of to conserve battery. It does boot fast though.Used paddle boarding, and for mud runs. Light, small, cheap. Uses standard AA batteries, and SD cards.The Battery case does get some grit in the hinge and may be difficult to open at times, but keeps the water out. Still totally worth the price.

Reviews.Title: great camera-great price
Reviews.Author: Dianna "Dianna"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  Purchased this camera because my more expensive cameras kept getting ruined and was sick of spending the money.  This camera so far is working great.  As soon as I purchased this camera I took it out to the pool.  We filmed video and and took pictures both above and below the water.  It worked out great.  You cannot hear the sound on the camera.  You will need to put the video on the computer to hear the sound which is fine because technically I didn't buy a video camera.  Took this on a trip to Disney World and turned out having great pictures and wasn't afraid to take it out and on all rides including water rides.  No worries of it getting wet or broken.  The reason I didn't give 5 stars was because of two things.  The first was a lot (not all) of my night pictures we not very clear.  They looked a little grainy.  Some were taken by a campfire so perhaps the heat/flame did something to the way they were taken (the pics were taken across the fire).  The others were taken in low light (although I had on flash) so I'm not sure why they were grainy.  The other reason was because it takes about 5 seconds to be able to take another picture.  Didn't think that would be a problem (as I had read that it took awhile) but when in actual use with kids 5 seconds is a pretty long time LOL!  Still I would buy this camera again and have recommended it to friends.  For the price it is definitely right for an active family who love the sun and fun and water.  All of my daytime pictures come out great and night is hit or miss. I have some pictures from this camera in frames and they look just as clear as professional ones I have next to them.

Reviews.Title: For wet weather
Reviews.Author: Ray N. Selvey
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kodak EasyShare C123 not for underwater but for rainy weather.  Unfortunately since receiving the camera, the only time we had a good rain, I was stuck inside.  One time we only got 17 drop of rain.  I have used the camera inside and am very pleased with it.  I just have to get used to using the LED screen instead of a viewfinder, which I am used to.

Reviews.Title: What a camera for the price! It is great!
Reviews.Author: lphen1
Reviews.Content: Recently my family and I went to Punta Cana. We took my mother for eightieth birthday. I did not want to bring my expensive camera on a beach vacation. I found this product using a search on Amazon. The camera preformed wonderfully out and in the water. For fewer than 100 dollars it is a great travel camera and gift. Considering it is not a SLR, the camera seemed at the ready. Its auto white balance setting ensures a great exposure whether inside or out.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: MamaBear
Reviews.Content: We recently took this camera on our cruise and it's great. We just wanted a cheap underwater digital camera since we were going snorkeling. Compared to the other underwater digital cams in the market, this one was priced the best and comparing the reviews, almost all brands have a chance of not working so I figured if this camera failed it wouldn't be such a big loss. I did notice that it's hard to see the LCD screen underwater as other reviewers have mentioned. You have to keep a steady hand when taking a picture. When we were in Cozumel, the water was murky (Mother Nature wasn't cooperating) so it was hard to see and the pictures were not so crisp. Luckily we were blessed with great weather in Honduras, the sun was bright and shiny so the pics are sharp and clear. I was able to take a 11 minute video while snorkeling but I have to say again, you have to have a steady hand. I'm not a great swimmer and I had a hard time holding the camera so the video was not so good. We love this camera and will be using it again for our trip to Hawaii.

Reviews.Title: Great for Teenager
Reviews.Author: Kirbymama
Reviews.Content: Gave this camera to my 18 year old niece. She is using it for all her Senior Year fun, and loves it!  Water proof, so she can take it to the pool and beach.

Reviews.Title: service was great!
Reviews.Author: artibell
Reviews.Content: I was impressed it arrived in 3 days! WOW thank you Art IKodak EasyShare Sport C123 12 MP Waterproof Digital Camera (Blue Bundle with Orange Float Strap)

Reviews.Title: GREAT bargain price and NOT dissapointment
Reviews.Author: nyaxxi
Reviews.Content: The camera works really well. with the cost of $59, the result of the pictures and the video recording are fantastic. No flaw on the quality, except that i battery runs out pretty quick, but maybe because i have use it to shot and capture underwater with flash (incl. recording underwater) quite often during snorkeling. other than that, i would strongly recommend this to anyone who are looking for a low budget underwater (3 meter deep) camera. this camera more than just satisfying enough.

Reviews.Title: Really Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Customer #387-243-7279 LOL
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera (the red model) in August for my vacation and it took awesome pics. Underwater, Night time (using flash and close), daytime--all were great pics. I took great pics of a sunrise which I found out later messes up a digital camera. Still it took great pics. Videos came out great (HD). Videos during bright days were not too good but this was after I took many pics of a Surise (don't do that btw). Last night (11-11-11) I was at a hockey game and dropped it from the highest row in the nose bleed seats and it hit the concrete hard. It was about a 75 foot free fall. The case was cracked but the camera still works. Since the case cracked I bought a new one today and I have one for spare parts if needed. This is great camera!

Reviews.Title: We LOVED this camera
Reviews.Author: Carole J Ransom
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera because of the price and thinking that if we take a few hundred photos and only some come out, then it woudl be worth the cost...however...this camera was PERFECT for what we wanted it for which was snorkeling in Hawaii.  We had no problems with it and it took great pictures...clear and we were very happy with the quality of the photos.  We actually read the instructions which emphasized making sure the battery door was closed and that is what we did.  Everything was protected and remained dry.  We used it for many water activities and while everyone else was struggling to get their expensive cameras in the waterproof packages, we just hopped in the ocean or the pool and started snapping photos.Good little camera for being by the pool, snorkeling or at the beach.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C123 Sport Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Hanavan
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Kodak C123 for an upcoming trip to Ireland.  I wanted something waterproof, because I know the location is famous for constant rain.  I wasn't too concerned with the camera's underwater shooting capabilities, so I haven't tried to submerge it.  I just want something that can be used outside in wet weather without worries.After reading some others' reviews, I was a bit concerned with how the picture quality would be.  I tested the camera out here at home and took a few pictures around the neighborhood.  I found the pictures to come out quite clear for the most part.  I did notice though that it is difficult to get a good shot in low light.  I didn't expected much though for the price.  I only paid $65 for the camera, and I feel that is a fair amount for what it offers.Aside from the minor issue of the difficulty of taking evening photos, the only real complaint I've had is that the camera did not come with instructions.  Normally this wouldn't be much of an issue, because operation is pretty straight forward (point and shoot).  The confusion I had though was in how to load the batteries.  It took me nearly a half hour to figure out how to unlatch the battery casing, only to find a second locked area inside that also had to be opened.  Thankfully I figured out the secret.  On the outside latch, there is a tiny black button that must be slid.  This unlocks the latch so that it may be slid in the direction of the printed arrow on the casing.  Inside there is a second orange casing.  It must be moved backward slightly to unlock.  It would have been nice to know this from the start, because not only do the batteries go inside this area, but that's also where the USB chord plugs in to upload photos. I thought this was odd.  On every other camera I've used, the connector is on the side or bottom of the camera.A few other people noted that the paint/coloring of the camera began to chip off immediately after use.  Thankfully I have not experience that, and I am certainly not a delicate user.  I have the blue camera.  I'm not sure if other colors are more prone to this issue.Another concern some people mentioned is the lag time between shooting one picture and the next. I have noticed a slight wait.  I think this would only be an issue if one was taking action shots. For general use, taking photos of people and landscapes, I don't think it is that noticable.

Reviews.Title: Kodak genius!
Reviews.Author: Gcam
Reviews.Content: The kodak sport works perfect underwater just don't forget to put it on te h20 option!!! I ordered the camera on Monday to revive it by Wednesday because I was leaving to the Bahamas and thankfully it arrived on time! It took beautiful pictures for a small sport camera and it even has a flash and movie mode. Totally enjoyed it. And I hope you all will too. Only problem is no zoom but this is really just a great sport cam so for 70 bucks you can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Very Basic, but serves a purpose perfectly for me
Reviews.Author: Senior Frog "Hungry Man"
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I want. A camera cheap enough I don't have to be careful with and doesn't mind getting wet occasionally. I am however "a little" disappointed in the image quality. I have a Canon T2i DSLR to cover that issue so it's not a big deal.PROS:Cheap. Great camera if you want a camera you don't care if it gets broken. I figure it's better to put this camera in compromising situations and risk it getting broken then to not take pictures at all.Uses two AA batteries. A big plus when you're off the grid.Very Easy to use.Waterproof. I haven't tested this and don't intend to take underwater pictures. I just want a camera I can canoe/kayak with and not have to store away while paddling.CONS:This camera is not for photographers, it's for picture takers. Forget closeups. Minimum focus distance is not spec'd and the best I can tell it's around 6 feet.Ran some tests on the image quality. I compared 12 megapixel shots with 6 megapixel shots and can see no difference on a high resolution laptop screen.Zooming is all digital so unless it's difficult to crop later, don't bother zooming. Not zooming in the camera will give you complete freedom to crop and zoom later.UPDATE 7/3/2013: This camera took videos and photos underwater very well. So it's waterproof and can be used underwater with good results.

Reviews.Title: Great low buck water proof camera
Reviews.Author: party doll
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for our snorkeling trips. We just came back from Hawaii and used it on 4 different swims taking around 150 pictures and changing batteries each time just to make sure (we use rechargeable AA) The camera is very easy to use, the zoom was OK (4x I think), took great pics when there was good lighting and having the float was reasuring. Didn't really try the flash underwater. Tested the float first time in the water and it works good. The camera never leaked.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: nasa1974
Reviews.Content: I have to say I am impressed with this camera.  I read reviews both good and bad for this camera and it is too bad that some people had bad experiences.  I bought this camera for a Western Caribbean cruise because I was going to go snuba and snorkeling.  The camera worked very well. As a matter of fact I took the camera to a depth of 20 feet and had no problems. Hopefully it maintains its reliability over the next couple of years.  I can't wait to take this camera on another cruise. I would recommend this camera to friends and relatives. An underwater, 12MP camera for under $100.00 is a deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with a few low specs, but after I received and prove it... I'm very please with the resolution of the photos and videos... for be such a low price camera, it's a great purchase...  Specialty if you are trying to take pictures of your friends, family, children's on the beach or on your pool. I totally recommended. FYI. Just try to close in the right way the battery cover, because if you don't your camera will be on big problems, not for childrens under 10 years old.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: beach girl
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for a trip to cancun and used it the whole time, no problems. Pictures turned out good, much better than those disposables. Really good for the price...

Reviews.Title: IN THE POOL IT FOGGED UP
Reviews.Author: Refika Sibiroglu
Reviews.Content: When I first saw this camera,i thought it would be great for taking underwater photos.I went to a swimming pool today however ,in the first fifteen minutes,it fogged up and did not work properly.I am very dissapointed,I'd expect more from kodak..And it was hard to see the screen (so you cannot see what you are photographing)..Waste of money,do not buy it especially if you want to take under water photos..

Reviews.Title: Waterproof Camera is great!
Reviews.Author: aj_18 "Aj_18"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after going through 2 digital cameras a year. (Small children are destructive in my house). I wanted a waterproof camera and this has definitely met up with those standards. It takes wonderful quality photos in and out of water. I took it on vacation to the beach and was very happy with how it worked. One down side is the video function does not produce sound from the camera when you play back the video but it does record sound so when the video is uploaded to the computer there is sound.

Reviews.Title: Dustproof, too!
Reviews.Author: Heidi Miller
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheap (but good) camera to take to Burning Man. My expensive Sony NEX-3 has to be wrapped in plastic and secured inside two Ziplock bags in order to go. This camera was the whip in, whip out one. I will say the daytime shots turned out much better than I'd anticipated! Good resolution, decent flash when backlit. It even handled sun flares on the desert fairly well.The downside is that the nighttime photos aren't so great, which is what I'd anticipated. Since you can't adjust the exposure to take photos of fires and LEDs at night, everything was pretty dark and blurry. Still, I noticed that if I got close enough to the art car, the ambient light would provide enough lighting for a halfway decent photo.All in all, I'd say this is a reasonably indestructible camera for daytime Burning Man and a backup for nighttime shots.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This little camera is a lot of fun. I wanted something I could keep in my diaper bag instead of my big digital SLR camera. This is perfect.PROS:Watertight: I haven't had any trouble with water getting into the inside of the camera.SmallStarts up fastTakes the first picture fastVideo feature is funCONS:There's a little lag while the picture writes to the card. (this is better than shutter lag to me!)The zoom feature is worthless. This is not a problem for me because I just treat it like a prime lens on a DSLRSome distortion of facial features if you get too close but this is because of the wideness of the lens. Again, something I can deal with.I would definitely recommend this little camera.

Reviews.Title: Lots of fun for adorable price
Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip to Florida Keys. Have read lots of reviews, some were bad, some were good. I was a little anxious about how waterproof the camera is and it was doing its job surprisingly well. I was thinking about a waterproof case for my canon 40d and now I'm happy I bought a small waterproof camera instead. It was fun.I didn't like the brightness of its screen, all my shots were like blind shots - I didn't see anything under the bright sun, that's why its just four. Probably it would be better if I had a mask but I didn't. Anyway, I expected much less quality than I get.I did like that there was no drops on the lens after I get it out from the water.No zoom but it didn't bother me.Flash - very helpful.Serial shots (without flash) - I used that as well.It takes pictures almost at the time I press the button, it doesn't spend time on focusing.I would definitely recommend this camera, I think it is really good for saving the memories of underwater fun.

Reviews.Title: Great Water Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jason Weimer
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a trip to Cozumel for snorkeling!  SO glad we did!  Got a TON of great photos using it underwater and above!  Wrapped the cord around my wrist and snorkeled with is for a couple of hours...no problem.  Worth the price vs. buying disposable water cameras!  Now I keep and use this when I take the kids to the beach or pool instead of our big expensive camera.  Keep it in my purse too to always have a camera with me!  Have had fun taking photos of kids underwater...some have turned out so awesome!  Lots of fun!

Reviews.Title: Better than Expected
Reviews.Author: NP1723
Reviews.Content: I should start this review by saying that although I am not a professional photographer, I do know my fair share about cameras- but shoot pictures just for fun. My everyday camera is a Canon Rebel T2i- but on my upcoming trip to Maui, an underwater case for this model is over $1,000. I did a LOT of research on this camera- and couldn't be more pleased with it. The color in the stock photo does not do the actual color justice- its a vibrant, beautiful color blue, and I was glad I bought this option. I also got the floating wrist strap bundle; I saw the exact Kodak wrist strap at Walmart for $13, so needless to say the bundle is a money saver!!I tested the camera in the pool yesterday, and I was very apprehensive at first. Putting a camera underwater goes against everything I know about them! But I was pleasantly surprised in the quality of the pictures, as well as the video.I found that in the pool, the general mode does not autocorrect the blue color in the photos like the underwater feature does. It seemed to make the pictures more clear, but that's just my opinion. All in all, for the money this is a GREAT BUY, and I can't wait to have it in the water with me in Maui next week!!!!On a side note for accessories: this camera's internal memory can only hold 7 PICTURES- so be warned, you will definitely need a memory card of some kind!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera but follow the directions
Reviews.Author: wham
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my 8 yo. The quality for the price was great. However, we did not realize there was a special setting to make the camera water proof so we got water in the camera. It did dry out and then everything was fine.

Reviews.Title: A kayaking must!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We took this camera on a camping/kayaking trip.  It was splashed by waterfalls, dropped in the lake, swam with, used around the campsite daytime and night.  The pictures are worthy of sharing, and the easy share features make that process even more simple.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I wanted and needed
Reviews.Author: REC
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Puerto Rico.  It was perfect for what I wanted.  I wanted a camera that I could take to the beach and on a caving excursion and not worry about the camera.  We took it to the beach and the underwater photos were a lot of fun.  It took a real beating during the caving excursion and once we wiped the mud off it ;) the photos were great.However, the zoom isn't very good; even given the price of the camara I'm a little disappointed in it.  Also, we drove through the mountains and the photos I took of the vistas are really fuzzy but for the price of the camara it still met my expectations.  I also think the easy share is a bit of a pain.All in all, I'm super happy with the camara and would recommend it to anyone with similar plans.

Reviews.Title: Easy and Impressive
Reviews.Author: TheBBunch06
Reviews.Content: This little camera is easy to use and impressive for the price.  We were going on a cruise with several water related excursions planned when I decided to purchase a water resistant camera rather than taking along my expensive DSLR.  It worked well for all the little snapshot moments that you want to capture, but I was most impressed with it when we went cave tubing and snorkeling.  The flash was bright enough in the absolute darkness of the cave that I was able to capture several photos of the amazing cave wall formations.  When it was time for snorkeling I set the camera to its H2O setting (which you must do each time you turn it on as it reverts to auto each time) and snapped away capturing pictures of the sea life and my family.  My favorite part of this little gem is the H2O video setting.  I was able to video my oldest child while he snorkeled, scan the reef and return to video the fish swimming around him.  I didn't have high expectations for the picture and video quality, but when I got home and uploaded it all I was amazed to discover that many of the picture competed with the quality of some of our more expensive cameras and the audio quality was good too.  I could hear the waves breaking and bubbles from the snorkel on the video when we replayed it later.

Reviews.Title: It lasted
Reviews.Author: Gary of BBBBQ
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for one thing only, to take on the Warrior Dash.  The camera didn't disappoint.  While I didn't go deep in water, I hauled it through 2 ft deep mud, over obstacles, washed it in a cold mountain stream and it took the beating.  At one point I had to chip the mud off the buttons to turn it on.  The camera has a slow recycle time, but you can get around that by pressing the telephoto button.  I didn't give it a 5 because I tried emailing Customer Service on what I thought was a problem with the camera and never heard anything back.  Their phone service is only available during the day time Monday-Friday.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera that could....
Reviews.Author: Loui "Simple things"
Reviews.Content: This camera works really well. I was on the fence after reading reviews but once I took the plunge and ordered it, I am glad I did. The camera does what it says it does, takes picture both around water and under water. We have not had any issues with water getting into the camera. I lost my camera for about 10 minutes and found it at the bottom of the pool. It still worked. I have kept the camera in my pocket at the pool and the camera keeps on working.The pictures the camera takes are surprisingly good. The camera has a features that allows you to set it for taking pictures under water. This features makes a difference.  We have even printed some of the pictures and they look great.  Of course the quality is not comparable to that of a high end camera, but they are not bad at all. I would recommend this camera to anyone wishing to use it for family use and capturing memories.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: SparkleGirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to the Bahamas. I wasn't expecting much from it, I just wanted something to be able to take to the beach and to take snorkeling. It worked wonderfully. The photos came out pretty good. Some were a little dark, but it was easily corrected on the computer. I had it under water for a good amount of time at a pretty good depth and it did not leak at all. It also does not have to be used just in the water. I was able to use it just like any other camera on dry land. Finally, it's a basic point and shoot so it's pretty easy to use and figure out.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price I guess, but...
Reviews.Author: Sean Knudsen
Reviews.Content: After just having used this camera to go snorkeling and seeing the results, I can say that this is a fair camera for the price. It stays watertight as advertized, I actually like that it uses AA batteries instead of a rechargeable since it's fast and easy to swap them out while on vacation, it takes nice clear regular pictures as well, with very good color quality, face detection seems to work great, etc.. The underwater features work great as well, and we got some very nice underwater video of the fish and coral, etc... Having said all that, however, the camera has some serious flaws. First, it apparently has no optical zoom whatsoever, it's all digital, which means it has no zoom at all, because the digital zoom is horrible. I would recommend not using it at all. Second, when shooting underwater, if you do use the zoom while you're recording video, the zooming mechanism is very loud and very noticeable when you play back the video on your computer. Sounds like something is hitting the camera twice every time you zoom in or out. Very very annoying... Not even sure why it happens since there is no optical zoom, but trust me it's there. The position of the mic is also poorly designed, as it's near the bottom corner and more than once I've found my finger covering it up while holding the camera underwater, and so when you play back the footage, it's like there's no sound. The built-in speaker is also very weak for video playback, if you're outside, good luck hearing it.So basically, it's good for the price point, especially since it's 12MP and it shoots underwater, but the lack of any zoom and the poor design of other components only merits 3 stars from me.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Stuart Case
Reviews.Content: First, the zoom on this camera is entirely digital, not optical as described by Amazon. The lens does not telescope, but is fixed, probably for waterproofing purposes.  So zoom is achieved by blowing up a smaller and smaller portion of the central image, resulting is a less and less sharp picture.  It also lacks image stabilization.  Also, the picture quality is mediocre for a 12 Megapixel camera.  My old Sony 6 Megapixel camera takes clearer pictures, has an optical zoom, and a viewfinder (which unfortunately has disappeared from point and shoot cameras).  If being waterproof and weatherproof are important features for you, this camera is worth considering; the price is right.  If picture sharpness and serious enlargement are important, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: This is a great little camera !
Reviews.Author: Caroleee
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. The quality of the pictures are great, its easy to use. It's light weight. It takes great video too! the only problem with the video is that you can't hear the sound until you upload it onto your computer. All in all it's a brilliant little camera, and a great price for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Ting
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to the water park at San Antonio Seaworld over the past weekend. I am happy that I made this choice. I used it in the pool and underwater(not very deep). Camera function so well. No water intrusion or what. The quality of the picture is quite good considering the price! My 6 year old knocked and dropped it on ground accidentally causing the paint of the camera chipped but the camera is still working fine. I am impressed.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: Animal Lover
Reviews.Content: My 13yr. old son always wanted to borrow my camera when he went fishing to take pics of all the fish he caught but I would never let him because I was afraid he would accidentally drop it in the water.  I gave him this camera for his birthday yesterday and he instantly went outside to our pond to try it out! It took the BEST pictures of our fish!  Then he went swimming and took more pictures.  This was a great buy - now my niece wants one for Christmas!  Perfect gift.

Reviews.Title: Camera was big hit at the beach!!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia K. Williams "IronGirl"
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing the camera I read all of the reviews. For the price I decided that even if it only worked for the week of my family vacation it was cheaper then buying the disposable ones. WOW, it was better quality then I could have imagined. My kids had such fun with it out in the ocean. There was no water leaks in the camera. I followed the suggestions that I read from other reviews on allowing the camera to completely dry before opening camera to get the sim card out to review pictures. I also kept camera out of the sun when not used. I'm purchasing camera for all of my kid's for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Best Little Thing For This Price
Reviews.Author: J. Nunez "Def  guns"

I was astonished with the results. After being accustomed to handle my Canon Rebel, I was a little skeptical about this one. However, once I got in the pool, I was more than pleased with the results: bright pictures, excellent video. A+. Not precisely an indoors camera, It developes fairly. As compare to the price, this is a piece of art, definitely my beach, pool, and outdoor activities first choice camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for use in and under water!!!
Reviews.Author: brutus0626
Reviews.Content: This camera does a great job taking pictures in and under water!  We used it to take over 300 pictures recently.  The pictures are very clear and we would recommend this camera to anyone hoping to get water shots.  So happy with this purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: Underwater Camera
Reviews.Author: Vic_Man_69
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo6LCLVMTQJOY', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo6LCLVMTQJOYloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; Reviews.Title: good little waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Alfie
Reviews.Content: Started to Test out the camera the minute I got it - so far it has passed the waterproof part of it - picture quality not bad at all & I'm using it strictly underwater. Price not bad considering what I'm getting.

Reviews.Title: Just fine for a $60 camera
Reviews.Author: flipinschmitty
Reviews.Content: I'm a part time photographer and I beat the heck out of my cameras so I figured I'd finally get one that would take the beating. The quality of the photos are fine when the lighting is great, but expect some noise when you're inside unless, of course, you use the flash. It defiantly is 12mp, but with a tiny lens and light sensor this small, it's not the best. Other than not doing well inside, it's just fine for what I wanted, a camera to beat up and take all the shots I couldn't with a typical camera (scared whenever a little drop of water gets on my 7D). Waterproofing is fine, just don't hand dry it. Wait until it air drys so that no water remains in the cracks. If you don't then you risk opening it and having the water seep in. I also dropped it from 1, 2, 3 and 4 feet onto stiff carpet to test how shock proof it is. At 3 and 4 feet it turned off, but I was able to turn it right back on again without any issues.I doubt I'll be using this for most of my pictures, but I'll be sure to have it on hand whenever the situation calls for more extreme pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the money.
Reviews.Author: SportEnthusiast
Reviews.Content: This camera works well and takes decent quality pictures underwater. The flash isn't great so you have to be close to the subject(s) of your picture. Also, the cycle time between being able to take pictures is VERY slow (I'm guessing they didn't put the best procesor in the camera).All that being said, this camera did exactly what we wanted it to do and what we purchased it for, so I am happy with the purchase. Plus you can't find a different underwater camera anywhere close to the price of this one.The camera was used during a snorkeling trip in Hawaii, and was submerged the entire time. I would venture to say that we had this below 10ft. at times but not for any lengthy duration (maybe down to about 15 feet for a few seconds at a time). The camera still works as before.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected!
Reviews.Author: KellieD
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and while waiting for it to be shipped found some really bad reviews on it.  I was really bummed thinking I was going to get a crappy camera, but I have been pleased so far!! I have taken it to the beach and to the lake several times.  I have held it under water and taken pics and it seems to be very water tight! It takes pretty good quality pictures! Overall I am pleasantly surprised and very impressed with this little camera :)  The only thing I will say bad is that the pictures look like pretty bad quality on the camera screen, but once you load them on your computer, they look great! I guess the screen just kind of sucks.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: J. Brzozowski
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera so I would have one for our water fun. It does a great job in the underwater shots and underwater video. We did experience some fogging after the camera had been sitting out on the table for a while and then used in the water. It was over 100 degrees that day, and the water was cold. After the camera cooled off (a few minutes later), the fogging resolved. I have only used it for one weekend, but it's holding up well so far. The batteries were about 2/3 used after one weekend of pretty heavy use. I will say that the camera is not great for low light situations, even with the flash. I don't mind it, though, because I only plan to use the camera for outdoor use. The delay between shots is probably a few seconds, which can be annoying. However, I feel like you get what you pay for. This camera is inexpensive, and you can't expect miracles!

Reviews.Title: satisfied mamma
Reviews.Author: T. Breymeyer "satisfied momma"
Reviews.Content: I bought this rather than the throw away water cams available at various retailers, those have failed me numerous times.  I wanted this for having by the pool and not have to worry if my camera would be ruined.  I tested this, submerged it in water before ever heading to the pool.  It is wonderful.  It actually takes better pics than my regular camera due to the mega pixels are more on this new one, than my current everyday camera.  I haven't taken this deep in the water ... not what I bought it for.  It has completely satisfied me.  Good luck, I hope you have as good of experience as I did!

Reviews.Title: Works well and a great price
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This is a great waterproof camera, especially for the price.  We just bought it to take on our boat and to take fishing- it's way better than we expected for a $70 camera.  Picture quality is excellent.  There are two drawbacks relative to a higher priced camera- 1) no zoom 2) LCD screen is kind of grainy.Overall, I highly recommend this camera as a simple point and shoot for up-close shots in and around the water.

Reviews.Title: A fun little camera
Reviews.Author: R. Coker
Reviews.Content: Such fun! I recently bought this camera thinking it would add a new dimension to some vacation photos. We haven't left for the beach yet, and it's already a huge hit. We took it to a couple of pool parties and had a great time taking photos of the kids underwater, people splashing around, a big water gun fight, etc. While it'll never match my DSLR or even my nicer point-n-shoot for dry photography, it can go places those other two cameras would never dare. I look forward to handing it over to my 7-year-old so she can capture a day at the beach through her own eyes.

Reviews.Title: Works good in the pool
Reviews.Author: Christy Rawls
Reviews.Content: I've tried the camera twice in the pool and have been impressed at it's underwater photo ability.  The resolution isn't the highest, and I don't plan on using it as my 'everyday' camera for that reason, but it's lots of fun for pool time with my kiddo.  For a 4x6 picture, the photos turn out clear, and I have taken a number of underwater pictures that turned out much better than I had anticipated.  For a relatively cheap camera it takes pictures as I would expect, but with the added bonus of being waterproof (and also sand/dirt proof which I have found great for camping. I tried the video underwater a few times but it turned out poorly with lots of static and vertical lines.  However, since that wasn't the reason I purchased the camera, it's not really a big deal for me.Overall it's cheaper than buying multiple disposable cameras for my upcoming vacations, and I can have fun in the pool with it in the meantime.  To me it's well worth the $60 I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Shinn
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my father-in-law because we were all spending Father's Day together in the Bahamas.  We have always used the disposable cameras and have been generally happy with the results, but thought it would be nice to try a digital.We were so happy with the photos and videos.  The underwater photos of our kids learning to dive and the babies learning to swim are priceless.  It handles contrast and lighting so well underwater.  Having the immediate feedback of a digital display makes the photos much better than those we were capturing with the disposable film cameras.  And being able to shoot with reckless abandon is so nice - no fear of missing the picture because you used your 24 exposures.As soon as we got home, I ordered one for our family, and now I wouldn't be without it.  Great little camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: I like it!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: A.C. "Reba"
Reviews.Content: Really great for pool, not so great for ocean.  Gets very foggy in ocean.But consistently good in pool.  Digital!  And a good size.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: W. Snipes "Wayne in Atlanta"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to take on vacation. Used it for 2 snorkel outings and it worked great. Took pictures underwater and out. Pictures look great for both. Was pleasantly surprised with the battery life. Only took still pictures so no review for video.

Reviews.Title: A++++++
Reviews.Author: Hayden "Hayden "The Beast""
Reviews.Content: It was Great i went to the lake and it is water proof i belive it is the best waterproof digital camera for price and quality

Reviews.Title: Good price with waterproof
Reviews.Author: Y. C. LIU
Reviews.Content: There is no optical zoom for this camera, but it's good enough for this low price and waterproof.I took it to Myrtle Beach for my vacation and it performed with no problems.  The pictures taken under water from pool and beach are good. It is a good investment for memories to your families under water with this low price camera.

Reviews.Title: This camera is Awesome!
Reviews.Author: bcozy22
Reviews.Content: I'm a huge fan of Kodak camera's in fact we have a digital camera that is 7 years old and still takes beautiful pictures and we've never had any problem with it.  So when I was shopping for a waterproof one, I had no doubts of picking this one.We just received the camera and used it for the first time in our pool. We shot video and regular pictures and I can't believe the quality of the pics and video's.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexepnsive cam and one that takes great pics/video's.  You will need a memory card for it because the internal memory can only store 8 pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for a 5 year old
Reviews.Author: Clare Cottreau "Noah's Mama"
Reviews.Content: My son was desperate for a camera and as he's not the most careful child I wanted one that would be tough enough to survive him. We tried the "kids" cameras but they didn't last 6 months and this Kodak was only a little more expensive. My son has had this camera a few weeks now and is loving it. It takes nice, clear photos and is very easy to use. So far it seems to be perfect for the job and I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera, awesome price
Reviews.Author: S.C.
Reviews.Content: Bought this waterproof camera for a vacation and I was very pleased.  It took great underwater pictures and was versatile for general use.  Good compact size. Easy and intuitive to use.  Really good price.

Reviews.Title: What a great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Stan L. Riggin
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a month in Hawaii and used my new camera repeatedly while snorkeling, playing in the surf, or going out on rainy days or where my good camera might get wet or damaged.  This little camera consistently took some really great photos, in spite of its cost.  I was especially pleased by the shots I got snorkeling.  It wasn't like professional gear, but it certainly did a credible job.  Many of my family and friends have been just amazed at our results.

Reviews.Title: They hid all the negative reviews for this awful camera!
Reviews.Author: catherine
Reviews.Content: Amazon is presenting a one sided take on this non working rip off of a camera.  No one should buy a waterproof camer that fills up with water the minute you place it in the water.  Plus when I returned it they charged me a 26 dollar restocking fee.

Reviews.Title: Good for dust, and water Spray - beware pictures quality
Reviews.Author: patou
Reviews.Content: I needed a dust tight camera to go on work sites and resist some of the dusty environment I had to work in.it will probably last longer than my previous camera.Prosdust tight and simple to useConsnot water proofno zoompoor picture quality

Reviews.Title: Returning this disappointing camera - blurry images, awkward to download photos
Reviews.Author: Lynn S. "Shops on-line"
Reviews.Content: I think I might be better off with a disposable camera!I tried out the camera on dry land today and was really disappointed with how blurry the pictures come out. I tried to gently move like I would if taking a picture while snorkeling - and the photos were very blurry. I downloaded both clear and blurry photos to see if they looked good once downloaded - they didn't look good. They didn't look better than photos from a disposable camera.The really annoying flaw in the design is that you do have to hold the batteries in with one hand while you download the pictures via a cable. There is no way for the batteries to power the camera unless you do this.I'm returning it for either one or two disposable cameras or a more expensive unit that does not have these overwhelming flaws. Not ideal to use out of the water since there are soooo many better quality picture taking cameras for the money.

Reviews.Title: Was a 5, now more like a 3
Reviews.Author: Kristina Weller
Reviews.Content: I really loved this camera when I bought it for a river rafting trip.  It still works great in the water and takes decent pictures.  (I Agree with someone that close up pictures aren't very good).However, the orange 2nd cover over the batteries (which is, I assume to keep water out of the batteries) won't click close.  I've only had the camera 4 months.  So, because it is Kodak, you have to connect it to the computer through a USB cable to get the photos off of it.  Except you can't, because the spring-loaded orange cover won't stay closed!  So I literally have to hold it close while the pictures are transferring.  There's a little piece of plastic it appears that breaks off.Otherwise, it has been a good camera to me.

Reviews.Title: kodak water camera
Reviews.Author: svacation
Reviews.Content: Wouldnt waste my time. Took it on vacation specifically to take pics underwater. Worked fine till I put it in the water the first time and it quit working. There was water in the battery compartment. Obviously didnt get any water pics in Puerto Rico. Waste of my time and my kids were upset they didnt have any pics of the fish.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof for under 70 bucks....what should I expect?
Reviews.Author: tamastar69
Reviews.Content: It is indeed waterproof. I bought it a few weeks ago and it has been in all sorts of Michigan rivers and lakes since.The camera cannot handle bright light at all. If you take video and happen to catch a sun reflection off the water or something similar the image is ruined....like an old 35mm that got exposed to sunlight. Strange for sure but I'm guessing it has something to do with a cheap color encoder used to keep the price low.The zoom is worthless. I don't use it at all. The 12mp allows me to crop as needed and maintain an acceptable quality.You also cannot see the LCD in the sun so just buy a large SD card and snap a lot of photos. But a warning: you need to be patient as the cycle time between pictures is rather lengthy.If you need a camera to take with you when you don't want nice stuff to get damaged or lost - buy a camera like this. The quality is good enough to capture memories but not good enough to publish or win any awards.

Reviews.Title: This camera is great!
Reviews.Author: Carol Lovingood
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take to Disney World b/c I didn't want my good, expensive camera to get lost, dropped, wet, etc.  This camera was perfect!  We used it to take underwater pictures in the pool at the house we rented.  I took it on Splash Mtn. and videoed all the way through the ride.  I dropped it several times (not on purpose) and it held up just fine.  It didn't take very good night pics (parades) but I didn't expect it to.  It also got a bit blurry if you used the zoom, but again I wanted good, quick pics with a camera that I wasn't worried about ruining and that's what I got.  The battery lasted forever (well compared with reviews I read of similar cameras).  I put in rechargeable batteries at the beginning of the week and took around 350+ pictures and several (around 20) videos before the batteries died.  I kept waiting for a warning low battery light or something and it never happened-the camera just died-but I was expecting it since it had lasted so long and I had backups ready.

Reviews.Title: Recommended even if I have to get this one repaired
Reviews.Author: Sunshine stater
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with photo quality!  Some difficulty with batteries failing-- have to reopen and remove, then reinsert batteries to get the camera to power on.  It has occurred with different batteries at varying times.  When this happens, the camera emits a sustained high pitched beep.  It stops as soon as the batteries are taken out; when batteries put back, it seems fine.  If this defect continues, will need to return item for repair, but definitely would seek repair or try another of the same unit simply because the photo quality is so good.  When I got the first photos back (both above and below water), I was amazed at the color and clarify.  A very reasonable price for a waterproof camera that takes terrific pictures.

Reviews.Title: Filled with water - no pictures at all
Reviews.Author: Mother of Four "firefly96"
Reviews.Content: Wish I'd listened to the folks who complained about this camera leaking. We took it to the pool yesterday for the first trial, and within 5 minutes in the pool, the entire camera was filled with water and it was warm to the touch because the batteries were conducting inside the water. The screen dissolved into these floating pixels too.  What a waste. So we got zero pictures and I wasted a bunch of time.

Reviews.Title: not to good
Reviews.Author: Cristhiam Quiroga
Reviews.Content: the only problem was the Door opens easy and water went inside of the camara and damage my sd card

Reviews.Title: worked awesome
Reviews.Author: todd
Reviews.Content: We used this camera for two weeks in Florida and got some great pictures and videos  .great for the money

Reviews.Title: Good quality but...
Reviews.Author: M. Kalagias
Reviews.Content: I must admit I was very hesitant to trust an underwater camera that was so much less expensive than most other point and clip models of similar capabilities however I am very surprised with the quality of the pictures it took, unfortunately the cameras cons are too great and I will be returning the camera.Pros:Low cost for waterproof camera.Good for amateur snorkelingHandled salt water wellPicture quality vs cost of camera.Cons:Extremely poor battery life, takes 2 AA batteries, I was only able to take 50+/- pictures depending on if the flash was used or not and than camera had to be washed with fresh water (using it in salt water) and dried well to change batteries, naturally that is not a convenient process when you are up current half a mile from your belongings and taking pictures of a school of fish or something else that may not be there if/when you return.Defaults to auto setting on power cycle (unit turns off after some idle time and resets mode to default, this is a problem if you forget to switch back to underwater mode when using the camera underwater)Exterior finish chipping: The camera comes in 3 different colors but in just two weeks of using the camera a large portion of the color has chipped off.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: K. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 11 year-old niece, as a beginner's waterproof camera.I paid $79 for it, so I didn't exactly expect anything astounding.  The photo quality is decent, but inconsistent.  Some of the "dry" photos are very nice, while others are just OK.  The underwater photos are acceptable, but it's very tough to actually see what you're attempting to photograph (but I believe this is true of almost all underwater cameras).Shot-to-shot is very slow.  Maybe 5-6 seconds.  All-in-all, it's a good camera for a kid.

Reviews.Title: Everything good BUT...They send the WRONG color
Reviews.Author: Eliana
Reviews.Content: I bought the same camera a year ago, it's a great camera!. I go it because my husband took me to swing with dolphins for my birthday and it works perfect every time..never gave us any problems. My mom wanted it so she asked me to order one, it arrived  on time like they promised and it's in perfect condition. The only PROBLEM is that they send the wrong color. She wanted the blue one, which costs more, and instead we received a red one. Thankfully, I called Amazon's costumer service number and they were able to help me with this by refunding the difference to the card. As always, Amazon's employees are SUPER helpful and very kind!!!  .

Reviews.Title: Works great, until it doesn't.
Reviews.Author: Jack "TikiJack"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take to the Bahamas to supplement my DSLR camera to add underwater vacation photos. It worked great, and I got some amazing shots at Thunderball Grotto in the Lower Exhumas. What really surprised me was the quality of the pics out of the water! Many of the pics were better than my high end DSLR! I found myself opting to carry this little thing around rather than my expensive camera set with all the lenses and attachments. Now the bad news...Just a few weeks after returning home, the inner protective waterproof battery/mem card cover had it's small and flimsy retention clip break, so now the camera is no longer waterproof. I wasn't even doing anything to break it at the time. It just broke sitting there. Ingenious design, poor material used on the most critical of parts.Had not been for this, I'd have given it five stars! I STILL would recommend this if you want a great compact camera to tote around, or if you have a singular vacation or specific event where you want to take underwater photos while that feature still works. Just don't expect long term use out of the underwater feature.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Sport Waterproof Camera
Reviews.Author: Patrick M.
Reviews.Content: Not of good quality, I wouldn't recommend this camera.  Spend a little more money and buy something of better quality.

Reviews.Title: fun camera
Reviews.Author: deb perz
Reviews.Content: love the waterproof feature with the float; bought this for my teen son. Reasonably priced for a young person's gift. Nice color for a guy

Reviews.Title: I threw my money out when I bought this
Reviews.Author: Paragirlie
Reviews.Content: No sooner had I entered the water had this camera stopped working.  What a total waste of money.  I was terribly disappointed that snorkeling on my honeymoon could not be captured on film.

Reviews.Title: VERY Expensive Disposable Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Amazon Fan"
Reviews.Content: This camera worked fine once.  The second time after some time in the water, you couldn't remove the moisture from behind the lens and the pictures were foggy.  The waterproofed latch where you insert the batteries and the memory card has rust on it.I wouldn't recommend this camera unless you want to pay over $100 for a one time use camera, not knowing when it will let you down; I don't.  I only got 3 somewhat reasonable pics from our last snorkeling trip.  We are going to Bermuda this month and I bought another underwater camera for $58.  I am willing to risk that much for a one time use camera but not $150.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Johnathan
Reviews.Content: We used this camera twice and on the second use it took on water (pool, 6 feet deep) and never recovered.  Water in the battery compartment, water behind the screen.  Go elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: SGrudi
Reviews.Content: This is a must have underwater camera. Excellent price and takes great pictures. I 100% recommend to anyone. Even a good camera for kids.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare
Reviews.Author: Frances M ORourke
Reviews.Content: Very satusfied!  Had one just like it but gave it to a friend in another country.  This camera works very well underwater and also as a regular camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect little camera
Reviews.Author: KristenB
Reviews.Content: My last waterproof camera stopped working after 1 year so I went looking for a new brand.  I decided on this one after reading what seemed like every single review for every single waterproof camera on Amazon.  I took this to Mexico and took it snorkeling and it took wonderful pictures.  Please remember that this is an underwater camera....it loses some features and quality in exchange for being waterproof.  I also use this at the beach so I don't have to worry about sand getting in my phone.  This takes about this same quality pictures as my iphone.

Reviews.Title: Great for underwater fun!
Reviews.Author: dkeeper
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about 2 years now and am still happy with it! I received it as a Christmas present because I love capturing moments with pictures and live in the water during the summertime. Since the first time I tried it out to now while I'm in college, I have been able to take great pictures while in the water, in the rain, or even at various events on campus without worrying about the camera getting ruined. If you are looking for the highest quality point-and-shoot camera, I would not pick this one. But, if you are looking for a durable camera that takes good pictures and allows you to capture the moment adventurous moments in your life, this is a good choice for you.As a side note, be aware that this camera uses 2 AA batteries so you will want to have a few sets of them with you if you are wanting to take a ton of pictures in one day. However, I have been able to take 200 pictures at one event with basically constant use without having to change out the battery.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: G Parker
Reviews.Content: The camera works well underwater.  The only thing is that you can only point and shoot.  Quite a few pictures were blurry.  Pictures are clearer the closer you are to the surface because of the sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT do it.  Do NOT buy this camera.
Reviews.Author: Mary L M H
Reviews.Content: I have a lot of photography experience and a lot of camera equipment.  That is not why I'm writing this review.This is a waterproof camera.  That implies that if you use it up to the specified depth that it should be waterproof, right?Wrong.  This camera has an extremely high failure rate.  What is worse than a camera that fails?  A camera that fails that you have to PAY to get warranty help to fix.  We bought this camera last May because our kids love video and photos from watery places (inside water park slides, underwater at a pool, etc).  The camera just stopped working one day.  We'd bought an extended warranty through a warranty company and this camera SAYS it has a one year warranty.  The extended plan will not help us because the camera has a one year warranty.  The extended plan gave us Kodak's 800#.  Kodak's 800# hangs up on you and says they no longer offer live phone support.  If you want help, you have to go to their online service and pay $15 per incident to fix the issue.  So, we have a useless extended warranty.  We have a useless camera.  Truly disappointed with everything about this transaction.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap camera
Reviews.Author: 12VMAN
Reviews.Content: Bought this for trip to Isla Mujares and whale shark snorkling.  Performed perfectly..has doubled in price since I purchased.  I love this camera and I have several cameras,including a Canon SLR. Carry it with me fishing all the time! Since most underwater cameras have a certain percentage that leak, I bought the cheapest I could find for my trip..figured I could always throw it away. It has been great and continues to function perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Water leaked in and ruined camera
Reviews.Author: Living Life
Reviews.Content: After 2nd time using camera underwater, water got in and ruined camera.  I was very careful to make sure it was secure.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lindsey Taylor
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera to take to Disney World. It is easy to use, not bulky at all. And it does not eat batteries like some digital cameras do. I actually bought a few packs of batteries prior to our week long trip. I only had to put new batteries in once and I took OVER 500 photos. Great buy!!!

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Gale Cottles
Reviews.Content: I have this camera in the ocean, pool, snow and on land! excellent underwater pictures as well as on land. A great camera for my family.

Reviews.Title: Useable but disappointing
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: The camera takes some beautiful underwater pics but for a 14MP camera I expected clearer pictures. The general photos that are not taken underwater are very pixelated. I get much better pics from my camera phones which are 8MP and less

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof like it says
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in preparation to go on my first cruise. The very first time I used it snorkeling in Jamaica it stopped working. I was unable to get any underwater shots during my trip and it really put a damper on my experience as I was unable to capture any of it on camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this little camera!
Reviews.Author: Greg Marshall
Reviews.Content: This little camera has a LOT of bang for the buck! Friends can't believe the pics it takes - especially the ones under water! The "H2O" setting was a disappointment - the pics have a green cast when it is used...so I just use the regular setting, even under water! I even took some very cool videos while snorkeling a reef using this camera! Be sure to buy the accessory pack that goes with it...4 rechargeable AA batteries + charger, a "floatie" wrist band (the camera does NOT float! LOL),mini disk, etc...

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Robinson
Reviews.Content: Pros:Pictures turn out wellWaterproof just like advertisedPricecons:Long delay between button and picture takenlong delay between be able to take picturesPictures look awful on the screen (turn out fine once they're on the computer)

Reviews.Title: AWEOSME UNDERWATER FUN!
Reviews.Author: Maryam Rahimkhani
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera if you want something fun to take pics & videos underwater...definitely not a super professional camera but for the price it's a great camera to purchase to be able to have a lot of fun moments with. I mean if you don't wanna pay fancy prices for super professional under-water cameras, DO BUY this & enjoy it in the pool, on holidays, beaches...without worrying the humidity & water!! :DBy the way, the videos (& that underwater sound it captures) is amazing!it's really easy to work with...has timer if you wanna take selfies & a good easy-to-see red light (& actually a beep sound) so that you know when it's taking a photo & you can easily pose for pics under water!I bought it about a year ago & since then a lot of water-proof smart phones have been out but honestly...I won't feel safe to take my main cellphone underwater...for any possible damage it may have, I'll lose all my stuff on my phone so...those are good for around the pool & water but UNDER water...i think you'd better get a camera for that matter :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Shanira
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my very active son.  He has taken some really great pictures with it especially underwater.  We've had it for a few years and now is when the pictures are not as clear, but trust me, he has dropped it several times so it was definitely worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Sid
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera. I used it for a couple of trips but eventually the parts wore out due to the salinity and most of the screws rusted. It takes good pictures though. Would suggest washing it in regular water once you are done with underwater filming.

Reviews.Title: Leaked on first use.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Camera leaked first time using it.  Ruined a vacation as most of the activities were water based, therefore have not pictures to show.

Reviews.Title: Worked great at the great barrier reef
Reviews.Author: Douglas A Mills
Reviews.Content: This camera did a great job for the price. It was waterproof with no sign of leaking. It is easy to operate underwater also. It was a little hard to see the LCD screen at times if there was glare. It was not that big of a deal though. Overall I think this was a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: water..but not hot water
Reviews.Author: RedBull
Reviews.Content: This camera worked pretty well in water..,until it was exposed to HOT water in a whirlpool. Also, check the depth limit. This wasn't a problem until I participated in an underwater marine life activity and couldn't use the camera at the depth I was at.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Hal L McMahan
Reviews.Content: I have taken this camera to the Bahamas, Mexico and a cruise. Its great little camera and it takes pictures and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: fine for little kids... but that's about it
Reviews.Author: L.Rock
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this for her 8th birthday and is thrilled with it. That being said, the camera is not very good quality. Inside shots are always blurry and poorly lit. Outside shots are OK, but not great. Flash is very slow. Fine for a little kids first camera, but don't try to use it to take on vacation with you as a main camera for family memories... you'll be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed 100%
Reviews.Author: Christine Mitchell
Reviews.Content: bought this camera for a Caribbean cruise, the underwater video and pix are ok, nothing impressive. The screen resolution is  low and using it underwater is impossible. Any of the non water pictures are washed out and blurry, have tried other settings on it and still no good result. I wanted a multi use camera that I didnt have to worry about getting wet. Am planning to return it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: for the price its good
Reviews.Author: TX gadget nut
Reviews.Content: used this for a couple of trips so far including some underwater use.  The battery compartment is not so easy to open and if someone who does not know how to use it closes it incorrectly it can mess up the liquid seal and cause leakage.  Be conscientious about how you open and close this door, and keep bits of sand and debris out of there when its opened and it will stay waterproof/

Reviews.Title: This thing works GREAT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nikip1 "NP"
Reviews.Content: Awesome little waterproof camera!!!  I've used this now twice, a week at a time at my honeymoon and a trip to hawaii.  First trip it kept turning off after the first few shots but figured out that was from a defective battery.  Next trip solid all the way through.  It does seem to chew up batteries so I would bring a  spare set.  Also after  every shot it has a lag before you can take another..if that matters to you.  Its definitely for the vacationer and not the professional but the waterproof works AWESOME..  RECOMMENDATIO; DONT HESITATE TO BUY WORKS GREAT

Reviews.Title: Colors Come to Life
Reviews.Author: JDS
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a trip to Mexico I was taking. Wanted to be able to take pictures while snokeling. Love the pictures. Worked wonderfully under water. Does a great job and half the price of other cameras. If you're not a professional this camera is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: George P Tolentino
Reviews.Content: This is my second C123 (my other one was stolen) and I absolutely love these cameras. not only are they great underwater pictures they are wonderful for general pictures everywhere else too. Also having a 18 month old daughter showed me how durable this camera is, its amazing what she has put it through (throwing it and swinging it around) and its still perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great Strong Camera
Reviews.Author: lovesmadmax
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Grandson for xmas and he just loves it and it stands up to hard play..and keeps on going ..its been dropped and thrown...and in the pool ...and just keeps taking pictures...wonderfull

Reviews.Title: Love camera
Reviews.Author: bill vick
Reviews.Content: AAA camera and its ease of use , very fun to use and easy to download and use in computer.

Reviews.Title: Great value camera for water activities
Reviews.Author: Alex Florida
Reviews.Content: Great for water activities.  Very water resistant.  Have used it in the pool and ocean without any problems.For everyday use, I still prefer my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Had this camera for yrs. now and still love it!
Reviews.Author: Kim Gorman
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take with me kayaking! It doesn't have much zoom and won't take perfectly clear pics when you zoom all the way, but overall, the photos I've taken have come out beautiful! You can even take pics underwater!

Reviews.Title: Can't get any better for the price.
Reviews.Author: CubFan4Ever "CubFan4Ever"
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't ask for a better underwater camera. It takes fairly good underwater pictures and video. We got some great pictures and video snorkeling with sea turtles in Barbados. It takes great pictures on land too. We take this camera everywhere when we are on vacation or at the pool. At this price point we don't have to worry to much about it getting damaged or stolen and being out a boat load of money so it gets used more than our more expensive cameras. We bought another one for my brother-in-law and they took in on their honeymoon to St. Lucia and came back with some great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Does what you need it to
Reviews.Author: K. Umana
Reviews.Content: I usually take my dSLR for all my trips but for a cruise, I decided to purchase a waterproof camera for the beach. This works just as I expected it to and I'm glad I purchased it. Will definitely use it for any other trips to the pool or beach without worry.

Reviews.Title: Underwater
Reviews.Author: Andrew Gonzales
Reviews.Content: This camera is a gem for simple features and durability. Took this camera on a float trip and dropped it in the water a ton of times and even took some underwater pictures. features are limited, but has def taken the punishment for a camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Larry S. Cruikshank "Laredog"
Reviews.Content: The Kodak Sport C135 takes very good underwater photos and amazingly high quality out of water shots. The video quality is also good. Completely water proof and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera for a Clumsy person like me who enjoys taking pictures!!
Reviews.Author: DeAnna Balderama
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I have dropped it, spilled stuff on it, etc and its withheld through all. Even tried using under water in a pool and takes cool pcutres. I highly recommend this to anyone.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA FOR A GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: K.V.
Reviews.Content: WE BOUGHT THIS FOR A GIFT.IT WORKS GREATIT IS TRUELY WATERPROOFIT IS SIMPLE TO USEIT IS A GREAT STARTER CAMERABRIGHT COLOR SO IT CANNOT GET LOST

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: D Robbins
Reviews.Content: Takes great clear pictures above and below water. We took it snorkeling in the Caribbean's clear waters and got some great pics of the colorful fish. It performs as I would expect however the only downside is the LED screen is hard to see in bright sunlight.

Reviews.Title: affordable...great pictures
Reviews.Author: Gerald R Alm
Reviews.Content: It surprised me that it was such a good price..affordable...it takes excellent underwater picture!I've had it a couple years now still going strong!
