Reviews.Title: Underwater camera
Reviews.Author: QRIV
Reviews.Content: This camera was a great value, and arrived quickly, as I was in a pinch to get it before vacation. Some reviewers have mentioned the thinner string in the wrist strap, or the plastic clasp of the wrist strap breaking. While this has not happened to me, I could definitely foresee it happening, so just be extra careful with that. My only complaint is that the blue coloring began flaking off IMMEDIATELY (even before being used in water) and continues to come off, revealed the white plastic underneath. If anyone is really concerned about the color, it is substantially darker than the picture shows, and is very shiny, and somewhat metallic/sparkly. (I have the blue one.) Overall, it's a great camera. It is very durable, and has Kodak's trademark easy to use interface, which is great while trying to use it underwater.

Reviews.Title: Excellent...
Reviews.Author: SANTIAGO SOCASI
Reviews.Content: This article sought to carry around and to take pictures underwater.Very useful and easy to use, my family liked

Reviews.Title: Total BOMB.  Leaks.
Reviews.Author: Life is Now.
Reviews.Content: My son used this about 3 times and it already has water in it.  Total bomb.  Good thing I bought the insurance.  Such a waste of my time, the shopping, price comparing, only to have it turning out to be junk.  I expected more from Kodak.  It's not like I went for the lowest priced item.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: karla cuervo
Reviews.Content: the pictures look bad , its easy to use but its more like children camera, i gave it to my 6 years old and she love it

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: maranda
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our trip to Florida.  It did everything as described.  It took excellent pictures including underwater shots were easy and crystal clear.  This was well worth its money.

Reviews.Title: Really good waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Debra H Cody
Reviews.Content: My 13 year old bought this camera and loves it. Makes for lots of fun in the pool and pictures are amazingly clear.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: s thurber
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip we were taking.  It takes great pictures above and underwater.  I was very impressed with how well it did.  The only problem I had with it was remembering that the setting had to be changed when you are underwater.  This is a great camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: This camera stopped working after the first time we used it underwater.
Reviews.Author: Karen O Lannom
Reviews.Content: Our Kodak EasyShare Sport waterproof camera was used one time underwater and within minutes stopped working.  I would not recommend this camera to anybody.

Reviews.Title: durable and fun camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L Coffey
Reviews.Content: Got it a couple years ago for a trip to Florida and everyday use and it has done a great job.  It has definitely taken a beating and kept working without a hitch!  Took lots of unwater pictures/video with it as well as during less then desirable weather conditions and very happy with the quality.  No complaints and happy with product.

Reviews.Title: no sound on video....?
Reviews.Author: mommy to five "the5votes"
Reviews.Content: unless i just can't figure this out, we cant get any sound when we take a video.  the waterproof part is very good - it's been in pools and lakes and rivers.  bought it for my 8 yr old and it's easy to use for her skills.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Philip Harris
Reviews.Content: Worked well while kayaking and stayed dry. The zoom feature is okay, not great, but it does take good pictures.

Reviews.Title: It is NOT Water proof
Reviews.Author: SS
Reviews.Content: I used this under water for the first time and after some time it stopped working.. I found water inside the battery chamber .... Its a BAD product!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our Caribbean honeymoon!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Hall
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this camera for our honeymoon to Mexico.  We knew we would be doing some snorkeling and wanted a good water camera to take with us.  I read the reviews and was a little bit apprehensive, but I must say those of you who said it filled with water on the first use, clearly didn't read the directions.  My guess is that you failed to close the little red door in the battery compartment making the camera waterproof.  This was an excellent purchase, filled our needs perfectly, and I am so glad I did not listen to the negative reviews!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: ej
Reviews.Content: It takes good pictures under water. I would buy it again. It has protected my daughters camera for many years.

Reviews.Title: Not so good underwater.
Reviews.Author: J. Ross
Reviews.Content: Hard to see screen in the bright light. Pictures did turn out ok, but I would like one without so much glare. may look into protective covering! Also as a scuba diver make sure your rings and compartments are tight....camera's don't like water

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Jayce Kelley "franknbeans"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for beach vacations - have been impressed with quality of pictures and love that if a drink gets spilled on it, it still works well.  Took it snorkeling many times without issue.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Nelson Zambrano
Reviews.Content: A great camera, just what you expected from what you can see in the pictures, worth the money for the good quality

Reviews.Title: great for underwater...
Reviews.Author: Kristen Buley "KLBuley"
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS CAMERA!  It takes great underwater photos, for the price.  I'm never afraid to let the kids take it out, and I love the strap.  I often throw it into the pool before the kids even get out there.  Regarding pictures outside of the water, its pretty terrible.  Yeah, good thing I have other cameras for that!  This one makes vacations and summer pool time WAY MORE FUN!

Reviews.Title: Leaks - need I say more
Reviews.Author: Shannon Kastenschmidt
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this camera.  We purchased to use on our first cruise.  We were in waist high water and took a couple (3-4) of pictures.  I tried to take another and couldn't see anything on the screen.  I took the camera back up to our umbrella and opened it up.  Sure enough, there was water in the "sealed" water compartment.  I don't know how this camera could be "waterproof".  I ended up having to buy expensive disposable water cameras.  Look elsewhere!!  And on top of everything - I can't return it, as we ordered it a few weeks before our cruise and upon our return, it is past the time to return the item.  I am stuck with it...even Kodak will not do anything as this product has been discontinued!

Reviews.Title: Good for Underwater shots!
Reviews.Author: J. St. Paul "JSP"
Reviews.Content: It's a great little camera for the price. The picture quality isn't the best in the world but it is primarily being used for underwater. Trouble comes when you mix under and above water pictures. The lens gets foggy going back and forth and after looking at our pictures we realized a lot of the above the pool water pictures were too blurry to keep. Once we dried the lens (and ourselves) off we got decent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera light weight and compact
Reviews.Author: Icewater
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera light weight and compact,very very good image quality and video quality.The only down side is the battery life it takes 2AA and they discharge fast but if you can live with this its great.This cheap camera takes better pictures than my sony tx30(newest model)

Reviews.Title: Great underwater camera
Reviews.Author: B ryan Abele
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera last minute before a recent trip to Bora Bora.  I don't often write reviews but this camera exceeded my expectations.  It performed flawlessly.  I took both underwater photos and video with it.  It is compact enough to put into the pocket of my swimsuit.  The pictures were stunning and the video was amazing, even had sound underwater.  The only problem I had was using the view finder underwater.  Sometimes it was difficult to see what I was shooting.  Needless to say, for the price and quality, I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: timothy augustus
Reviews.Content: great camera and a lot of fun.  Have had so much fun in the pool with this camera.  Would recommend this to everyone

Reviews.Title: Fairly good camera
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Good camera but doesn't take good pictures at night , works fine in well lit areas only.For the money good camera.

Reviews.Title: Great until you go too deep
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Stivers
Reviews.Content: Aside from the button becoming stuck when I went further than 30 feet down, this has been a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Spend more if it's really important to you...
Reviews.Author: CRAIG SCHNEIDER
Reviews.Content: The unit is difficult to use underwater. The screen is nearly impossible to see. You basically have to memorize button presses to navigate menus to swap from video to photo. You also have to 'aim n pray' to get the shot you want. We have taken some good shots snorkelling, as well as on dry land, but many do not turn out.Also note, this will not work for SCUBA as it is not rated for 12 meters, which is the standard introductory dive depth.Finally, the unit we recieved was orange, not gray (not a big deal, but if you care about color...)

Reviews.Title: Good little budget camera that is water resistant pool and kid friendly
Reviews.Author: A real customer- Shaun "Howzat goin?"
Reviews.Content: My daughter LOVES this camera, ok pictures but great usability. She takes pics of her and her friends pulling gymnastics moves around our pool all summer long.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: It's good to take pictures under water but the quality of the picture is not very good, they need to improve the quality

Reviews.Title: Great camera/clear picture/no fogging
Reviews.Author: Shawna B
Reviews.Content: This camera is AWESOME!  I bought this last winter and had almost forgot we bought it halfway through pool season.  No blurry pictures, takes a great crystal clear picture from any depth - using this in my 8 foot inground pool.  I have dropped it in the pool and no breaking.

Reviews.Title: Holds up great, shorter battery life.
Reviews.Author: Rachel Kjos
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our Mexican vacation and it was great. I only have 4 stars because it doesn't have a rechargeable battery and we had to use AAa which do not last as long.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: D. R. Slack
Reviews.Content: This camera works great!  I was amazed at how clear the pictures and video we shot in the pool were.  No signs of leaks or moisture anywhere.  The battery life seemed pretty good too.Unfortunately we had to postpone our snorkeling trip so I don't know how it will hold up in the ocean but I am confident it will be fine.

Reviews.Title: This camera Isn't waterproof, wish I had not purchased it
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Used it for 30 seconds while snorkeling. Camera never worked again. Total waste of money. Now I am stuck trying to return it with little hope that the replacement will be any better.Update: Even though the camera is under warranty and I only used it one time, Kodak refused to stand behind the product. They instead offered me a cheap webcam as a replacement. I'm sorry, but if I wanted a webcam why on earth would I have purchased an underwater camera. Worst company ever, they won't even repair products under warranty and offer you something in exchange that's a fraction of the value and that they know you won't even want to take them up on. Nice scam Kodak!

Reviews.Title: Pleased with results!
Reviews.Author: M. A. Marquis
Reviews.Content: Pictures were taken on several underwater excursions from the cruise ship with excellent results. Inside photos came out well for near and distant objects (such as large dining room). Morning photos came out best. Nite or instances with no object for the camera to auto focus on (such as horizon shots across the ocean, or cloud formations) were not successful. Camera was new, so perhaps there is a manual focus setting I did not use.

Reviews.Title: GOOD VALUE, DESCENT PERFORMANCE
Reviews.Author: Pilarita
Reviews.Content: I could not really say a whole lot about this camera, because in all honesty I have not used it much at all. I have only used it once during summer when I went to the beach, and after that it has just been seating in my room collecting dust. I can only speak fairly and honestly about the one time that I have used this camera so far (hopefully next summer I'd be able to use it a whole lot more). The one time I did use it earlier this year, I had no problems with  it. It did what it was supposed to do, and for a low price. I did not actually took the camera under water, but I took it with me to the ocean, and it rain, and the camera also got splashed on by the waves of the ocean, and it still worked perfectly. My original idea was obviously to take pic under water, which is the reason why I got it, but that end up not happening, so I can't really say how good or bad this product is under water being that I have not tested it under those conditions. Overall I am quite pleased with this camera, I have no complaints so far, and I think the price is just right for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: RT Hines
Reviews.Content: I have never had a camera that is as cheaply made as this one.  It eats batteries like candy.Take 25 pictures and install new batteries.  The latch is loose to the battery compartment.  ESP told me not to buy it but I did and now i am sick of it.  I guess it is back to my big pentex K-R.Nothing like a japaneze made product to do the americans in.  Profit has replaced quality.  Good by Kodak as you will soon be a company of the past.

Reviews.Title: Cool underwater pics!
Reviews.Author: Dubravka Kadribasic
Reviews.Content: According to my 10-year old nephew, "It really takes pictures of and records all the beautiful creatures that I can see while snorkeling. Cool!"

Reviews.Title: want my money back , this doesnt work
Reviews.Author: franco
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for my honey moon since y was going to a place where in needed a small water proof camera,the first day I used it I took like 50 pics then the camera didnt work out any more, I want a refund this doesnt work, i dont have any pics from my honey moon, this sucks

Reviews.Title: It is ok
Reviews.Author: Priscilla Elizondo
Reviews.Content: My 5 year old nephew love it, it is excellent for him, the photos are not great, it has not a lot of options, etc, but it is great for a kid, because of the same reason, it is not complicated to use.

Reviews.Title: NOT waterproof!
Reviews.Author: April Caillier
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for my daughter and it flooded on the first day of taking it underwater! Water got in everywhere, it was useless after that. I would spend the money on something better.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Nakkeya
Reviews.Content: this is a wonderful camera it takes awesome pictures and it is my favorite color  holds up to wear and tear  very well

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Joseph Nodich
Reviews.Content: Waterproof in Kauai! Easy to use. Excellent picture quality. Battery life is a plus. Built rugged enough for active outdoor activity.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Inexpensive Underwater Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We needed a waterproof camera for a cruise.  I opted to purchase this.  My husband bought a waterproof bag for his smartphone.As others mentioned, it's important to make sure the battery case is closed.  Also, make sure to wash the camera in the sink or something if you take it in salt water, so the mechanisms will be clean for the next use.The pictures we took with the Kodak are gorgeous.  We have some of the most beautiful fish from our Cozumel snorkeling trip, pictures of stingrays underwater in Grand Cayman, and pictures of the jungle in Jamaica.  We even got a few segments of video from underwater at Stingray City.My husband's cellphone-in-a-bag option worked, but not well.  The pictures are rather blurry because it was hard for him to push buttons on the phone while swimming.  You have to push hard through the bag to get the capacitive touch to work on the phone, where as you just have to snap the button on the camera quickly, like you would outside the water.  The Kodak was a great choice.The previous year we purchased disposable underwater cameras, and those were ok, but the picture quality on the digital was much better.I can't wait to take it to Hawaii next year!

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: T. McMichael
Reviews.Content: It does very well. It is 14MP. I only use it in the ocean. I wipe it down when I come home, and I have had no problems. My only complaint is sometimes water gets stuck on the lens for out of water shots, but being a water camera that will happen. It using 2 AA's and it uses some juice, so carry extra batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Matt D
Reviews.Content: Exactly what we were looking for... not a professional camera but tough and water resistant with an internal focussing lens. Takes good pictures!

Reviews.Title: Leaked
Reviews.Author: ashley wolfe
Reviews.Content: Within minutes of being submerged, the camera leaked and was ruined. I'm so glad I brought a back up camera on our cruise. Prior to leaking, the camera took great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Mine leaked first time underwater
Reviews.Author: David Harkness
Reviews.Content: I did read the reviews before I bought it, so I knew it would be hit or miss.  I missed.  I was very careful to close and click both battery doors and it still leaked.  Sent it back for refund today.  Too bad, I was really hoping it would work out.

Reviews.Title: they work
Reviews.Author: Tim9071
Reviews.Content: I looked at a ton of different underwater cameras and didn't want a disposable type and I also didn't want to spend a fortune. These have worked very well for us (we bought 2). I like the feature of using a card and haven't had any trouble. The batteries last as long as we need/want/expect them to last so no complaints there. These are substantial cameras that will do what you want them to do as long as you don't exceed the depth limit. We used them primarily for snorkeling and the pics were fabulous, actually very surprisingly good!

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality picture
Reviews.Author: YARIE
Reviews.Content: This camara is great for the price , the quality of the pictures and video is amazing , way better than a lots of camaras out there that cost more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent pictures
Reviews.Author: T. Zaborowski
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and it takes excellent pictures!  Great video and lots of fun to play back and watch,

Reviews.Title: It was perfect for what we needed!
Reviews.Author: Jeanette L. Mortenson
Reviews.Content: Seriously, the picture quality was better than I expected, the battery lasted our whole 4 day cruise, the pictures under water were great!  We just wanted a camera that we could rely on but not worry about. We were going to be at beaches, kayaking and all that......it was perfect for what we needed.  Reliable as well!  The only negative part was that when zooming in on something you definitely lost some picture quality but this didn't matter to us.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Annette Bradley
Reviews.Content: This waterproof camera takes very good pictures in and out of water. Also it isn't very expensive at all.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Kristen Brooks
Reviews.Content: My son, who is 10 yrs old, is very happy with his camera.  He loves it!  He uses it frequently!  He paid for this with his own money after lots of research.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel R Richards Jr. "Dan"
Reviews.Content: Great gift for my daughter.  She loves it.  It is small enough for her hands, easy to operate, and waterproof.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: PEI-TZU CHANG
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is good. However, after I used in water, the video quality is not as good as before. But, it still does its job.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Sport waterproof digital camera
Reviews.Author: Sandy Ronayne
Reviews.Content: Got this for daughter and son-in-law to take on cruise. They loved it and the pictures are great.  Good underwater. Very good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Melinda Moore
Reviews.Content: It is amazing.  It takes great pictures.  It is very cute.  It wasn't badly priced.  It was packaged very well.  I would so order another camera and off this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: good waterproof camera, but it's kodak so it's goodgoes everywhere where there is water and always goes under water!

Reviews.Title: loved the camera
Reviews.Author: ruth grant
Reviews.Content: I used this camera with the orange floating strap on a cruise to mexico while snorkeling. I swam along 2 reefs and took good pictures under the water. I paid attention to previous reviews and made sure both doors on the battery /picture care were closed properly. loved the camera. pictures were very clear under water

Reviews.Title: it produces high quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Jenney
Reviews.Content: i used it in waterpark and it really takes great quality pictures.not too heavy and it is nice size.however, there is annoying time delay between pictures when you take pictures. so you have to wait 10 seconds between pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: R. Ledoux "VTMaMaNC"
Reviews.Content: So awesome that after only having it a couple months someone stole it from us at the pool. Very sad because we do not have the means to purchase another one for our daughter at the moment. We had done a lot of research for the best camera for what our money could buy and this was it. Great under water pictures and video. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Farid
Reviews.Content: This camera was awesome!  I was a little worried about ordering when I was reading a few of the reviews but all my worries were for nothing!  We took this camera to Worlds of Fun & Oceans of Fun in Kansas City.  The real test was at Oceans of Fun.  I got some awesome photos while out in the water and the under water photos were so much fun!  This camera is tough too.  It was in my pocket when I was going down a water slide.  While on the slide, I went around a corner so fast that I flipped up in the air and landed hard on the side that the camera was on (and I'm not a little gal!)  I actually felt the camera getting slammed between me and the slide.  My thought was... Oh no, I just broke the camera!  BUT that wasn't the case!  This camera took a licking and is still ticking!  I totally recommend it to anyone wanting a camera for similar activities! :)

Reviews.Title: good underwater
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Definitely works underwater. Left it sumberged overnight about 2 ft deep and still works. Picture quality is a little bad for a 12 mp

Reviews.Title: It was the BEST Birthday Gift EVER
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This gift was for my son's girlfriend. They went on a trip to Disneyland and the camera worked great...she loved it!!!

Reviews.Title: An OK camera
Reviews.Author: monykita29
Reviews.Content: Great for underwater pictures, not so great for regular outdoor pictures. It's not very fast either, takes a long time to load between pictures taken, and it doesn't remember your settings once yo turn it off - meaning if you left in on Underwater or Video, or Portrait, it will start in Auto once your turn it off / back on.For the price it's an OK camera.

Reviews.Title: It didn't work!!!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I sent an email few days before I bought the camera because it didn't work. I was on vacations in Dallas, Tx and as soon as I get in the pool, the camera get wet and stop working. I am from Mexico, so I want another quickly. I wrote them but I never get an answer. So, I get a defective camera and also, can't have an answer before I came back to Mexico.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Laney
Reviews.Content: Very poor picture quality.  I will replace this device before my next beach vacation.  I strongly recommend looking at a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Didn't make it into the water yet!
Reviews.Author: et
Reviews.Content: It's a very nice little camera, but it eats up the batteries really fast! In just messing around at home I saw the batteries getting lower in a matter of minutes! I had the impression that it was WIFI enabled, but the EasyShare is just a web photo sharing service.But, I really did not give it the acid test of taking photos or movies underwater. I went to Hawaii, but never got a chance to snorkel, boo hoo! There is a very nice sample underwater movie which you can view on Kodak's web pages for the camera (shot by a customer).

Reviews.Title: Good camera for kids - big risk if you're using it in water
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my 8 year old niece who is a budding photographer.  The color is great and the camera is pretty rugged.  The big disappointment is that it is NOT waterproof as claimed.  My niece took it underwater (max 3ft) for about 5 minutes - it took one or two pictures and then flooded.  Upon inspection, everything was properly closed and sealed. So, if you're getting this camera to use above water, it's definitely decent quality for the price.  However, submerge it at your own risk because there are way too many people having an issue with the camera malfunctioning in just a shallow depth of water.

Reviews.Title: fine
Reviews.Author: maren
Reviews.Content: I love this product for the amount of money that it was.  My only qualms are that since its Kodak, which is defunct,  if there are any malfunctions there is no way to get help. It also doesn't focus very well. However I took it tubing and it did very well. After having such a good experience with my several years old Dslr I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Bay Area Mom
Reviews.Content: Stopped working after one use.  Do not buy this product.  Bought the Fuji XP shortly after and we are very happy with that.

Reviews.Title: Best camera EVER and Easy to use LOVE IT !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Todd A Rice
Reviews.Content: I have to take picks that are hard to get of people places and things this is the fastest easiest to use camera I have ever owned !!!I would recommend this camera to everyone !!!! and it is an underwater camera so weather No worries Love it !!

Reviews.Title: Intermittent on and off switch
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: The pictures are great and the camera is easy to use.  However on my 8 day Maui trip, it shut off after 8 pictures and wouldn't start again (I had just purchased it 2 weeks previously).  We switched batteries and the next day it turned on and then off and then on and then off - ever 2 seconds - I had to take out the batteries to stop the beeping.  The problem in my mind is not a possible faulty on-off switch, but the way in which Kodak has set up the limited warrant and return policy.  First I had to call their repair company - they said they didn't repair this model.  Then I contacting kodak who have a $15 fee for any support (I imagine this will lead to major loss of market share).  Then I got online to their (free)site to get a repair number that again lead to my getting the "this model does not get repaired" message.  Then I tried on-line chat and after 45 minutes of telling this guy that the problem was initially not turning on but had led to (over time) intermittent problems with turning on, he finally gave me a reference number for repairing this.  He said if they can't find a problem they will send it back but I have to say, missing out on a week of underwater pictures is a big bummer.  This is more of a complaint about Kodak then about the camera itself (which seems to have glowing reviews here).I understand that occasionally one gets a faulty product but it appears as though the system they have in place to resolve problems discourages people from doing so.  I will NEVER use this camera again because it is not reliable.  Perhaps another camera of the same model will be fine and I hope others do not have the same problems with repairs as I had.

Reviews.Title: almost great
Reviews.Author: Contrejo
Reviews.Content: takes good pictures, but my snap button gets stuck sometimes. Works fine underwater, but i wish it came with a wrist strap seeing as i tend to use the waterproof camera when I know things are going to be hectic and messy

Reviews.Title: See pouch and camera review
Reviews.Author: J. EARL "duke of earl"
Reviews.Content: Nice simple camera that takes surprisingly clear pics while in waterproof pouch. No leaks, no touch screen nightmare operations. Would be better if there was a view finder with the screen, Cannot see scene in daylight.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: acmorris37
Reviews.Content: We actually bought one of these then lost it on a river trip. We purchased another one before we went to mexico to snorkel. One of the best water cameras out there if you don't want to spend over $100. Make sure you are in water mode when you take pictures in the water.

Reviews.Title: Great for underwater or places you will get wet!
Reviews.Author: Jill Thompson
Reviews.Content: This is my second camera like this.  It is great for going swimming anywhere.  It takes batteries so if you are not a fan of that you might rethink buying it.  It takes really good photos otherwise also if you aren't a camera fanatic.  It does a great job!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: This camera did everything I wanted it to do, I was unsure because of mixed reviews but chose to go with it anyways. Inside pictures were a little gritty but It took great under water and outside pictures exactly what purchased it for! I recommend this camera. We went snorkeling in Cozumel and our pictures came out wonderful despit the weather outside! :D

Reviews.Title: Bought this for this vacation this year
Reviews.Author: Joanne DeLuca
Reviews.Content: I didn't need another camera but I wanted a waterproof one for this vacation and I am so glad I did. We spent the entire vacation surrounded by water... So fun.. So many people commented that they should have thought about this as well. Very easy to use and took fabulous pictures while snorkeling and playing in the water this vacation. I would recommend this for everyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for family pool fun
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: Did everything I wanted and more. Great inexpensive little waterproof camera. Great product.i would recommend to anyone who is nervous about using there phone by the pool.

Reviews.Title: An excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Fabian
Reviews.Content: The camera is a piece of design. Everything works perfectly, electronics and also the design and the amazing Kodak solution implemented to make it waterproof. I submerged it approximately one meter  in salt water, without consequences. I only took care of  wash the camera in fresh water after, (an old habit from diving). I tried it with ultra fast memory and take perfect video. The AA battery performance is optimal (perhaps at the cost of minimum power flash). For the money, I think the best buy to get a camera that does the task.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Michael Stooksbury "Michael Ray"
Reviews.Content: No problems at all. worked great under water and if the batteries die just buy some new AA and your ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - Great Value
Reviews.Author: Capin Alexander
Reviews.Content: This camera was wonderful! I went the cheap route for an underwater camera because I hate the stress of worrying if my more expensive camera will be stolen if I leave it at my beach/pool chair somewhere in the middle of Mexico or the Caribbean while I go for a swim. I used this solely for photos in and under water. The pictures were clear and came out better than I expected! I was very pleased!The only downside - The screen timed out quicker than I would have liked and even if I adjusted it in the settings it still wasn't long enough. Do you know how hard it can be to take a photo under water? I don't have the time (or the lung capacity) to figure out how to get the screen back to full brightness. However, I guess the upside is it saves the battery... by the way, buy some rechargeable batteries. Back to the screen, it timed out quickly and wasn't very vibrant or bright. Sometimes I had a hard time seeing what I was shooting because it was so bright outside, the reflection off the water, etc. BUT! What do you expect at this price? I paid less than $80At the end of the day I was ultimately very, very pleased with the printed photos. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Okay for a little while
Reviews.Author: S. Acuna "S.A. in PA"
Reviews.Content: We had this camera for almost two years.  The picture quality is so so. It was great for snorkeling on vacation because you don't have to worry about taking lots of pictures because you don't have to pay to have the film developed to find out if they came out okay. The screen is almost impossible to see in the sun (like when snorkeling).It also can not be taken very deep so you can't use it for scuba diving.The biggest problem is that the little access panel for the batteries and memory card is very difficult to open and also hard to make sure it closed correctly.  I broke multiple nails over the 2 years we had it and there were times it took two people to get it open to change the batteries or get out the memory card.Ultimately this caused our camera to fail on the first snorkeling trip of our 9 day vacation.  The door appeared closed, the little black slider was in it's home position. However there must have been a small opening that wasn't closed all the way because water got in and after one photo it shut off and then later we noticed water in the lens and in the screen. Luckily the memory card was okay so we did get that one shot and the dry land pictures we had taken while still on the boat by drying out the card and using it a reader. No amount of drying got the moisture out of the camera and we had to throw it away.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera great price!!
Reviews.Author: Krys
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!!! Took it on a cruise to the Bahamas and it took some great pics!!!! Wasn't expecting it to be as good as it is! Have been using it now for everyday pics as well. Def worth buying!

Reviews.Title: Ok Camera
Reviews.Author: Nia
Reviews.Content: Does the job. Does not malfunction after snorkeling, beach, etc. This camera is pretty good with the exception that the pixels/sharpness/clarity of pictures are not the best. In fact, after taking photos when I upload the images to my PC I then edit the brightness, contrast, etc. which thens gives a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Beach camera
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: We had this camera in the ocean on a jetski, in the pool, on the beach, on the fishing boat, it was great!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic.
Reviews.Author: Patty
Reviews.Content: Easy to use works great in water and on land. Better land shots than my Olympus.If you are looking at it, you aught to get it and will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Ingrid Montgomery
Reviews.Content: Easy to you, clear pictures, make sure lens is wiped clean will fog often. Overall good buy for cost. Happy

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: edward stephens
Reviews.Content: wonderful product took great pictures underwater and on land I was very satisfied with the quality of the kodak sport c135

Reviews.Title: perfect little camera
Reviews.Author: Julee Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I am an advanced photographer, BUT I bought this camera for my five year old. She not only learned how to use it easily, but it takes really nice photos, the quality is vastly superior to any KIDS Camera. And, as an added bonus, it is waterproof.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Family
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera, and did a lot of research. Budget rules, so I got this. I have been pleased. We took pictures in the pool, at night, and inside. They came out better than with my prior more expensive cameras. We ordered prints, they were good. Underwater it does great. No issues with leaking in the pool water. I loved being able to toss it in the sand at the beach with no fear. The clarity was even good enough with this little camera to enlarge images greatly for several blankets we had made. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: this camera survived a roller coaster ride!!
Reviews.Author: Karen T MacDonald
Reviews.Content: I don't usually write reviews, but the 2 cameras I had before this broke from being dropped on the ground by a person, once my stepson and once me.  Just standing on the ground, dropped it, and it broke beyond repair.  I took this one on a roller coaster.  I put it in my pocket because I was afraid of it being stolen.  It fell out of my pocket going about 75 miles an hour.  I told my daughter we have to look for it and she said "no way it survived that".  I was so bummed not only about the camera but loosing the pics we already took.  When we got off the coaster there was a guy at the gate with my camera, perfectly intact!!  Unbelievable.  The paint has worn off some over the years but still works great.  The underwater option is pretty neat too.

Reviews.Title: Unsure if it was a wise buy
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Galvin "desert abbess"
Reviews.Content: Having difficulty completing the installation process on my 2 computers. Although the instructions appeared clear there was no info on trouble shooting.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: This was the 2nd EasyShare Sport C123 camera I have owned.  My family vacations at the lake and my first camera was constantly getting beat up on the boat and jet skis..  The only reason I had to replace it was because I left the battery compartment slightly open, and tried to use it in the pool.  I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants easy access to good photos and needs a durable camera.

Reviews.Title: Takes beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: D. Davenport
Reviews.Content: Though not as flashy as the latest digital cameras, this camera was indeed waterproof and took brilliant underwater photos. It also took good quality regular photos. A great bargain.

Reviews.Title: Works Wonderfully!
Reviews.Author: skn
Reviews.Content: I was a bit nervous about the performance of the camera based on the polar opposite reviews that this product has received, but I must be one of the lucky ones because it works great for me (I've had it for 2 months).  I live on the ocean and have taken underwater video and pictures, both on the H2O setting and with the Auto setting, and am pleased with the results.  I do make sure that I secure the 2 battery compartment doors separately (as opposed to just closing the outer door and assuming that the inner one seals as well) and have had zero leakage problems.  I also dove below 10 feet (briefly and only once or twice) with the camera and it continued to work just fine.  Overall for the price it performs as well if not better than I had hoped it would.

Reviews.Title: Great, affordable and works!
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to invest in an expensive under water camera since I didn't plan on using it that often, and it seemed like most of the cameras were so pricey. There were bad reviews for both this camera and the more expensive models, and I figured there are bad products in every batch. Luckily mine wasn't one of them! I used it both in fresh and salt water, making sure to clean and air it out after every use. I made sure there was no sand or particles before putting it underwater, and it worked perfectly! Something that would happen in the fresh water though was that the camera would fog up for a few minutes when first being in the cold water. It was annoying, but it cleared up after some time. The quality of the pictures were pretty decent too. I happily used it for photos on land, and I plan on using it regularly. We even jumped into the water with it and the impact didn't do any damage! It takes batteries, and I worried about the battery life, and I guess it was kind of short when I used cheap batteries, but lasted much much longer with better quality batteries. I suppose there are better cameras out there, but this was so affordable and got the job done just fine. I don't feel like I have much authority on the subject (I'm no photographer), but I definitely recommend this nifty little gadget!

Reviews.Title: Right camera for our non-professional purpose
Reviews.Author: Vicki Nelson
Reviews.Content: Wanted a waterproof camera for vacations and pool time with the young grandchildren. This one is small which means it won't get left home due to weight or size and gives the quality I wanted.

Reviews.Title: FOGS UP IN HEAT
Reviews.Author: Kristin Goodman
Reviews.Content: Its ok. Pics are good quality. You have to go into your scenes though everytime you turn the camera on or it goes to the auto setting by default (which is terrible). The worst part is that the view screen and lens fog up in the heat, and the battery pack you have to be careful to maunually lock it or water gets in (obviously) just doesnt auto lock when you close it. Not the best that Ive had, but you get what you pay for. was disappointed with the lens fogging those, unable to get clear pics on vacation after about 30 mnutes in the hot sun.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Christine Curtis
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take to Niagara Falls. I didn't want to worry about ruining my good camera while on the Maid of the Mist boat ride or while doing the Cave of the Winds.  The camera took great pictures, was easy to set up & has very good battery life.  The camera was compact, so it was easy to carry around. Great value for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at an even better price
Reviews.Author: D. Baker
Reviews.Content: Bought this to go on a two week trip to Maui. Used it A LOT. Snorkeled nearly every day, dropped it to the bottom in about 10' of water and it never missed a beat!! Really easy to use, filmed us swimming with turtles.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Irma R. Frazier "rosiefraz"
Reviews.Content: Took this camera on our cruise and it worked great in the water and out. It got a lot of use at Dunns River falls in Jamaica. Was really great that we didn't have to worry about it getting wet.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: amazon woman
Reviews.Content: works great in water so long as the water is clean. so far so good, takes quality photos and decent for the price you pay.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: PPResident
Reviews.Content: Love this little camera. It IS waterproof and takes great pictures. The only drawback is that it can be difficult to see what you are taking a picture of in the sunshine. I wish they had an eye viewer to correct this issue. For the price, you can't beat the quality of ths camera. One word of advice though...buy a floating handle (like the Chums Waterproof Camera Float) to go with your purchase. My daughter managed to loose her first one in the middle of the lake when she dropped it!

Reviews.Title: It have much clarity to fulfill my quality of pictures.
Reviews.Author: kimberly kelley
Reviews.Content: I am relearning to swim again and feel safe to have my camera in the water with me, and have my picture taken under water. I will tell others about this camera quality, so an interesting customer can buy one!.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Wicca "Amazon Lover"
Reviews.Content: Went to the river, and was amazed at the quality of this camera, picture turned out great, no issues so far. Swam around with it and not an issue. I am going to Idaho this weekend for some more water fun and have high hopes that the camera will be just as good. I have not taken any water photos but plan too on my trip.

Reviews.Title: An ok point and shoot
Reviews.Author: scmiller
Reviews.Content: Pros: light weight, works great underwater, good underwater video, good outdoor picsCons: back screen impossible to see in bright sunlight, video had a pink hue to it, grainy flash pics, no firmware updates available.It worked ok for a beach or pool camera. I wouldn't, recommend it for someone wanting quality photos all of the time. It serves my needs at the beach and pool when I don't want to damage or take a chance on damaging my dslr or more expensive point and shoot.One thing that is hard to remember is to make sure the battery cover is closed well so that it remains waterproof. It's an okay camera but I think if you are looking for an everyday camera there are better options out there.

Reviews.Title: Great water camera
Reviews.Author: Patti Mages
Reviews.Content: I wanted a waterproof camera to take to Fiji for my 25th wedding anniversary. I ordered this one and it was a very good camera. I used it while I was snorkeling and it took great pictures. I didn't have any issues with water leaking in as some reviewers have stated. I made sure the battery compartment was closed and the back closed and I never opened it until it was time to change out the batteries. I am very pleased with the price I paid for this camera, I feel like I got a really good bargain. Follow the instructions for keeping the compartments closed and you will not have a problem. I do recommend this product!!

Reviews.Title: very good for what it is suppose to be!
Reviews.Author: christina
Reviews.Content: i wish i knew to set the under water setting before i went under the water! i didnt think about that but it works great other then that we went 15 ft under the water and i didnt have a problem with the water leaking into it or anything! it is as good as it is suppose to be.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for what it does
Reviews.Author: Don Holmes
Reviews.Content: I knew it was not going to be a Canon rebel t3i.  But it is a great camera for taking on float trips, the pool, beach, etc for when you don't want to worry about breaking your good camera.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera with many options
Reviews.Author: Michael M. Myers "mike myers"
Reviews.Content: Although Kodak products are becoming rare I am glad for this camera because it has many options built into it besides being waterproof and shock proof.  No worry handling allows me to be less vigilant about whether the product is protected or not.  The only negative I can see in the future is when or if I have problems with it I may have no means of getting help with it due to Kodak's downsizing and it no longer providing this product.  As it was I was lucky to have been provided a patch so it worked with my Windows 8 pc.  I don't know how the easy upload to Social networks works but don't want all the pics to go online anyway and so it doesn't matter.  Still for the price I got a good product.

Reviews.Title: great easy camera
Reviews.Author: Margaret M. Gillespie
Reviews.Content: Bought one for my 8 yr old nephew for the durability and another for my mom for the ease. They  both love them and can operate them independently.  Great little camera!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Mamamoiselle
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the husband for father's day because it is sturdy, water resistant, and (sorry guy) idiot proof. He's a contractor that likes to take photos of his projects as they progress, which means the camera gets tossed about or stuffed in his sweaty pants pockets (see water resistant!). He also has NO patience with any digital/computeresque equipment, so a turn it on and snap the shot is ideal for him. (I was considering a Tickle Me Elmo Camera for him before discovering this). Bonus! He took it on a recent trip and it takes surprisingly sharp photos. I'm a professional photographer but not a snapshot snob. These are FINE vacation photos, really.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: newtothis
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to go to Sesame Place with my daughter knowing that most of the place is water and I would most likely drop my camera in the water. I was upset when I realized it took double A batteries. I took the camera expecting to change the batteries a few times through my day as digital cameras usually eat batteries. I was happy to see that I did not have to change the batteries once throughout the day!I then took the camera on my Wildwood vacation where we spent most of the day in the pool. The camera took fantastic pictures in the pool as well as under the water!!!Battery power is great! Pictures are great! I can't believe what a great product this is at such a low price!!!

Reviews.Title: Broke within a month despite best care possible.
Reviews.Author: MeerGato
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM.I saw some of the other reviews and I was a bit worried about purchasing this item, but the price was great, and we figured it would be a great point and click camera to take on our snorkeling vacation.Unfortunately, despite following all of the guidelines listed on the camera, including washing with clean water after each use in salt or chlorinated water, it simply has stopped working.  It will not power on.In addition to this, the picture quality was of the level I would expect from a camera 5-8 years ago, not a current camera... My 3 year old (non-"smart") phone takes better photos than this did.I am attempting to return, because this item was such a piece of garbage.  We will see what happens.

Reviews.Title: Different
Reviews.Author: Eric M Youngblood
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these but in different orders about a week or so apart.As far as I can see from the order information they should be identical cameras, but they are not.There are minor differences in the buttons and controls.Not particularly a problem, but since I ordered them for my two grandsons, now they are comparing them and finding them to be different.

Reviews.Title: Took it to Vegas
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kids to play with while we were in the pools. It was simple to use and took great shots. Since the camera is waterproof, you don't get to see screen very well but once we connected it up and downloaded the pictures, I was blown away. The pictures and videos turned out great.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera. Perfect for trips to the pool
Reviews.Author: C. Prather
Reviews.Content: I have taken this to the pool 3 times now. submerged in water, pictures totally under the water and out of the water. For the price i paid its great. The underwater pic's are pretty clear, helps if the person is not moving much but i do have several of my grandson swimming under water that turned out great. The out of water pix too turned out great, colors were bright. Again action shots are sometimes blurry but i take so many pictures that i always get at least a couple great ones. I use energizer lithium batteries (the silver/blue ones) they are expensive but they last longer and work better than going thru a bunch of cheap batteries that are weak and quit on you. They are perfect for any camera that takes regular batteries. I have not taken any video's yet.I love that i can see the screen better than my sony that has a waterproof case. Also with the waterproof case i ended up with water drops on my pictures, always on someones face. That does not happen when you can use a camera without a case around it. Well worth the money,great little camera.. got a lot of comments about it and folks wanting to know how to get one!

Reviews.Title: Great beginner camera
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Parr
Reviews.Content: Both of my daughters 9 and 12 have this camera.  It is a great beginner camera.  Fairly inexpensive and takes good pictures.  I would recommend this to any one wanting a beginner basic p9oint and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera.  Takes decent pictures, easy to use and compact.  Can't wait to try it out on our up coming trip to the beach.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste your money
Reviews.Author: SR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to use on boating, jet ski, and beach trips.  At first, it seemed like a decent camera.  On the first expedition, the pictures came out clear and the camera worked decently well in good lighting situation.  In low light, it was pretty bad though.  I figured it was a decent purchase for $110.  The 2nd trip out with it, the lens started fogging up making this camera totally unusable.  I had to wait for it to unfog itself before I could take more pics with it.  Pretty worthless imo.  I returned this camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera, performs better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Reza Jalali
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for our recent trip to the beach. I had it attached to my wrist (a floater wrist band is highly recommended) hitting the waves and taking pictures. the quality of images are far higher than expectations. crisp and prefect lighting in each picture. water on the lens did not affect the picture in most cases. i took videos under water from reef and fish while snorkeling. the videos are very good quality. Even under cloudy day I increased the exposure to +.75 and took great videos under water. To my surprise the microphone worked under water and recorded the sound of waves. The colors and exposure for pictures are very accurate. The only downside is the image pixelation when using digital zoom in videos. This camera performs as good as a $500 camera and it is waterproof.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work for long!
Reviews.Author: David P. Lau
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a family trip to Belize where we were going to do a lot of snorkeling. Worked fine the first day. About midway through the second day of snorkeling it lost its seal and fried. Water got inside the lens and the screen. Tried to try it out and eventually did, but the camera was toast. Also drained two brand new batteries with about 15 minutes of use. Possibly I had a defective camera, but in looking more closely at the reviews, it seems that I am not alone

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: jennifer hopstein
Reviews.Content: We went on a cruise where we booked alot of water activities.  I purchased this camera due to the price and was afraid to pay too much.  We were amazed at how great the pictures came out.  The video camera did exactly what we wanted.  The only hint I could pass on to someone is to make sure that you sit the camera outside before use.  We would sit all of our cameras on the balcony to get the fog out.  As far as under water, kayaking etc.  It was amazing, everyone was asking us why we had such a good camera underwater.  Well thats what it was made of.  Oh another thing.  Remember if the water is merky the pictures will also.  Its only as good as the pictures your taking.  I would buy another one tommorow.  Battery life was awesome.  We used duracell batteries and took way tooo many when an 8 pack would have been just fine and that included video recording.  Great camera.

Reviews.Title: It leaked on the very first water useage
Reviews.Author: Michael Burns "Burnsie13"
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my daughter's birthday a few months ago, and the first time she took it in the pool, it leaked.  Thankfully, it didn't destroy the memory card I had installed.  It was an expensive one.  Amazon was good and refunded the purchase price and the shipping because they were unable to do an exchange.  I am currently looking for another brand of h2o camera.

Reviews.Title: Leaked at 1ft, otherwise good camera
Reviews.Author: Holly Kary
Reviews.Content: Took this camera snorkeling in Belize.  I recommend you test this camera in the bathtub before you plan to use it.  The screen started to leak almost immediately when in the water and it was never even close to the 6 meter depth limit.  Probably never more than 2-3 ft!  Otherwise it is a good camera with reasonably fast processing for the price.  Great for the price if you get one that is actually waterproof.  I am working thru the Kodak warranty process as we speak so we will see how that goes.  Update:  Kodak is replacing the camera, but I did have to pay to ship the camera to their warranty group.  The Kodak Warranty process is not at all a good experience and you need to keep on top of them at all times.  They ask you to repeat the same model number, serial number, and purchase date half a dozen times even after registering the product online with them.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Ivatt
Reviews.Content: Was nervous about buying a product thats going away but having used it am pleased, tried it out in the oceana nd so fart all is good. A great value

Reviews.Title: Good camera, bad customer support
Reviews.Author: Jenna Sawyer
Reviews.Content: So far we are happy with the quality of the camera.  But, unfortunately it stopped working 3 weeks into the purchase.  When I called Kodak for support, I was told there would be a $15 charge for them to help me via phone.  When I emailed, for no charge, it took a week to get a response.  In the time I waited for a response, the camera began working again.  I can only assume that it was "water logged", if that's possible.  I would rate this higher, it does take good pictures, if Kodak was more supportive.

Reviews.Title: This camera is amazing!
Reviews.Author: RKAK
Reviews.Content: I wanted an underwater camera for a snorkeling trip in August, after breaking a previous, more expensive camera.  We took it to the mountains and a hot springs pool to see what to expect.  I cannot believe the pictures and the quality!  The batteries do seem to go quickly, but after reading this in the reviews, I  carry spares.  It is easy to use and produces sharp pictures.  We have  had no problem with leakage and even the non water pics are great...this was not the case with our previous camera.  Honestly, I am amazed and so glad we made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Stacey Kohl "SKohl"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to use, took great pictures in and out of the water. Small and fits write in my purse

Reviews.Title: Broke after one use, no exchange?
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a wish list gift. From what I have seen, it took a few great regular non-underwater pictures. With the camera fully closed, I went in a 4ft pool and held the camera under about 1ft of water to test it out. I was gentle with it. All of a sudden it stopped working. Fearing the batteries had died (brand new batteries?) I took it out of the water and put it aside in a dry place. After further investigation, water had SOMEHOW gotten into the battery compartment and rendered the camera useless.The way this camera is, the battery compartment and an external compartment must both be snapped closed, which both were. You cannot even close the outside compartment unless the inside one is fully snapped closed first. Both compartments were fully snapped closed when the camera was used.After laying the camera out to dry, it still will not work. After contacting the company, they said they cannot give a full refund because it's been more than one month.  So they sell a camera that is made like crap, you get barely 1 use out of it, it breaks and they won't give you an exchange, only a PARTIAL REFUND? Nice customer service you guys have there. I feel robbed and so does the friend who bought it for me.  I will never shop here again or buy any kodak products.

Reviews.Title: Pics are not great quality
Reviews.Author: tsolak
Reviews.Content: The pictures are not as good a quality as I expected. We bought the camera to take on vacation to Curacao where we did a lot of snorkeling. We just returned from vacation and I had them developed. Clarity is less to be desired.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: RON ANGST
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures and seems waterproof. Nice and lightweight. batteries last long time will be using while Kayaking in ocean and on the river.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and even better price
Reviews.Author: Katie Folken
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeded my expectations. Because of the great price I assumed it would only last a short while underwater. Another guy on the same trip brought a $300 underwater camera and it filled with water on the first day.  The next guy had a $200 underwater camera and by the end of the cruise it quite working. This little gem kept on going with 2 snorkel trips per day taking action shots, videos and shots out of the water as well. Highly recommend this camera-be sure to buy extra batteries

Reviews.Title: worked for one trip
Reviews.Author: frank leblanc "tech lover"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a trip to Mexico. Was very pleased with the pictures, both in and out of the water.  A few months later we took another trip. The pictures were terrible. They were blurry and when using the zoom the view finder would go dark. Was lucky I checked the pictures at the end of the day and had another camera. Since it was still under warranty I sent it in for repair. Was told they could not repair it and since Kodak was not making cameras anymore they sent me this lousy video camera. Gave it away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for underwater purposes
Reviews.Author: AVIRAL GUPTA
Reviews.Content: We loved using this camera during our vacation to Mexico . It is cheap and does an excellent job of taking clear photos underwater

Reviews.Title: Great quality and durability
Reviews.Author: Chris Ruppel
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical since there were a few negative reviews, but I have been extremely happy with this camera. I have kept it in the water for up to 30 minutes with no problems. I never submerged it more than about 6 feet, but it claims to endure up to 3m or ~9ft. I have no problems leaving it strapped to my wrist while I swim around in lakes and beaches. The body is fairly rugged and survives bumps and other inevitable events that occur when swimming.The quality of pictures is pretty darn good, especially when compared to having no photo at all! If you're snorkeling, tubing, or swimming in a lake and want to snap a few photos, this camera is great. The underwater video comes out very good, even in slightly murky water. If you can see it with your goggles, the camera will be able to capture it.As other have mentioned, the lack of optical zoom means that photos are taken almost the instant you press the button with very little delay. I find this convenient since things can swim away at any moment. The photos do seem to take a little longer than usual to save to the card, but it has a burst mode so you can take three pictures in a row by holding down the shutter button. I find this to be quite useful.I like how it takes AA batteries, so if you're using it multiple days in a row in a remote location (camping, travelling) you can keep using it without needing to find an outlet. Also it takes a standard SD card so the photo capacity is up to you. There is a setting to adjust LCD screen brightness if you need to squeeze more out of the batteries.For the price this thing is awesome. I love finally being able to capture moments would destroy other cameras!

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: oscar rodriguez
Reviews.Content: great camara for pictures... under water photos are very nice.. i was in a clear blue water beach and the picture came out amazing... however the video quality is not very good when you record a light source such as the sun... yout get lines that go through the image

Reviews.Title: Good value!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Whitcomb
Reviews.Content: This camera did everything I hoped it would do.  It was easy to use and took nice pictures especially considering how inexpensive it is.  It worked great underwater which is the only reason I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Water entertainment!
Reviews.Author: A. Preston
Reviews.Content: My family has enjoyed the heck out of this camera!!  It takes clear pictures and even flashes underwater when needed.  We haven't hooked up the share feature to our social media mainly because i dont want the kids sending out an unflattering picture of me to the universe.  It's a fun, good quality purchase.  The video under water is a hoot too!

Reviews.Title: Good little water-proof camera
Reviews.Author: Dale Jarman
Reviews.Content: The Kodak Sport C135 is truly rugged since I dropped it to no ill effect.  Took pictures bicycling - sometimes in rain - and it worked great.  One thing I did not like was when taking videos, if you zoom in the picture gets very pixelated (loss of detail).

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kristin Baran "krissy"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a snorkeling trip in Bermuda.  For the price we were very happy with ease of use and picture quality

Reviews.Title: Works Great, No Worries
Reviews.Author: mamaCoocox
Reviews.Content: I have this on the beach in St John, The kids are taking the camera out in the water and taking pics. I am not worried if they drop camera because it now floats with the flotation device. Great pics!

Reviews.Title: A good camera with minor issues
Reviews.Author: L. Quadri
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because I wanted something to take pictures while camping, at the beach, ect. and the waterproof idea seemed like a good way to go. I was surprised that it did not come with a memory card, which was ok since we tend to have these lying around from upgrading electronics. I'm getting used to not having a viewfinder, although I still wish it had one since sometimes it can be hard to see the screen. The pictures looked great when I uploaded them to the computer though. I ended up having to use the card reader to do so, as the software would't automatically install, and then once I found the link on the Kodak site, the camera wouldn't recognize it. I also wish it had a lens cover. I did have major issues with using generic batteries - it would take about 4 pictures right away, but if it sat for any amount of time, it would just die. I put in energizer max batteries and it's been doing great since then, taking random pictures and messing around with the camera for a week and no sign of the battery draining at all yet. Overall, I'm happy with the camera after working through the few tech issues and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: For the money you cannot beat it.
Reviews.Author: czar
Reviews.Content: This little camera works well, takes great pictures and takes a beating and keeps on going.I recommend for the non camera nut ( Like Me ) for its size and utility. Would be great for a kid just starting out

Reviews.Title: MEETS MY NEEDS , WIIL KNOW BETTER WHEN I COME BACK FROM MY TRIP.
Reviews.Author: David F. Donahue
Reviews.Content: Seems like an OK camera. a bit slow. It should meet my needs for a waterproof camera. Am going on a cruise and doing some trips where this should be helpful.

Reviews.Title: My first online purchase
Reviews.Author: arcie legarda
Reviews.Content: Good for a first timer to purchase online, though was not able to check the specification details that this needs 2 double A batteries instead of a battery pack. Good buy for a first timer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Performance on Vacation
Reviews.Author: J. Klein
Reviews.Content: We recently took two waterproof cameras on a week long vacation that involved many hours of swimming in pools and in the ocean: the Vivitar VF526 (~$50) and the Kodak Sport C123 (~$70).  The Kodak C123 outperformed the Vivitar VF526 in almost every way and was easily worth the additional ~$20.Disclaimer: We are not photography experts and may have achieved better results if we knew how to properly adjust settings on either camera.  These results are based on factory settings for each camera  after confirming that picture quality was increased to the maximum setting (14MP for Vivitar VF526, 12MP for Kodak C123).*Vivitar VF526*Purchased: 04/2013Settings: 14MP (4320x3240), dynamic exposure (ISO 50 to ISO 400), focal 8.5 mm, O EV, f/2.8, dynamic exposure (1/4 to 1/500 seconds)Picture Count: 146Batteries Used: 2 AAA (Alkaline)Batteries Consumed: 4 AAA (replaced batteries once)Waterproof Performance: No problem at 1 meter, Salt Water and Chlorinated WaterUnderwater Photo Quality: 4/5 (very clear)Time: The date/time is LOST (reset to 01/01/2012 12:00 AM) each time the cover is opened to access batteries or memory card.Default Image Quality: 2MP (defaults to lowest image quality, be sure to change to 14MP)*Kodak Sport C123*Purchased: 08/2011Settings: 12MP (4000x3000), fixed exposure (ISO 80), focal 6.3 mm, 0 EV, f/4.5, dynamic exposure (1/8 to 1/1250 seconds)Picture Count: 628Batteries Used: 2 AA (Rechargeable Sanyo Eneloop)Batteries Consumed: 2 AA (did not have to replace or charge batteries during entire trip)Waterproof Performance: No problem at 1 meter, Salt Water and Chlorinated WaterUnderwater Photo Quality: 3/5 (slightly cloudy)Time: The date/time is MAINTAINED each time the cover is opened to access batteries or memory card.Default Image Quality: 12MP (defaults to maximum image quality)Comparison in various lighting conditions:Pictures taken in direct sunlight at noon: the Kodak C123 captures faces with light shadows while the Vivitar VF526 captures faces with VERY DARK shadows.  The Kodak C123 pictures are very good compared to the Vivitar VF526 pictures.Pictures taken 30 minutes prior to sunset: the Kodak C123 sunset pictures looked good while the Vivitar VF526 sunset pictures were fairly dark.  The sun appeared yellow or orange in the Kodak C123 pictures and green in the Vivitar VF526 pictures.Pictures taken less than 5 minutes prior to sunset: the pictures from both cameras looked good.  The sun appeared red in pictures from both cameras.Pictures taken 20 minutes after sunset: the pictures from the Kodak C123 were brighter and contained more detail than the pictures from the Vivitar VF526.Pictures taken in dark at night: neither camera was able to capture pictures in dark settings at night.  Pictures from both cameras were very dark with almost no detail.Overall, the picture quality from the Kodak C123 were much better than similar pictures from the Vivitar VF526 except for those taken underwater.  The Vivitar VF526 seemed to take slightly better/clearer underwater pictures.  Of the two cameras, I would recommend the Kodak C123 (or possibly the newer C135).  The quality of the Vivitar pictures was mediocre at best and the need to reset the date and time after opening the battery cover is ridiculous!

Reviews.Title: Great point-and-shoot for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I took this camera on vacation with me to Cozumel. I went snorkeling multiple times and this camera took beautiful pictures and great video! I had no problems at all, as this camera is very easy to use. I saw that someone wrote that they lost all of their pictures and I noted that there is an option, when reviewing the pictures to 'delete all'. I am so glad that I bought this camera and now I have great memories of my trip!

Reviews.Title: Gifted
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I bought as a gift for a friend and she had no problems with it on her Honey moon.  Nothing but positive things to say about the camera.

Reviews.Title: The C135 waterproof camera is awesome.  Replacing my C123, which has made it across the world with flying colors and has been kd
Reviews.Author: Snackman
Reviews.Content: Replacing my C123, which has made it across the world with flying colors and has been kicked and dropped innumerable times.  IT is a survivor with paint gone and spring missing after a serious drop with the door open.  But still kicking.  Just wanted to get a replacement early and this has filled the bill.  Only wish it had a closeup macro focus (it IS newer...).  It is thinner and nicer button layout, but getting used to the new ones takes time.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: This camera is very compact and portable. I bought it to take pictures on my kayak. It fits in my pocket and zooms pretty well. The pictures are very clear. Good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good enough for the price
Reviews.Author: Lukos
Reviews.Content: I find this camera very slow to process images. Also the image quality does not really look like 14MP, more like 10MP. Disappointed that I am not able to press the shutter half way to focus on a subject before taking the picture. This is truly a point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Gunter
Reviews.Content: I usually don't do reviews but this camera deserves it. Its totally an outdoor camera anything outdoor works perfectly with it :) I have taken some pretty awesome pictures with this even professional photographers were amazed at the quality of the camera. Its small so you can take it anywhere. I have taken it to the pool to the ocean to theme parks and everything. Wonderful camera :)

Reviews.Title: Amazing pictures
Reviews.Author: ARaw
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera 2 years ago just to have a point and shoot to have on hand. I thought we would try it on our bowfishing trips and our cruise. It takes great pictures. I took pics with this camera and my wife's SLR, and these were actually better! Wonderful for the outdoors. We tried going to WalMart to buy another, but they quit carrying it. So glad to see it on here, and we will be buying another today! (Yes, we fight over it!)

Reviews.Title: More than I expected!
Reviews.Author: D. Lajoie
Reviews.Content: We were headed to a water park for 2 days and I wanted pictures.  We have used the little disposable underwater cameras before without much luck, so I thought I would try my luck with an inexpensive waterproof digital camera.  Most of my pictures are taken with a $500 DSLR, so I didnt' expect much out of a little $60 camera.  Boy was I in for a surprise.  I tried not to fully immerse it in water and it was taking great shots with just getting a bit of water splashed on it here and there.  But then my son decided to go down a water slide and at the bottom I had to catch him quickly and forgot about the camera, so it was totally immersed.  It still took great pictures.  I did not try to take any pictures under water, but the camera survived immersion very well.Pros:  takes great pictures, lots of settings for your environment, easy to use (note: I did not use the kodak software, I took the SD card out of camera and put it directly into my laptop to view and save the pictures.), can but fully immersed in water, pictures that are only slightly zoomed in still look terrific, removable memory.Cons:  It's not really red, it's orangish red.  1 set of batteries will last about 3/4 of a day depending on how much you are using the camera.  If you zoom in too much the pictures are very grainy.All in all, I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: grebennioukova "grebennioukova"
Reviews.Content: I needed waterproof camera for vacation and this did the trick; Underwater pictures came out good. I wish it was taking faster pictures though - takes upto 5 second between pictures to process image.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Michele T
Reviews.Content: This takes great pictures and is excellent underwater.  Didn't have any issues with it taking pics of our 2 year old in the pool while on vacation for 4 days.The batteries do not last very long so I just kept turning it off instead of waiting for the auto shut off, after the first day of the batteries going dead just turning it off after each use made the batteries last for the next 3 days.Will use this camera for all vacations not only water related because it is small and takes quality pics and if your are doing any dirty or wet activities you can bring it.  I have a SLR and will still bring that too but this is a good second, waterproof option.

Reviews.Title: Better than our nice camera
Reviews.Author: Greggory S. Wright
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazing pictures on land and in the water.  Took this to Grand Cayman and got some great snorkeling pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mary C. Lloyd
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my grandson and he loves it.  Its great that he can use it in the water.

Reviews.Title: Clear, crisp photos
Reviews.Author: Leslie Ragg
Reviews.Content: This camera took great photos above and below the water and it is so easy to use. As with any underwater camera, it is a little difficult to see what you are actually taking a picture of under water, but I just aimed in the direction I was looking, and got some great shots! I had an uh-oh moment when I dropped the camera right before a ziplining adventure and it stopped working. But, the good news was, when we got back to the ship, I put new batteries in and it worked!! yea! I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Elegant !
Reviews.Author: Ayman
Reviews.Content: Big things comes in a small package, that goes to Kodak sport C135,simple to use, hardcore body, clear shots.

Reviews.Title: Bad in Low Light
Reviews.Author: Craig Riley
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price and works well in most conditions. Not so good at night or in low level lighting.

Reviews.Title: Great product for underwater and more
Reviews.Author: Allison S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera 2 years ago, and I'm so glad that I have it.  It's a great camera to take underwater pictures with, but it's even better at taking photos in places where you'd be nervous or protective of a traditional camera.  I've taken it snorkeling, and the photos of fish were mediocre, but the photos of people turned out well.  I've also taken it to a water park, on boat trips, to the beach, and even to a 5K "color run" where powder colors are thrown.  I've used it a lot and never had any glitches or leaks.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had bought this many vacations ago!
Reviews.Author: K. Doll "kclynnd"
Reviews.Content: Took this on a vacation with us and it was fantastic! I was able to take it swimming in the Irie Blue Hole in Jamaica and jump right in without worrying about it. I got picture of us in the under-the-waterfall cave, how many camera's can go there? And took it along while we climbed Dun River Falls- no one else in our group was able to get pictures of the experience with their cameras. Disposibles are expensive and a pain. I can't believe how reasonably priced this camera is, and even has a bit of a "real" (optical) zoom. Pictures turned out just fine. Just need to remember to clean off the lens. I will be giving a couple of these as gifts this year.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share Waterpoof Camera
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: I had to return this product.  When I used the camera in doors it was great when I took the camera out doors I had problems see in the camera window.
