Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Hawaii after reading some decent reviews. I used the camera on the boat as we neared our snorkeling spot and I made sure everything on the camera was sealed especially the battery compartment before entering the waters.  The camera failed right as I got into the water; water somehow seeped through.  I would not recommend buying this product.

Reviews.Title: waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Dexter MC
Reviews.Content: Camera was a gift for my daughter.  It was exactly what she wanted, and she uses it all the time.  I would purchase another.  It is a good quality, inexpensive camera, and a great choice for younger children (my daughter is 12)who are looking for a durable, waterproof camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Judi Z
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera to use when snorkeling.  Took it on a recent trip, and used for both underwater and other photos.  While I haven't printed any of them yet (just got back) the camera was easy to use and the photos in the camera look good.  Can't beat the price for a camera that takes pictures underwater.  One thing, I separately ordered a wrist strap that will snug up on my wrist.  The one that comes with it doesn't tighten up, so I was afraid it would slip off my wrist in the water.

Reviews.Title: Great idea for kids
Reviews.Author: Damian517
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 5 year old after seeing the wasted money her grandparents were spending on the crappy bulky kids cameras at Toys R Us.  The camer is simple to use and waterproof.  My daughter runs all over taking sometimes amazing photos which she can easily view on the moderate LCD screen.  The response time is OK.  I wouldn't buy it for myself but it's a great option for kids.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera...Little Price
Reviews.Author: Ruby G.
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews on this camera,I bought it along with the "floaty" camera strap to go snorkeling.  Well, the camera did very well, took some great photos and it was great having a camera I didn't have to worry about.  Yes, you pretty much point and shoot at whatever you want to take a picture of underwater.  However, that's what makes it fun.  The camera took some great pictures of fish and the friend I was with.  Anyway, if you can catch the camera between 60-70 bucks on Amazon...Get it.  You'll have fun with it too!

Reviews.Title: Worth it for the price!
Reviews.Author: B. Boman
Reviews.Content: I am so happy I bought this camera for my vacation to the Caribbean, it was well worth the investment for how much it was used.  There were a number of things I liked about the camera and a few things I did not like.  I'll start with the things I like:  It takes quality pictures for a point and shoot, the majority of pictures are not grainy, the pictures came out in true colors for the most part, and it worked well taking a variety of pictures in a variety of settings.  Now to the things that I did not like: After two days of using this camera in the ocean I noticed the paint started chipping.  That is not ideal, but it doesn't really affect the performance of the camera so I am not too worried about that.  I was not very impressed with was the LCD screen.  It was very fuzzy, so it was difficult to tell the quality of the picture until it was on the computer.  Also, just a side note, I personally liked the auto setting under the water better than the H20 setting.  The H20 setting took out the blue, and in the ocean that just made the water look green.  Nobody wants to look like they were in green water when they were in crystal clear blue water, so I would try both settings to see which works better for your situation.  You can look at my pictures I posted to see the difference between the auto setting underwater and the H20 setting, they were taken in the same location.  Overall, this is a very nice camera for the price.  I would recommend if you are looking for a relatively cheap underwater camera.

Reviews.Title: First time wet stopped working
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Returned due to first use in water it stopped.  Dried it out and had limited capabilities.  Diappointing Christmas gift for our daughter :(

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I use this camera while paddling outrigger canoes, snorkeling, and for video taping swimmers in the pool.  This camera is great.  Good:  Takes great still pics in daylight.  Color, focus, clarity are all really quite good.  Others have mentioned poor battery life, but I am closing in on 300 pictures and 60 minutes of video and I am only on my second set of batteries after more than 6 months of use.  You just need to turn it off when you are not shooting pics. (this isn't your I phone)  This is the 3rd waterproof camera I have used, and this is the first model that hasn't leaked.  Just be careful with sand.  The bad:  There is a long delay between depressing the button and the shutter, so not too hot for getting action shots.  There is an even longer delay between taking one pic and waiting for it to reset for the next pic, even with a fast memory chip.  You do need to hold it still while shooting pics, otherwise they will blur.  In low light conditions the pics become very grainy (the flash overcomes this issue for nearby objects)  The video is not stabilized so it can be very jumpy if you move the camera at all.  During video shooting it doesn't seem to readjust the exposure as the light changes.  Over all I am quite pleased with this camera.  The pictures can be quite stunningly beautiful.  The price can't be beat.  It is easy to use even wearing gloves.

Reviews.Title: Great for Kids
Reviews.Author: Megan Shuler
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother, thinking that it was going to serve it's purpose well-and I was correct.  I did not get anything more or less than what I expected.  I read the reviews on quality, overall performance (I suggest you do,) and I figured that it was just right for my mom and I, considering that I am on a budget, go swimming quite often and my mom likes to be rough, throw stuff around and is likely to tear some thing up.  It is just like a toy. Great for kids, or mother.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Hutson
Reviews.Content: Kodak EasyShare Sport C123 12 MP Waterproof Digital Camera (Red) (New Model)I bought one of these for my husband and I to take on our trip to the florida keys. We knew we would be in and around water most of the time. I decided to invest in this. Not too expensive.Turns out it is terrific. Great value. Very simple to use. Offers more extras than you will expect to find. Takes really terrific pictures. The batteries last really well. It is durable. My granddaughter now calls it her camera. She uses it all the time. Being 3 years old, she is not so gentle. But the camera is great.Underwater usage was great. I was so happy with this camera.Very simple, easy to use, durable, small, handy, great money value.My parents are going to hawaii soon. I bought them one to take. You really cant beat it.It is great for above and below the water. You will not be sorry you tried it.

Reviews.Title: excellent for the price!
Reviews.Author: The Wall "wcasey5"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera thinking it would be a novelty for our trip to Punta Cana. I kept expecting the thing to die before the end of the trip, but it never did. It worked perfectly and we got some great shots, and video! We even gave it to one of our tour guides on a snorkeling excursion to take pictures of us diving. The batteries lasted pretty good, we used nimh and only re-charged them once in a week of use (went through 1 set and were on the second.  The floating strap was awesome and really made the camera float well. We purchased and extra case to take along and were happy with that as well. Overall, great product.

Reviews.Title: Good fun camera for the price
Reviews.Author: L. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I have owned this for 6 months putting it through various tests of different degrees of salinity in different parts of the globe and here are my impression.  FWIW, I use it exclusively in the 16x9 format:CONS:  - Hard to see LCD screen in bright condition.  - Slow processing, taking a long time between shots.  - Sub-par in low light condition.  Short range flash.PROS:  - Rugged: give it to your kids, expose to rain, sun, sand, dust, and of course, water, it will withstand all.  - Decent picture quality, both in and out of the water in sufficient lighting.  - Long battery life (though this one time, it seemed short when exclusively used under water.)Having a pool party?  A group aqua-vacation?  This is a must have.  All the kids (and adults alike) will have a blast, it's a guarantee!

Reviews.Title: 10 minute fail
Reviews.Author: tomwam
Reviews.Content: Purchased Kodak Easyshare C123 for a vacation.  Got a few great underwater pictures, then problems.  Wouldn't take another photo.  Wouldn't stay turned on.  Lens fogged on inside.  Clearly water has leaked into the camera.  Now the LCD display will illuminate but won't show anything.  Good thing I had used an optional memory card, at least I got to save the photos by reading the card directly into my computer.  Kodak has a quality problem with this camera.  If you purchase one, keep all the packaging to make the return easy in case you get a leaker.  Kodak has agreed to look at the camera for possible warranty repair/replacement.  We'll see.  I will write another review once they deal with my warranty claim.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Frances G. Clor
Reviews.Content: Let me start out by saying that photography is my passion and I have even invested in photograpy classes in the past. Was skeptical of spending alot of money to risk something getting ruined.BUT; This Kodak EasyShare C123 works great and is a great value for the cost. I've used it in the tub with the kids, in a tropical storm, and took on vacation to use in the pool and ocean.. even used while climbing waterfalls in Jamaica. With any underwater camera it should be rinsed with fresh water after saltwater use. Sometimes it may develop condensation on lens but is easily solved by redunking or wiping with finger. Can't wait to take it to the waterpark and use on waterslides

Reviews.Title: Good Camera so far
Reviews.Author: K "K"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and so far it seems to work just fine. The view finder is a good size for her and it seems to be getting a lot of clear pictures. The only thing I don't like so far is that there is no lense protection. It seems like most cameras have either a lense cap or the little shutters that cover the lense when you turn it off, but this didn't have anything at all. I guess we will just have to be extra careful with it. Overall is is not a bad little camera so far.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: tinkerRN
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 10 year old at Christmas.  I was really impressed by the quality of the pictures.  The video was quite impressive, as well.  I researched this purchase prior and based on what was stated, I don't plan to submerge it in water; however I still fell that the waterproof ability could be beneficial since it is for a child.

Reviews.Title: fantastic underwater camera!
Reviews.Author: L. Nardi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use exclusively for underwater and I could not be happier! The picture quality is amazing! Super fast picture taking-no lag time between clicking the button and the photograph and this gives you clear pictures even though both the photographer and the subject are in motion underwater.  Large view screen to easily see the image.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Patricia Mary Malone
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my son. It was bought for him to use and he loves it. It has an easy construction that a child can figure out easily. It is compact and waterproof to boot. We are very happy with this purchase. A great camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Just the camera I needed!!!
Reviews.Author: Araian85
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA.So let me detail this for you. This is a relatively cheap camera. I bought it as a complementary item for my vacations since there were some water activities involved. The awsome thing is that I ended using this camera for every outing... wet or dry.Of course, I'm not a professional photographer. I'm more of the kind "aim and shoot", which is why I find this camera fits to my needs. It does pay to practice the settings and ISOs and whatnot, because you can have a sharper image from day to night, in the water and out, with glare and without.... Ahh to complicated for me to keep explaining, I'm doing it on instint by now.PROS:-Its small, fits every decent sized pocket, and comes with its cord.-Can stand salt water, river water, cold water, hot-springs water.... I have come everywhere with this cuttie.CONS:-The screen can be scratch easily, so be carefull and do not leave it near keys and pointy things.-The scene that you may want to capture can look a little more darker on the screen because of the plastic/glass that is made of. BUT the pictures look amazing, don't worry.-Would have love a pouch to store it. Came with none.True story, this is my second camera. I bought the same one again because I broke the first on a rafting trip (knocked it out with the paddle and the screen broke, and guess what? it still works!). So I had to have this camera again. I just like it so much.

Reviews.Title: Image quality leaves a lot to be desired
Reviews.Author: TopJim
Reviews.Content: We recently bought a Kodak EasyShare Sport C123 on Amazon and returned it a week later.  I guess for $67, it was a reasonable deal ($90 with a memory card).  I wasn't sure how much I was going to miss the optical zoom that I have on my old Canon SD400, but it turned out that I really missed it.  So many shots I wish I could have filled the frame better.  But the real deal killer for me was the image quality.  The highlights really blew out, and the shadows clipped to black.  By far the most contrasty camera I have ever used.  I only had it a short time, and didn't test its waterproofedness, but I'd trust the other reviewers that it would hold up OK in the rain or underwater.We spent some time looking at the Pansonic Lumix and Nikon AW100, and decided on the Nikon.  The AW100 arrived last week and it's really a fantastic camera, well worth the extra $200.  The image quality is as good as any Canon SD compact camera, 5x optical + 5x digital zoom, stereo 1080p video, slow-motion video, GPS, and much more control over image settings.  I realize not everyone has the extra $200 for a camera, but from my experience it would be worth saving up and getting the Panasonic or Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: coffeegirl
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She is on the High School Swim team and Water Polo team. She has had a lot of fun taking pictures underwater of her teammates! Camera is nice and compact, and easy to use. So far, she has not had any problems with this. Its only been 3 weeks, but so far,so good! I purposely bought the bright color, in case they dropped it underwater, and the color is very cute, I think. Pictures come out nice. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Damage Display
Reviews.Author: Mayra
Reviews.Content: The camera has good quality. But when the water used in the display is filled with water and could not be used more. I do not recommend ..

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!!
Reviews.Author: andres
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, i got it for my cousin to take it to Galapagos, great pictures, nice waterproof. My only problem was to buy it with the case that amazon offer to you in a combo. Don't buy that case, waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I purchase this product in august of last year but I did not get the opportunity to use it until my christmas vacation. This camera work for a grand total of 5 mins. The minute that I placed in water to take a picture of my son just below the water surface the camera died. Water leaked into the battery compartment and that was the end of it. Complete waste of money. My return period has expired so amazon will not accept a return.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Cathy Sloan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera as a Christmas gift for 14yr old Granddaughter.  She has not had the opportunity to use it underwater but has friends with the same camera and is very excited that she now has one.  She loves the social media features of this camera. She likes the quality of her pics.  I selected  this camera because she wanted an underwater camera and it takes AA batteries.  I also purchased recharagable AA batteries and a stylish battery charger to go with this camera.  I wanted to give her the opportunity to save $$ if she can remember to charge her batteries.  If she forgets to recharge batteries she can purchase AA batteries anywhere and not miss out on using her camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Looks like it will work for us at the beach!Maybe we can take photos underwater as well!We love to take pictures with Kodak Easy Share.

Reviews.Title: Great results for the price
Reviews.Author: GalapagosSnorkeler
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kodak C123 on Amazon for a reasonable price ($80) before our family trip to the Galapagos.  We snorkeled every day, and there was so much going on that I used primarily the video function (anticipating this, I had bought a 16 GB card for about $20).  The camera recorded amazing footage of sea turtles, sea lions, sharks, rays, schools of fish, etc.  I did not give 5 stars because, as noted by other reviewers, it was difficult to see the target in the 2.6-inch display: even after I got the hang of it, there were times when the light hit it wrong and you just couldn't see what you were photographing.  I'm sure there are more expensive cameras that don't have this problem, but the fact is that I got some excellent footage even when the display was not showing the target clearly; I just pointed in the general direction of the sea lion or shark or whatever.  Given all the reviews saying the camera failed very quickly, we took some disposable underwater cameras as backups, but fortunately we did not need them.

Reviews.Title: EasyShare Camera not bad at all.
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: I actually purchased this camera for my young son to use.  He is young enough to use one of those kiddie cameras, BUT he started out on my Canon EOS and really wanted to take quality photos.  This camera is sturdy, great for his small hands, an easy starter camera and his favorite color!  My only complaint is that the shutter action is a bit slow.  Must remember to hold that button down to get that shot.

Reviews.Title: good, but not stable
Reviews.Author: Dmitry
Reviews.Content: The camera makes rather good shots for its price, but its water-resistance is weak.I missed my best shots, because the camera was malfunctioning.First time, it refused to turn on after some time in water. I dried it out by opening all doors, and in two days it became ok (it woke up in one day - but was automatically turning off that day).The next time everything was vice versa - after some successful shootings the camera went wrong, and turning on/off was the only thing it could do - it didn't react to any other buttons. After the drying it became ok back.So, if you don't want to miss some shots, then you need to have several instances of this camera with you. I wish I had. :)

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: deb
Reviews.Content: item is just as pictured and exactly what I wanted to get for a teen's gift-he loves it. Super fast delivery and reasonable; thank you for a great transaction

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Grandma
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the ease my ten yr old picked it right up. The rubberized buttons make it more user-friendly, especially for kids, even if not for water. Even has zoom, which I doubted, with underwater gear. Haven't used it wet yet, but have no doubt Kodak will excel. More orange than red, but not important.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: LUIS ESQUIVEL Jr. "LUIS"
Reviews.Content: I went out to the beach for Vacations at Costa Rica, very nice camera to play below water, I couldn't zoom when recording video and regular (digital) zoom por pictures is poor. Nice toy, I am like at the end. funny to play with with your family.

Reviews.Title: Leaked after third use
Reviews.Author: Carmen Hammel
Reviews.Content: We weren't expecting a great camera, however we had hoped to get a model that at least didn't leak.  Gave this to our daughter for Xmas and after third use in water the lens became fogged and droplets of water were in it.  Not worth the hassle, even for its low price.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift before heading to Panama on a vacation.  Works pretty well- don't really have any complaints.  My friends and I had a blast diving around and taking pictures of fishes.  Now I will say that the picture quality doesn't compare to my DSLR camera- but i didn't expect it to.  It even took pretty nice pictures outside of water too!Definitely recommend if you want some fun water pics :)

Reviews.Title: great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Darius McMichaelson
Reviews.Content: purchased this camera for a cruise, and brought it along to several snorkeling excursions. the camera took wonderful crisp underwater shots, i was amazed at the clarity and quality - very few blurry shots. the screen is a bit hard to see while you are underwater, but as soon as you see the pictures they are great.i also used this camera outside of the water to replace the regular camera that broke, and the photos were just as good. i wish it would take videos but other than that it's a good quality camera and i highly reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: MomR
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my 10 year old son for Christmas.  It was easy to start using (you need to buy a memory card for it though).  Batteries, everything else included.  He has been using it non stop since then!  Can't wait to use it under water!

Reviews.Title: BOOOOO!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: MamaBeans
Reviews.Content: Kodak has always been my go-to for purse size travel point and shoot cameras, so imagine my surprise when this one ends up being a dud. Purchased for a weekend trip to Great Wolf Lodge, the camera did work just fine through the two day vacation, although good luck taking any kind of video inside, it has very poor auto ISO, all video shot indoors no matter the lighting is SUPER dark. It also is VERY SLOW to transition between functions. We took 192 pictures and 37 videos, the longest of which was 2 minutes 9 seconds. That was the first and last time this camera has functioned. After the initial use we have never gotten it to to work again. It randomly shuts off power or won't power on at all. Now, with brand new batteries, it'll power on just long enough to light up the view screen before shutting off, maybe a tenth of a second total. Nothing I can do about it. BOOOO Kodak. Unfortunately, after the initial weekend of use we hadn't tried to use it again till a month ago, which is beyond the return period ( and no, we didn't keep the packaging, so no returns possible anyway. )Spend your money elsewhere. This product is a dud.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: TRISHA
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera for a trip to Cancun and it worked really well for our needs. The underwater photos look great and it took a bit of trial with the videos but after two attempts I got familiar with the buttons and usage.Great bang for the buck. Used it daily underwater for a week and it worked every time.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: music721
Reviews.Content: grandsons loved their Kodak EasyShare Sport waterproof digital cameras. float strap insures that they can use these at lake, too.

Reviews.Title: I'm very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: This camera was great at first, it took pictures, and videos. Which my daughter, who I got it for was taking a video, first of all, she could not hear any sound what so ever from the speakers and about an hour later, whenever she tried to take a video it was say 'Low battery' and turn off.When she turned it back on, it would take pictures perfectly, but no video. I am very sad, as she had been wanting one of these for the longest time, and it turned out to be a camera that we hate.

Reviews.Title: Kodak waterproof 12 MP camera
Reviews.Author: J. Holloway
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on Amazon new because I have another Kodak camera that I like and the software is compatable.  The waterproof camera is inexpense and takes a good picture.  The size of the camera easily fits into a pocket.  I wish they made this camera with a rechargable battery.  Kodak EasyShare Sport C123 12 MP Waterproof Digital Camera (Blue) (New Model)

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: donnyfj
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera for the money! Great camera for outdoor pics, where you may encounter rain, dust, etc..., I use it for hiking, hunting, skiing, prety much all my outdoor adventures!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value waterproof digital camera
Reviews.Author: C. Lee
Reviews.Content: Great value waterproof digital camera.  Is it a high end waterproof digital camera?  No, but, it works and takes excellent pictures and videos under water, just try to make sure your close when taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Bad...bad..bad
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: Dont waste your time buying this camara...when i first ought it it seems good, i took it to the ocean and make water pictures plug it in my computer everything was good, but the 2nd day i use it it did not work anymore...you press the bottom to take a picture and it shout down...it doesn't work anymore, i am dissapointed with this item.

Reviews.Title: It does the job, but white balance is poor.
Reviews.Author: Royce
Reviews.Content: Pros: I bought this camera to take snorkeling in the Caribbean.  It does what it is supposed to.  Land pictures are very sharp and with good color.  Underwater pictures are no better than underwater throwaway film cameras, but digital is the way to go.  The ability to take video is a real plus.Cons: The LCD screen is not bright enough for me, even when set on the brightest setting.  A view-finder would really help.  The white-balance is great on land and poor underwater.  All my underwater photos and videos have a greenish tint and no vivid colors - even those taken in shallow water under direct sunlight.  The camera fogs over with changes in temperature and it takes a few minutes and a few pictures for this to clear up.  It is not the lens, because I kept it clear and clean - it must be internal.  This happened several times going from a cool room to a warm outdoors and once going from the ocean to the boat.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: A. Mayse
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend, she is the type of person who has trouble operating anything more complex than a can opener and she was using the post to facebook feature within a half hour of receiving it. The picture quality is excellent for the type and price range, and as I have already backhandedly commented on its ease of use nothing more need be said.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS. PLEASE!!!
Reviews.Author: Janelle
Reviews.Content: This has to be the worst camera that I have ever owned. I used it twice on a trip to Tobago in the Caribbean- by the third time it stopped working because water got in. I was foolish enough to buy this camera in the face of the horrible reviews it got. I definitely got what I paid for- cheap and no good. STAY AWAY!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for snorkeling!
Reviews.Author: S. Zeck
Reviews.Content: I took this camera on a week-long snorkeling trip.  It was in the water for hours at a time once or twice a day for five days.  During that time, it never leaked or malfunctioned, and took good pictures in and out of the water.A sample image from the camera:[...]The camera performed way beyond my expectations.  It was exactly what I was looking for: a camera to take pictures while snorkeling or in a pool.  I was not looking to replace my regular digital camera or to take pictures in deeper water.There were some negatives about it though:- There is no viewfinder.  The LCD screen displays the picture it is about to take.  This is common with smaller digital cameras, but the LCD screen is hard to see in bright light.  Underwater, through a foggy facemask, it's almost impossible to see.  On overcast days or in the evening it's not so bad.  The screen also dims itself after 10 seconds of inactivity to save power, but you can push any button to restore it.  There seems no way to disable power-saving.  I took pictures by holding the camera close to the thing I wanted a picture of and hoping for the best.- It used up the two AA batteries it came with in 1 day of shots.  Replacement batteries lasted several days though.  An SD card I got for the camera also became unwritable after about 80 shots.  I don't know whether the camera or the card was to blame.  A replacement SD card worked fine for hundreds more pictures.- Movies are pretty low-res (640x480).- The camera does not notify you of low battery (it just shuts itself off; this may be hard to tell underwater since the screen looks dark anyway) or a bad memory card (it acts like it's taking a picture but they won't be there when you review pictures).- It's a little slow to take a picture and reset for the next one (about 4 seconds).Some other notes:- It has an "h2o mode" to take underwater stills or movies.  Push the mode button, then select h2o to activate it.  Underwater mode adjusts the color balance a bit, but uses more power.  If the battery is nearly dead, taking pics in h2o mode will just cause the camera to shut off.  It might still be able to take pictures in normal mode though.  It will automatically revert to normal mode when you turn it off.- It might try to use the flash underwater.  That can reflect off all the little particles in the ocean and make it look like you took a picture in a snowstorm.  You can push the flash button to disable it.- There is a microphone for recording sound in movies, but no speaker for playing back the movie on the camera.- If you put in an SD card that was used by another digital camera, the C123 will let you browse and delete the other camera's pictures (some cameras only show you their own).

Reviews.Title: Camera leaked... lost my pics & SD Card
Reviews.Author: Ken in CT
Reviews.Content: I'm rather disappointed in the product which had many positive reviews and seemed promising for the price.  I bought this camera to take snorkeling pictures during my recent trip to Aruba.  I used it initially in the swimming pool at the resort to see how the pictures would turn out... Pictures turned out ok because I didn't fully submerge the camera for more than 10 seconds at a time.Next day, I used it in salt-water snorkeling, but submerging it not more than 4 feet.  It was difficult to see the view screen while underwater, so I just clicked away.  Within less than 5 minutes, water (and some sand) had apparently seeped into the camera rendering it unusable.  It must have also shorted out my 4 gb SD card.  So now, I'm without a working camera nor pictures. Kodak is unclear what is covered since this "waterproof" camera was exposed to liquid.I won't be buying a Kodak camera anytime soon.

Reviews.Title: is not working after 3-4months
Reviews.Author: Mm
Reviews.Content: I bought it 3-4 months ago. Used it with care and didn't turn it on for the oast months. It didn't turn on today!  I am not happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: I great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Danelle A Kirschling
Reviews.Content: I went on a vacation to Hawaii and wanted to be able to take photos underwater. This was by far the least expensive underwater camera available. It worked well and the photos turned out great. I used it over the entire vacation for all my photo taking. It takes AA batteries which was convenient on vacation but I usually prefer a rechargeable camera-now I just use it with rechargeable AA's. My only complaint is that it is a bit slower than my other point-and-shoot. I just started to press the shutter again if I was trying to take action shots, rather than waiting for the screen to reload and that helped. Considering the price and performance I would buy it again and recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Annette
Reviews.Content: I was excited about this camera but quickly disappointed, i purchased this camera for my trip to Dominican Republic and after the second day in the water it went dead, i put new batteries, left if overnight to see if it dried insided but unfortunately it didn't worked for the rest of my trip.  I was able to save the videos and pics that were inside the SD card and the images were good, but for the money i would purchased a portable Kodak waterproof camera and not feel disappointed i read the reviews and it sounded good.  So if you purchase this camera just have a back up plan because it probably go blank if used for a long time under water. I also have to add the camera blue color was coming off and turning white.

Reviews.Title: Best $60 camera!
Reviews.Author: Tonggi
Reviews.Content: [...]That sums up the usage of my camera.  Took it sailing for 7 days, 3 days of land travel, tons of underwater footage and it came out greatNo leaks, no issues.  Just high battery consumption of doubl a batteries.All pictures in video are in low res cause of vides but you can see the quality in pictures as well as vid.  I will be taking this with me every sunny trip I go on!Watch till the 12-13 min mark to see all pictures.

Reviews.Title: kodak easy share camera
Reviews.Author: mountaingirl
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that was light weight and waterproof. This camera is both. I was plesantly  surprised by the excellent quality of the pictures. I am glad I purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: NICE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: JUAN
Reviews.Content: IT'S A VERY GOOD CAMERA, EVEN UNDER SEA, GREATS PHOTOS AND VIDEOS AND THE FLOAT STRAP, MAKE THAT THE CAMERA REALLY FLOAT.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare Spsort Camera
Reviews.Author: S. King "music lover"
Reviews.Content: The only difficulty I had with this order was the camera was advertised as being red when it really is orange.  My grandson can hardly wait to go to the pool to try the underwater feature.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: CWK
Reviews.Content: We haven't water tested this camera but since it was bought primarily to take out fishing I'm sure it'll see some wet testing soon.  This camera really has a lot of nice features and a big screen for such a small camera.  We've found ourselves taking this with us more than our other digital camera because it is so compact and it feels sturdy.  We were pleasantly surprised by the flash on this camera during a recent Halloween party when taking pictures inside a very dark home and the pictures showed every detail and lit up the entire room.  I'm not sure about battery life since the batteries that came with the camera didn't last for very long at all, but since we've changed them out the new batteries already appear to be lasting longer.

Reviews.Title: Excelente !!!
Reviews.Author: Fredriksso Torres
Reviews.Content: Excelente Camara, excelentes funciones. Apta especialmente para tomar fotos bajo el agua !!! Camara muy funcional y práctica bajo el agua. No es recomendada como camara convencional.

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA, GOOD PRICE
Reviews.Author: CINDI
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS FOR A VACATION IN FLORIDA.  NOT ONLY WAS IT A GREAT PRICE BUT IT TOOK EXCELLENT PICTURES.  THE SCREEN IS BIG ENOUGH WHERE YOU CAN SEE WHAT YOU ARE LOOKING AT AND THE ZOOM IS A LOT FARTHER THAN EXPECTED.

Reviews.Title: Love this camara
Reviews.Author: lenaland01
Reviews.Content: I like this little camara very much.  Truthfully I bought it to use while snorkling on vacation.  Our excursion was cancelled due to wheather conditions.  Although I didn't use the camara underwater I would recommend purchasing this camara just for general picture taking.  It is very easy to use, pictures come out great, very compact and inexpensive.  I don't have to worry about taking pictures in the snow and the rain or taking it out on our boat.  Because of the inexpensive price I feel I can take chances that I wouldn't with a more expensive model.  The batteries are not chargable but they seem to last a good amount of time.  The only reason I didn't give a 5 star review is there is no automatic shut off.  So far I have remembered to shut the camara off quickly after each use.  Very, very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: kodak
Reviews.Author: soccermom
Reviews.Content: The camera is lightweight. The pictures are ok.  Its not a bad camera.  It does the job if you're not wanting anything fancy.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: SuzQ1017 "Mom of Reader"
Reviews.Content: Didn't want to take my big expensive slr on a kayaking trip so I bought this one.  No view finder and even with the cloudy skies I couldn't see the display to really know what I was shooting.  Wish I would have taken the chance and taken a different camera I also had which was moderately expensive.  So the shots I have are not very good.

Reviews.Title: EXELENTE CAMARA
Reviews.Author: VICTOR VENEZUELA
Reviews.Content: EXELENTE PRODUCTO, LA CAMARA QUE COMPRE,LLEGO A TIEMPO Y EN PERFECTO ESTADO NUEVO.LO RECOMIENDO SIN EQUIVOCOS EL EQUIPO Y EL VENDEDOR. SIN PROBLEMAS DE ENTREGA Y SIN DEFECTOS EL ARTICULO QUE COMPRE.LA CAMARA SACA MUY BUENOS VIDEOS Y FOTOS BAJO EL AGUA

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: tm
Reviews.Content: Camera has alot of settings for different scenery. Has nice clear pictures. And when im fishing for my river monsters I dont have to worry about getting it wet. Price is great also. Wont find a better camera for a better price.

Reviews.Title: Do not by this item if you plan on taking it in the water.
Reviews.Author: Sheather
Reviews.Content: The camera broke after less than an hour of snorkeling.  I only had it one foot under the surface at the most.  This product is worthless, but I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: great underwater fun
Reviews.Author: mom3girls
Reviews.Content: Our ten-year-old daughter bought this with her Christmas and birthday money so she could take pictures in the swimming pool. The camera is very durable and aesthetically pleasing as well. The pictures have turned out very well. Lots of fun! Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof but picture quality isn't great
Reviews.Author: Erin Krebs
Reviews.Content: While this camera is waterproof, the picture quality is poor.  Trying to blow up a picture larger than 8 x 10 (and even some 8 x 10) there is very low pixel quality.  I honestly wish I had not purchased this camera.  I used it on several kayaking trips and out of the 80+ pictures I took I wasn't happy with any of them so I switched back to my Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: COWHDEN
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for my wife, who really doesn't like to take pictures.  Great camera and very easy for her to use.  She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a trip to Bora Bora.  I was pleasantly surprised at how good the pictures were and how well it held up under water.  I used it for several hours under water while snorkeling and the pictures came out great!  Not the best zoom in the world and I would still want my regular camera for anything non-water related, but overall a great inexpensive purchase for taking pictures at the beach, snorkeling or any other water related activities.

Reviews.Title: pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: AngieB
Reviews.Content: My husband fishes and kayaks a lot so I thought a waterproof camera would be a good birthday present. He is very hard to buy for but I read the reviews and decided to give this one a shot. I have to admit I was a little leery since the price was so low. He loves it! The pictures are great (inside pictures as well). He now uses this camera over our more expensive camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: Raquel Castro R "Raquel Castro"
Reviews.Content: it take great underwater pictures!!!!with color, excellent videos excellet resolution...we like it very much  we used it on the ocean to do snorkling and it wroked great!after a while it gets blurred a little bit and you have to wait!

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare Sport C123
Reviews.Author: David M. Schmitt
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for an underwater camera for snorkeling.  Takes great still and video.  Easy to use.  Used on Hawaiian vacation with great results.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: A. Person "MG"
Reviews.Content: Great little waterproof camera.  Fairly light weight.  My only complaint is that there is no cover for the lens.  I wouldn't feel the need for a case if the lens was covered when I throw it in my bag.  I hate dirty lenses and certainly don't want it scratched. I prefer not to use bulky cases, but in this circumstance, I guess I'll have to.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera and amazing quality for the price. I purchased this specifically for my Caribbean cruise because it is water proof. I accidently dropped it while sitting at 9 meters depth. The captain put on his gear and dived after it. The red color made it easy to find and it never adversely affected my camera. It takes great photos and videos, in the water and out. It is easy to change settings quickly even while snorkeling. Highly recommend buying the floating strap as it will sink quickly without it, and this camera is worth holding on to.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: J. Acuna
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take to a waterpark. It takes great underwater pics. The regular ("above water") pictures are really good. The video is decent, though nothing to brag about. The outside design is nice. Also, a lot of the reviews talk about the water seaping in, I didn't have this problem. I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Quality
Reviews.Author: Happy Parent
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and really was not sure what to expect.  At first I had issues with the memory card but then realized I had not formatted it yet.  All is good now and I love the sharing to Facebook.  It is really easy to use and great price.  I wanted a Nikon Coopix and got something better and WAY cheaper and just as great with pics.

Reviews.Title: Testing in Hot tub.
Reviews.Author: Timothy A. Switzer "Tim"
Reviews.Content: This item was tested in our hot tub for about an hour.  I will be using in on our vacation and it did not leak and took pretty good photos\videos in our hot tub.  When I am in the Caribbean next month will let you know if it survives.  I have a 4 year old doing the durability testing.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: TOm
Reviews.Content: Had a Kodak compact camera years and years ago in the age of film so thats what first made me notice this camera. Second was the price. i bought it with a floating strap which is now available as a bundle and its worth the money.I use it extensively for seakayaking and on a recent holiday in Croatia it outperformed and indeed outlasted cameras costing four times the price. One was a camera in a waterproof case. The case leaked and the camera was totalled. The floating strap allowed it to be tossed from kayak to kayak picked up out of the sea and used by others. That created quite a stir in the group!The underwater video and picture produced good results.Downsides are poor battery life, hard to see lcd screen and occasional slowness in taking photos, but for the money its a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot!
Reviews.Author: wrichter
Reviews.Content: I picked this up shortly before our trip to the Caribbean with the hopes of capturing some underwater pictures of the tropical fish and reefs.  This camera exceeded my every expectation.  It took great pictures under and over the water, movies too!  My wife and I had a blast snorkeling with camera in tow taking pictures of every fish we could find.  We used it extensively in the ocean and didn't notice any water getting through to the screen in the back or anywhere else it should be.  The pictures were crisp and colorful and it took comparable outdoor pictures to what I'm used to with my regular point and shoot.  Best $70 I've spent in a while!

Reviews.Title: New to digital age
Reviews.Author: Mugsy33
Reviews.Content: I'm 38 yr old male.  I've hunted all my life and love outdoor activities. In USMC for six years.  I was looking for a small rugged camera that would handle hunting trips and family outings.  It's still new and not been put throught the tests of time but I am extremely happy with the picture  quality for the $$$$.  It is easy to use and with a very easy setup, the 'share button' is ready to go.  That feature is great.  Just by tagging a few destinations while reviewing you pics, your computer will automatically send your pics to email, social sites, photo shops, etc.  Hopefully the waterproof feature lives up to it's claims.  Judging by the design of the camera and the battery compartment, I'm pretty confident it will be waterproof.

Reviews.Title: Just a mediocre pic quality and poor under the water(sea)
Reviews.Author: HL "Laughter brings happiness"
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I expected. But, the pictures posted here on amazon.com are quite superior to what you will usually get. That is why I am posting my own test pics to give some comparisons.I purchased this for my outdoor activities, right before the first trip to Grand Canyon for my novice companion. from day 1, I knew the picture quality was below average, not good enough for my grand trip. I decided to stop using it. And, when I returned, I brought it out to the beach(October heat wave, yay~!)near where I live.You will see the result of it. I cropped one or two pics, but, I did not use photoshop  and you can see the candid images I took.____________1. Location - The beach scene is done around 12-3pm on Sunny October daytime.-Underwater pics are not impressive and most of the time, out of focus, and these pics are slightly better ones.-Whenever you switch 'on' the camera, the setting goes back to 'AUTO" mode, and, the difference of the 'Auto' and 'Vivid' are shown(very yellow-tinted with Vivid, on the sandy hill background)____________Although I don't show it here, the 'self-portraight pics' with flash light(Strong sun-shadow contrast) tend to be the best feature of C123 as the pic results are almost as good as the other one with manual flashlight settings.And, the pics taken from the car, with 40+m/h speed, was decent.____________2. The Video mode,You can also see that the digital zoom is real joke and you will hear my unsuccessful zoom out click attempt, just like woodpeckers. And, the sun gets in the lens and the image is simply dull.3. location - Boat docking area, Butterfly, and plant closeup scenes are taken from my walk, around 4-5:30pm, on the following day in October, 2011.-Although the good composition and the nice objects, Sunset make the images look rich often, as you can see, it often darkens the image, and less saturated color, and, most of the time, it is not true to your eyes greatly.4. Close-ups and evening scenes are no,no.And, you should expect greatly compromised with the result if you use it to take picture for the ordinary day life. Exposure is inconsistent. And, I could not get the result that I could get from other higher-end cameras.I instantly noticed the cheap price means, their processor is probably from mid- to late- 1990s. My first digital camera of 1.2mega pixel has the similar quality then.5. The 'blue metalic paint' peels off from the first beach day and the body is white plastic underneath it.____________In conclusion,With its price under $70, I can't be complaining as I can explore more of the 'in the water,' situations- not under the water, really- i get the different angles of the distant landscape, walking into the Sea, or braving heavy rain storm seasons-For Now.This Kodak C123 will be a great toy for the young kids or a decent expansive option for unusual weather situation.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: sagebrushsue
Reviews.Content: this is a great little camera.  I received it very fast after ordering and was glad because I was going camping that next weekend in Oak Creek Canyon.  Got some great shots.  I did not realize it was a waterproof camera, but I am glad because I have been known to drop, or fall into water.

Reviews.Title: Great Waterproof camera!
Reviews.Author: Karin Jarmusz
Reviews.Content: I was pleasently surprised with the quality of pictures.Especially the pictures that were taken UNDER water.Great buy for a great little camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera for my 4 year old
Reviews.Author: Stephanie O
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on our trip to Disney to let my son take pictures. For the price it was wonderful! He loved getting his own camera and the fact that he could drop it and take it in the water was priceless. I even used it to take pictures and it was so much better then my own camera. I haven't printed the pictures from it yet however from what I see on the camera they look fine. we had so much fun taking the camera to Sea World and the water park. We took so many pictures that we would not have been able to take otherwise. I highley reccomend this camera if you have a son or daughter that likes to take pictures and still doesn't get the concept that these are expensive items that can break. My son dropped it a bunch of times and it still works like the day we got it. It was one of the best investments I have made for him. Beats all those other true kids cameras that take horrible pictures and cost the same. Good job Kodak!

Reviews.Title: A good camera for your travel bag
Reviews.Author: Matt R
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kodak EasyShare Sport for a weekend kayaking/camping trip in Catalina. The camera is easy to use. The buttons are simple to use when switching from normal camera features to the H20 underwater photo and video functions. After taking about 160 photos and one underwater water video, I downloaded the pix to iPhoto. Overall the pictures were of good quality (sharp, clean, and crisp). However, the quality was poor when using zoom (no better than using a cell phone zoom - the image became pixelated). The underwater photos were OK--just as good or better than a traditional underwater disposable camera. The video quality was also OK when recording underwater and it also captured the sound. The camera was dropped twice with no problems noted. For a fairly cheap camera that can handle the water, its worth having in your travel bag. Overall, its a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Good bargain!
Reviews.Author: compu...what?
Reviews.Content: Very nice product, arrived very quickly.  I did not realize it does not have a rechargable battery, but still I am very satisfied with the camera.  It is a nice orangey-red color, just like the picture shows.  It takes great quality pictures, and has a nice flash.  I am very satisfied with the product quality, at a low price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: D. Noe "nokidding"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and this camera was the favorite. I can see why! Easy to use, very waterproof, durable with great picture quality and at a decent price. I've been using the camera with 2 small kids underwater in Hawaii for a month and so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Gable
Reviews.Content: Love this digital camera! Small, lightwt. Got it for my first trip to Hawaii! Couldn't wait to try it 'underwater' so filled the sink up and tried it, no problems! Love that it's a regular digital camera and for underwater! Can't wait to take it snorkeling!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money and easy to operate
Reviews.Author: Dwight L. Davis
Reviews.Content: We purchased the camera to take some photos/videos while snorkeling in Kona.  Another couple who visits there to snorkel for over 25 years noticed our camera and asked how we liked it as they had purchased one right before their latest trip.  Both of us were quite happy with the quality of the pictures and the simplicity of the camera.  The videos and photos of the fish and turtles came out well especially the video of a green turtle swimming.  We had no issues with leakage.  It was difficult seeing exactly what you were photographing due to the sun and the fact we were near the surface.  However in looking at our pictures that did not seem to hamper us.  I would buy a neck strap instead of a hand strap which comes with it if you are swimming as it frees your hands. I would definitely purchase it again.  I have no idea how durable it will be over time but as of now it is a wonderful buy which will keep giving back

Reviews.Title: Kodak waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Book Lover
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for our trip to the Carribean which unfortunately was cancelled due to the tropical storms - we have rescheduled for Nov and I hope to honestly be able to do a review at this time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Cindy Sgroi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for snorkeling adventures while I was on a cruise.  It was a great little camera and worked very well.  I did however use duct tape over the battery compartment due to previous reviews about leaking.  My sister bought the same camera and did not use the tape and she had no trouble either.  We were both in and out of the water many times over the length of the cruise and neither one of us had any issues. The pictures were great.  I can't wait to use it again.

Reviews.Title: good camers for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ieri Nature Adv
Reviews.Content: not a bad camera for the price. i've used it underwater and got some good shots over the reef.once you have the correct settings the land pictures are fine too. i recommend this camera for anyone on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Ruined after first use
Reviews.Author: Melc210
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our trip to Puerto Rico and decided to try it out in the hotel pool before we took it to our snorkeling/kayaking trip. The pool pictures came out great but once I took the camera to the room to upload them I realized water had leaked into the camera and ruined it. The buttons stopped working and we did not get to use it for the rest of our trip. I returned it immediately to Amazon and they refunded promptly. Wish it worked better.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price.
Reviews.Author: C. Bassett "Oraso"
Reviews.Content: Pros: Its water proof to 10ft and has a strong 12mp sensor to take pictures with. Somewhat shock resistant however i would not recommend testing this.  The videos look crisp and clear even when in dark areas, haven't tried in near pitch black yet.  There are the basic functions integrated into the firmware but nothing that truly impresses.Cons: No optical zoom although not many underwater cameras can have it. This would have been a nice feature which brings me to the second down side to not having optical zoom the focus is fixed so anything closer than 3ft looks blurry and "unfocused."  I like lithium ion batteries however this uses AAs not really a con since they are so plentyful but they never seem to last as long even when using hi-cap rechargables.Other: Overall the price to performance ratio is great. You get a wonderfully funtional camera for a small price tag. One thing that i must comment on is Kodak needs to hirer better talent at programming their cameras firmware, while functional it feels like a bearly passing graduate slapped it together overnight and called it good.  So go get you one and have some FUN!

Reviews.Title: Disapointing and erratic picture quality
Reviews.Author: Chris W "dougalbutler"
Reviews.Content: I had read a review of this product on a blog and just trashed an underwater Olympus camera while snorkeling in Hawaii and though that I would give this one a shot.We took hundreds of pictures in Scotland and the picture quality was horrible.  I have a shaky hand and habitually take multiple shots of each picture to make sure that one is in focus.  The the colors on two pictures taken seconds apart displayed significant color differences.  Some pictures were clear with good contrast and color, but most were either grainy, washed out, or had poor color quality.We went snorkeling in Australia and used this camera first expecting it to fail miserably and throw it away. It was truly waterproof and I saw no evidence of moisture inside the camera after several days of use and opening and closing the battery compartment. 5 stars on waterproofness.  Picture quality was better than above water but was still hit or miss.  It didn't help that the screen brightness was too dim to accurately frame the pictures and I ended up just pointing and shooting in the general direction of the intended picture.  I also noticed that the shutter button sometimes wouldn't work if I swam a meter or two below the surface.I would spend the money on a better camera and ended up buying a Canon PowerShot S95 for above water use which is a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Kodak sport Camera
Reviews.Author: Lynn Bailey
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera, easy to operate and float is great for when kayaking. Takes good photos as well.

Reviews.Title: Fun for underwater adventures!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this on a last minute whim solely for underwater use on a snorkeling trip. I didn't want to risk my feature-full higher end camera in a case to use in the water, on sandy beaches, rain etc as I've lost one that way before. After reading reviews and viewing customer images I bought the camera thinking that if it died one or two days in for this price I wouldn't be too put out. I was pleasantly surprised that it held up to all my abuse! I had no trouble getting it up and running and used it to take hundreds of photos and lots of video keeping it submerged in the ocean for hours at a time. I wasn't particularly careful with it, I knocked it about on boats, dropped it, got sand all over it, and I had absolutely no trouble.I would not use this as my main camera, as it lacks features/photo quality I desire. There is no zoom, and the flash seems weak. Kodak is not a brand I would regularly buy for a camera. As I said, this was only used on beaches and in the water; to supplement my normal vacation photos. Ultimately I had tons of fun with this camera.The menus are easy to use, and I could see them underwater well enough to switch between the shooting modes to use the video feature. Besides the lack of an optical zoom, the other drawback I would have to mention is the super slow processing time. I had a fast card in it, but the camera takes forever to process a photo. Don't expect to be able to shoot multiple shots close together. If there was a particular frame I was looking for I had to wait and shoot quickly, knowing I wouldn't be able to get in another for a while. Batteries lasted a long time - much longer than I had expected.If you're not serious enough about underwater photography to invest nearly $200 and want something to take fun photos with this is a wonderful camera, and priced right.

Reviews.Title: good camera but had some problems with the paint
Reviews.Author: feg
Reviews.Content: I bough this camera for my son, the blue one, he likes a lot, but right out of the box and put batteries the paint of the bottom began to fall off.

Reviews.Title: Fun Camera
Reviews.Author: ClarissaDay
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my trip to Hawaii. Takes great underwater pictures! Took some great pictures of fish and even a sea turtle! It's so simple to use and fits right in my pocket. It's perfect for e because I spill a lot of drinks and such. Great choice!!

Reviews.Title: underwater camera
Reviews.Author: catann
Reviews.Content: sept 2011:  This camera fits well in my hand and the float is extra protection.  Took clear pictures in a stream I was in.  April 2012 now and I used the camera while snorkling.  Unfortunately, some water must have gotten into the lense because my pictures have bubbles on the top of my pictures.  Really like the camera but disappointed in it not being completely waterproof. Otherwise the pictures would have been good.

Reviews.Title: camera works now
Reviews.Author: bob fisher "movie buff"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my daughter in Fla. It sprung a leak but the replacement came easily and swiftly and the new oneappears to work properly and well.

Reviews.Title: KODAK EASYSHARE DELIVERS!
Reviews.Author: for the price I had to pay compared to the ot...
Reviews.Content: bought this as a gift to my 13-year old nephew who lives in an island in the Pacific. since their town has periodically been deluged with tropical storms and massive flooding, it serves the purpose well as he can take pics without worrying the cam could get wet and damaged (waterproof yes!). an added feature is that he can download it quick to the social networks and share it with his family, friends and relatives all around the world. this little cam kicks ass!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not very waterproof
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Used this camera in the rain and splashing around on the beach.  Loved it. Then took it snorkling in Hawaii.  It was not waterproof.  Both camera and SD card were ruined. Too bad.  Other than that, it was a great camera for the price.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Best for the price
Reviews.Author: RobnNash
Reviews.Content: This was an great inexpensive digital camera compared to the others with underwater capability. I got great pictures from the summit of Haleakala to underwater off the reefs on the island of Maui. I also took 2 short videos which had much better quality than I expected. The LCD screen can be hard to see clearly in direct sunlight, but I still managed to take some awesome photos.I'm not a professional, so I might be less particular about it being fixed focus and only digital zoom. I just know that I am completely pleased with how well it held up on vacation above and below the water.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price....
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I didn't get to use this camera at the water park like I had intended- however- it came in handy for Tropical Storm Lee. I took great pics and video of us having fun in the rain!

Reviews.Title: Water Damage
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This item got water in it after being a foot down in the pool. I took 3 pictures and the next day it was starting to rust.

Reviews.Title: Camera needs better instruction manual
Reviews.Author: Thomas McDonnell
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera knowing we were taking a trip to Niagara Falls.  We got great pictures while on the Maid of the Mist and The Cave of the Winds tour.  The only downside was trying to figure out how to use the camera.  The instruction manual that came with it was useless.  A DVD would be very helpful with instructions on how to take pictures at night, during sporting events, etc.  I had to play around with the buttons on the camera to figure out how to do these things.  Also, make sure there isn't water on the lens as you're taking pictures.  It will still take the picture but there will be a water droplet obscuring your picture.  The easy fix for that is to make sure you shake the camera off before you take your picture.Overall, I would recommend this camera.  The video quality is okay but nothing to write home about and if you don't have an SD card in the camera, it takes up most of the memory.

Reviews.Title: The Best underwater digital camera
Reviews.Author: philo
Reviews.Content: What a great buy this camera is.  It not only works underwater, but I bought it for a mud run and even after it was full of mud, it worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: great lake camera
Reviews.Author: Wade Osborne "Wade Osborne"
Reviews.Content: This little camera works great. We bought it for use at the lake and now use it for everyday picture taking.

Reviews.Title: This is a great little camera
Reviews.Author: L. Freitag "Linda F"
Reviews.Content: My daughter and son-in-law bought one of these camera's and then after seeing their's, I bought one myself.  It takes great pictures, even under water. It's perfect and just the right size to fit in my purse or travel bag.

Reviews.Title: Neat sports camera
Reviews.Author: Gianniidol
Reviews.Content: Good sports camera with a low price but good features, especially being waterproof and for  quality underwater pixs. Item was delivered just the day prior to my going on vacation to the beach and it came very handy around the shore and swimming pools. Only drawbacks are limited zoom capability and no sound while reviewing videos from the camera, but still a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare Sport C123 Camera
Reviews.Author: Joanna High "MamaJo"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera because I wanted a small dependable camera that would fit in pocket or purse.  I have owned four other Kodak cameras and loved them all, that is why I specifically chose Kodak.  This camera is very poor quality.  Had a hard time figuring out how to open the battery/memory card compartment.  When I did get it open, I tried a couple of test photos.  The quality was terrible. I decided to return the camera and could not get the batteries out.  I guess you get what you pay for, but I expected more from Kodak.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof Camera
Reviews.Author: TiffTerry
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great for your water events.  I love taking it to the water parks, beach and pool.  The pictures come out great!  It really beats buying a disposable camera and paying to have them developed.  For the price you pay it's worth the investment.  I really only use this camera for water events.  I have another to use for everything else.

Reviews.Title: Great water camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: C. Nocon "cynocaz"
Reviews.Content: I took several pictures at the beach and in the pool (both in the water) and never worried about it getting wet! I did not expect the pictures to come out so crisp and vibrant from an inexpensive water camera! I recommend leaving the setting to regular when taking under water pool pictures; otherwise, it gives a blurry/greenish color when set to "H2O". The telescoping feature has a slow response time.  I am very happy with this purchase.  I only wish I bought it earlier when I went rafting down Salmon River.

Reviews.Title: May work good as a camera in a splash park, but not for the pool or beach
Reviews.Author: Shanner
Reviews.Content: I just got back from a Disney cruise with my family and was excited to get this camera for the trip. However, in the first 30 mins in the kids pool it fogged up. I tried to take a few under water photos in 3 feet of water and it leaked water into both the screen and lens. Another 30 mins later it stopped working, lucky for us I did take my back canon to capture the rest of the vacation. I returned it today.

Reviews.Title: It's an okay camera.
Reviews.Author: carramunds
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera after a friend of mine had used a waterproof camera at a waterpark. He had a Fugi camera, and that's what I should have gone with. I did tote this camera all day on my wrist in and out of the water on the beach and it worked well, though, by the end of the day it was acting a little funny...not wanting to turn on and stay on, and it wasn't the batteries. Messed with it a little bit by turning it on multiple times and it finally worked normal again. Picture quality is okay for close up, but anything past 20 feet is grainy. I've owned Kodak cameras exclusively for the past several years and have always thought the picture quality was great...so I'm not as impressed with this model.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: 1125PZ
Reviews.Content: GOOD LITTLE CAMERA, GREAT PICTURES IN AND OUT OF THE WATER ,NO PROBLEMS !!! EASY TO USE !!GREAT FOR THE PRICE

Reviews.Title: Good for Travel
Reviews.Author: Nehema
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my student exchange in Taiwan. I knew I'd be scuba diving, snorkeling, hiking, and basically putting this little camera through hell for ten months. So far, it has stood up to the test. I have taken it underwater and my only problem with it was that it picked up odd spots in the water that looked like bokeh, but that may have been the water {it was a pool}. I've dropped it a few times onto hard floors and there's nothing wrong with it. My only annoyance with it is that as soon as it gets even slightly dark-say, five or six o'clock-you have to switch it to night shot. The pictures it takes on the auto setting come out to dark, and the pictures on night shot come out way too light until it's truly dark. The image quality also isn't as high as I would like-I'm an amateur photographer-but that's not what I bought this camera for.Overall, a sturdy little camera that's good for travel.

Reviews.Title: great thing for vacations
Reviews.Author: WHills
Reviews.Content: I gave it to a family heading to the beach for vacation.  The underwater (swimming pool at the beach house) pictures they took were amazing.I was impressed with the rubber gasketing of the batteries and SD card.  Also, glad that it was just AA batteries and not a complicated charging system.My quick look at it before I gave it away, suggested that the photo controls were mostly familiar, without having to do additional study.

Reviews.Title: Good water proofing, but very difficult to handle
Reviews.Author: ZW312
Reviews.Content: It is cheap and good quality for taking pictures/videos under water. However, it is very difficult to open the cover to insert memory card or connect USB cable to transfer the pictures or videos. It took me a long time to open the cover to insert the memory card. Again took a long time to open and put USB cable for transferring the pictures to my PC. I have never have a camera like this.

Reviews.Title: A fair camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Carl Hitt "image quest carl"
Reviews.Content: This is not a great camera, but it is an okay camera for the price. I bought it because it is waterproof and will float with the flotation cuff which kept me from losing it the first time I took it out on the water. The pictures are not always in focus nor are they always the correct exposure, but in general, it's a fair camera for just pointing and shooting. If I had it all to do over, I might shop around a little more to see if there is something better on the market.

Reviews.Title: execellent
Reviews.Author: Tacy Flora
Reviews.Content: Underwater pictures come out so cool. I do have one little problem.. about 6 or so pictures came out with a "foggy" spot. Other than that the rest of the 200 pix came out great! as far as sound, I did not fig out how to get it yet...

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: sissyfromcab
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for our upcoming cruise, but used it over the holiday weekend at the beach.  It takes great pictures, though the screen is hard to see in bright sunlight.  Since it's digital, I didn't worry too much about just snapping away and deleting any that didn't turn out later.  Great camera for the price - highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: erinandal
Reviews.Content: For the price - you get a great camera.  The still shot resolutions aren't the best, but the fact you can take it into the water makes it worth the money and less quality in picture. I took the camera to the Blizzard Beach Waterpark in Disney and it did great. I kept it in my swim trunk pocket and had no problem with it.  I took pictures everywhere in the park and didn't have to worry about it getting wet.

Reviews.Title: Kodak C123 Sport 12 MP
Reviews.Author: Francis
Reviews.Content: just testing the camera and seems pretty good but when you are on the outside with the sun very bright, very difficult to see the image on the screen in terms of safety under water I can tell you if it works and that's good important, until now I am very happy with my camera, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money!
Reviews.Author: AngelWings "angelwingsx1999"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera just days before I was scheduled to leave on a cruise. I picked two day shipping and it was here the next day. I'm so happy I did! The pictures came out great! We took it snorkeling in the caribbean and got beautiful pictures of turtles, fish and stingrays.  We took over a 100 photos in an hour! Much better than purchasing a standard underwater film camera and guessing if your picture came out okay.The shutter time from picture to picture is a little slow but for the money, don't expect the camera to be a power house.I'm really happy with this purchase and if you are on the fence about it, take the chance and buy it.It also only has a digital zoom as others have mentioned so it could make some pictures grainy if you are really trying to zoom in.This camera also runs on AA batteries so be sure to bring extras. I used it quite a bit during the day and it only drained to half the battery life which I thought was decent for the amount I was using it.

Reviews.Title: really nice!
Reviews.Author: Samu
Reviews.Content: The camera worked really well so far! we used it during our holiday in florida. In aquatica water park as well as in Discovery cove, we had so great video and pictures underwater!The camera is fairly good even for "normal" use! I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: kodak easy share sport
Reviews.Author: gebemac
Reviews.Content: Actually it is quite attractive and fits nicely in my handbag. It is easy to use, however I had a problem with the opening for inserting the batteries.I am having fun as a first timer using the camera. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!
Reviews.Author: John Adams "Founding Father"
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these cameras as birthday presents for our granddaughters.  Since we were in Hawaii it seemed a natural fit to have a waterproof camera!  The picture quality is very good, sharp and clear.  Tried a few underwater pictures and the girls loved the outcome!  Fun to be able to do that!  As I ruined my very nice camera trying to take a picture while in the water, I've decided that we need one of these, also, for our next trip.  The price is just right!! These were real winners for birthday presents!  And Grandma wants one too!

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Epic_Earth "if it were easy everyone would do it"
Reviews.Content: What can I say it's a camera for $50 and waterproof too. I got it for my 4 year old and he loves it. The only drawback is 1) the zoom is nonexistent and 2) it seems to go through 2aa batteries very quickly. (I a a pro DSLR and a prosumer DSLR.both of which out perform by wat of battery life.

Reviews.Title: Leaked the very first time!
Reviews.Author: Boulder Buyer
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to use on our trip to the Galapagos.  It leaked within 2 minutes of being in the water.  What a disappointment!  I do not recommend this camera.  Fork out a little more money and get a decent camera.

Reviews.Title: LOST ALL MY PHOTOS!
Reviews.Author: nc
Reviews.Content: I live in northern california and my twin sister just moved to long beach, I visit her a lot and I went down yesterday and when me, my boyfriend, my sister, and friend jessica went to the beach....I took it in the water! I had many priceless pictures that I couldn't wait to put facebook and off course the camera leaked onto my memory card making it impossible for me to get my pictures....it leaked and IT WAS MY FIRST TIME USING IT! I'm so mad...is there any way I can get these photo's like if I take them somewhere? if anyone knows contact me?  oh and the camera wont turn on now either..I'm out $80 bucks, with a broken camera, no pictures...NOT WORTH IT. I'm a college student, I have to be careful of how much and what I spend, lost money on this...

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Rambo
Reviews.Content: We lost our Nikon Coolpix camera on a recent trip and were heading out on another one.  With a chance that we might get it back, I didn't want to spent a lot of coin on a replacement but I wanted something that was waterproof.  This camera not only works as well as our Nikon, it works better.  The single focus lens means we don't need to wait for the camera to find its subject, focus on it and then take the picture.  The Kodak is truly point and shoot.  Since the Coolpix wasn't waterproof, I had to purchase one of those water tight sacks for taking underwater pics.  It was nearly impossible to use because you couldn't see the LCD thru the clear plastic.  The Kodak has no such problems.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: cess
Reviews.Content: Its great for a underwater camera that water proof, especially for the price of it. It doesn't take the greatest 12 megapixel pictures which is to be expected since it was so cheap. I took it when I jumping in waterfalls sometimes the video would cut out with high action when I went to replay it not during the filming. However for the price what do you expect I'm satisfied because I didn't spend that much...and if I lost it in the falls I wouldn't have been that upset, and I was able to take it into the falls to get some great shots!

Reviews.Title: Great job!
Reviews.Author: smg
Reviews.Content: I am going on a cruise in March and was looking for a waterproof camera.  I found this one and thought what the heck.  It was priced cheap enough that if it didnt work I wouldn't be out too much money. I let the kids play around with it at the pool last night and the pictures came out great.  I was very impressed with the durability of the camera, the picture quality and how waterproof the camera was. Some of the pictures did have the water spots (image) on them but for the price it is not bad at all.  I would recommend this little camera to anyone looking for a great waterproof camera.  I am all set to sail!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Robert I Zaleski
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my teenage sister for her birthday and she is thrilled with it. I didn't want to go too expensive, as this was a replacement for the last camera she broke, but still wanted something that would take decent pictures and handle some abuse. This camera is exactly what I was looking for. She loves the color, the Facebook sharability, and the waterproof feature so that she can take it to the pool. Great purchase overall, and shipped quickly.

Reviews.Title: So far does what the company states!
Reviews.Author: Mike Thorn
