It was a bit cloudy when we were out which has nothing to do with the camera, but if you want the best pics go on a sunny day!

Reviews.Title: If I could give NO STARS I would
Reviews.Author: Babbyln
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because it had the best ratings for waterproof cameras. Even the expensive cameras weren't rated much better than this one. The very first time I took this camera in the pool, the latch came undone and ruined the camera. I was simply stand in the water and the camera was attached to my wrist via a floating strap. HIGHLY DISAPOINTED!!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY

Reviews.Title: Grainy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Not a great underwater camera. I really had to work with photo-editting software to brighten up all the pics. It was very grainy and dark. The flash only worked at very close distances. I would spend more next time and get a better one.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Gretta Rawlison
Reviews.Content: This camare works great! We used it to take pictures at a pool party and will use it when we go scrubber diving in June.

Reviews.Title: Great for a trip
Reviews.Author: Camille Richards
Reviews.Content: Brought this on a cruise with me and it was great. Takes beautiful under water photos. Well worth the buy

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof!
Reviews.Author: LuvMaui2013
Reviews.Content: So disappointing! Had to buy this "waterproof" camera for family's maui trip may2013, after taking several underwater pictures while snorkeling, this camera just died!  Water seepage all over LCD and battery compartment.  Please save your money and upgrade to a more quality waterproof/underwater camera.

Reviews.Title: In One Word Useless
Reviews.Author: Ramabhadran Kapistalam "ram"
Reviews.Content: Save you money and buy a better product. What you pay is what you get.. I took this camera for my Hawaii trip . Had a snorkel trip and thought i captured lot of photos and vidoes with the Turles and fishes at Wakiki but unfortuntely it dint happen. The camera had lot of water inside and i could hardly see the screen and the lens fogged completely making all the images and videos blank blue in color. When i removed the memory stick and put the battery back . The camera became really hot which means lot of salt water got into the camera. Thanks to Amazon i was able to return at no charge and get full refund.

Reviews.Title: Not so waterproof...
Reviews.Author: Kevin Morrisey
Reviews.Content: First time in the water the case flooded, shorted out the camera, and ruined the LCD.  It is now not much more than a blue paper weight.

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: James Cormack "Beefhearted"
Reviews.Content: If you want a waterproof camera because you want to take pictures on or near water and not have to worry about getting it wet, this camera takes decent every day pictures, if you want a camera for taking pictures underwater it does take good pictures in good light without flash or in any light with flash. I have been a photographer for a long time, so I am kind of spoiled, I own a Canon 60D and 4 or 5 lenses, so I am used to things working for me. I took some snorkeling pics this week at Trunk Bay St John, USVI, I will post them for review. The irritating thing is that for some reason every few seconds now the camera just shuts itself off, or goes to sleep, and its not the battery, also underwater its very hard to see anything on the LCD screen so you can't tell if the camera is off or on, you just have to point and hope. One time I took about 20 pics underwater and did not even realize the camera was off. I have had it for about 18 months now so manybe its some kind of degredation of the camera??? SO the difficulty of seeing the screen underwater and out of water in bright light is a big disadvantage for me, I am used to an eyepiece and this drives me nuts. So for these things I am taking off two stars. Otherwise the picture quality is good, it takes nice everyday landscape and portrait pics, and good underwater pics, so three stars for that. Never had a problem with water or sand getting in it, still perfect in that respect. I'll post three pics from St John.

Reviews.Title: software not available
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for several reasons1 waterproof2 Easy share3 Kodak's reputationThe waterproof part works out great while Kodak has let me down by discontinuing the easy share software so those of us who purchase these products can't use Easy Share..kinda lame..other than that I'm satisfied with the camera..just not Kodak

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use on the cruise we went on for our honeymoon and I must say this camera held up great.  I used this both in and out of the water and got great pictures.  I used it in St. Thomas and had no problems and then used it again in Grand Turk to take pictures and videos and again it worked great.  I used it until the batteries ran out and I had no problems with this camera.  I've seen some negative reviews on this camera but I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Not a Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Johanna Schlanger
Reviews.Content: The camera was good for about a day on the second day it got foggy and it look like moister got inside

Reviews.Title: Meets my expectations
Reviews.Author: Eric Bercovich
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 8 yrs old babe, for her trip to disney. It was a present, and also her first "real" cam. She was amazed, and she took thousands of pics. The pic quality was not the best, but that was something expected.The overall was great, the cam gave her the chance to take very good pics,

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: Dennis Arenas
Reviews.Content: GOOD AFTERNOON, ALL EXCELLENT SERVICE, WELL PACKED, JUST IN TIME, PRODUCT QUALITY 100%. RECOMMENDEDTHANKS FOR THE SERVICE, VERY EFFICIENT.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for us!
Reviews.Author: bdub
Reviews.Content: We got this camera for our trip to the Bahamas. I had it around my wrist when we were on a wave runner tour, so it did get wet and did hit on the wave runner multiple times when stopping. We also did take it to the beach and took pictures under water. Although the water was a bit cloudy, the pictures turned out better than expected. This is one of the cheaper waterproof camera options and I am glad to say that we didn't spend a bunch of money on another camera.

Reviews.Title: Giving another chance.
Reviews.Author: T. Cook
Reviews.Content: This poor rating is somewhat my fault that is why I am giving it another chance.  I should have played around with it before going on vacation.  The instructions SUCK!  I spend almost the whole entire snorkeling time trying to figure out how to put it on underwater picture taking.  It is definitely NOT user friendly or perhaps I am just an idiot when it comes to cameras, which is a good possibility.  Even on the worst quality settings to take the most pictures it only takes about 18 pics unless you buy a memory card.  We took 18-I counted and it said internal memory full.  I know it wouldn't take that many, but 18!  Please, there was no way to download them on to a flashdrive at that time.  Then when you are in the water you can't see what you are taking pictures of, at least not in the ocean.  With a scuba mask on and the screen being so small you have to guess at what you are taking a picture of so we had to keep stopping and looking at the pics to see if we needed to delete them right away to fit more pics on the camera.  What a waste of snorling/vacation time.  Now the only reason I am giving it two stars and will update at a later date is because the pictures that  were taken look fantastic on the camera once you are standing on dry land in good light.  I have yet to download them to the computer to see the quality and we are in the process of getting the memory card.  The batteries last an ok amount of time considering all the time I spent trying to figure out what settings I needed to be on and which pics to delete constantly.  I liked the fact that it isn't a lithion battery that only lasts 30 minutes like the last pos we bought and returned.  We were able to keep a few extra batteries dry on land that we could switch out if we needed to.  So, I am going to see if I can play with it before our next use and try to figure out the ease and meaning of the buttons, get a memory card, download the pics to the computer, keep an eye on the life of the batteries during real use, and give a more realistic rating.  But for now, not a happy norkeler.

Reviews.Title: Buena camara
Reviews.Author: Paola del Valle
Reviews.Content: bonita camara y muy practica aparte resistente al agua la recomiendo utiliza pilas doble a . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Arrived fast!
Reviews.Author: krazylo
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera as a birthday present and it arrived timely and was exactly as described!  I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Bailey Bulldog
Reviews.Content: Item took on water while in the Nautural pool in Aruba. Used piece of junk!!!!! I would not recommend any items.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Max L. Hatfield "Max L. Hatfield"
Reviews.Content: This camer worked well but had aproblem in temperature changes fogging up the interior of the lense. I would not recommend wasting money on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Orange
Reviews.Author: jrs
Reviews.Content: Just what it said it was. No big deal, good price. It's a camera so it takes pictures blah,blah, ok

Reviews.Title: Great camera EXCELLENT price
Reviews.Author: k durb
Reviews.Content: I bought this in a last minute scramble to take on a cruise with us.  I am a photo nut and own multiple digital SLR cameras with an array of high end lenses.  I wasn't expecting much from this camera. I was VERY surprised at how awesome it is!!  Great pictures, above and under the water.  Very durable which is important on any vacation with 2 little boys.  And it didn't suck battery life like I was worried it might.  On our 7 day-long cruise, I changed the batteries once.  And I used it constantly.  It was a bit hard to see the screen when shooting underwater, but that was because I wasn't underwater, lol.  If you're on the fence, I say go for it.  I am VERY pleased with it and my parents were jealous.  Their $400 waterproof camera's display screen went out while we were on the cruise so they ended up using ours.  :)

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Ted K
Reviews.Content: nice camera takes fine shots and was no problem getting up a using it - have not tryed the waterproof aspect yet but looks good

Reviews.Title: great camera ! definitely recommended!
Reviews.Author: K. Chapin
Reviews.Content: I have used a Lumix DMC-FZ30 for the last 6 years- it's a great camera but I also wanted a small digital camera I can put in a pocket or purse  instead of having to use my iphone for photos when my Lumix isn't convenient to have with me. iphone 4 photos are good enough for some types of pics but 12 mp is outstanding!  I also have wanted something I could take while tubing or out in the water with my kids.  I have not used this underwater yet but the few shots I took randomly in my house and outside were very impressive. I'm probably going to buy a couple more of these cameras for gifts at this price!!

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: douglas
Reviews.Content: muy bien exelente la compra llego a tiempo los recomiendo deberia de comprar en esta tienda muy responsable la camara exelente buena resolucion

Reviews.Title: EasyCam - Gift for Mom
Reviews.Author: V. James
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera as a gift to my mom ... and she's challenged when it comes to electronics (lol). It's so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: portlander
Reviews.Content: Most waterproof cameras are $100 + when I saw this & the reviews I thought great!The Pro's:It is waterproof (I tested it to no more than 5 ft.)It takes some picturesThe Con'sColor quality is badProcess and exposure time is slowThe glare & distortion that appears is pretty unbelievable. The smallest flicker of soft light will obscure the entire picture.I was really disappointed with this camera, it was used for the trip of a life time and we got VERY few shots that were usable, none of which were underwater. None of the underwater pictures even came out.So the additional $40 + that other cameras cost probably gets you a camera that works underwater & out of the water.Skip this one its a big disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Memory card IS NOT included with this camera.
Reviews.Author: Ann W Grove Dillon
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera for my daughter for Christmas - still haven't been able to use it.  Even though the description says "What's In the Box: Everything you need to shoot and share" the manufacturer and seller neglected to mention that I needed to buy an memory card for the camera to work.  I would have been happy to order the card at the time, had I known.  We are looking forward to use the camera when the card arrives.

Reviews.Title: Failed in Water
Reviews.Author: Chi Mok Ti
Reviews.Content: Purchased for upcoming Trip to Disney's Discovery Cove.  Used it beforehand for a kayak trip and to get familiar and it worked just fine.  However, only barely into a second set of batteries the camera LCD screen failed in the first real underwater use.  Couldn't see what you were shooting, couldn't operate the menus (camera still worked, just without the LCD).  The Camera lens also fogged from the inside making photos blurred & fogged -a sure sign that water had gotten in.  I'm going back to a SeaLife camera to replace the Sealife I lost earlier.  This Kodak camera might be fine for rain, but it can't be trusted with your vacation memories in underwater use.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: vasudeva
Reviews.Content: It was almost impossible to open and close the battery/memory card section.  I have returned it hoping for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Feeling Blue about this little beauty
Reviews.Author: Paul J Brodine
Reviews.Content: To be true this little camera works better than I had expected atg that priceThe picture quality is excellent.  I am pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: haven't tried in water yet, seems to take good pics
Reviews.Author: batman
Reviews.Content: seems to work as advertised, easy enough to use and set up was easy, great value hopefully it will last a long time

Reviews.Title: Very basic digital camera takes okay pictures
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived quickly and it was new in box.It was very easy to setup and it takes okay pictures just not great pictures.I have used it underwater a few times and took good underwater pictures.The zoom might as well not be there cause it hardly zooms at all.I like the small size and the quick turn on feature.If I had it do again I would have not have purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: Out Standing Serive
Reviews.Author: S. Sankar
Reviews.Content: I was pretty Impreesed of this Product since It Nice, Cheaper and Worthy Than Any other Camera for this price, Yeah It Cost More 17$. Nice Purchasing form Your Site ..Thanks a LOT AMAZON .

Reviews.Title: Good for Extended Backpacking Trips
Reviews.Author: Gator
Reviews.Content: First the cons of this camera: 1) no optical zoom, 2) no image stabilization, 3) no optical viewfinder.I bought one for my daughter who was going to Philmont Scout Ranch for a two week backpacking trip. Since there is no place to recharge batteries I wanted to get something with good battery life and that used AA batteries. Almost no compact digital cameras still use AA batteries because the technical advantages of li-ion batteries are pretty overwhelming, but unless you want to buy multiple li-ion packs to last the entire trip there is at least one advantage to AA batteries.I also wanted a waterproof camera for kayaking trips, so this will do.It's basically a low end, inexpensive, weatherproof camera.

Reviews.Title: cool cam
Reviews.Author: csez
Reviews.Content: very cool camera for the price and the pics under water come out better than you would think. have to laugh at my bro cause he just bought a camera for 1500.00 and he cant take awsome water pics like i can

Reviews.Title: Stopped working on 1st day
Reviews.Author: Peter J. Moskalow
Reviews.Content: A bad product.  Water did leak into this "waterproof" camera, and it stopped working on the first day of usage.  Was only about 4 feet underwater.  Thankfully, Amazon gave a credit for this product.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Disappointing! Don't count on it working!
Reviews.Author: heathermslay
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera for our trip to Mexico. I was very excited becuase the highlight of our trip was snorkeling, and I would be able to take pictures in and under the water.  The camera was working fine....until we took it out snorkeling.  After the first couple of pictures it filled with water and died.  And, yes, the battery cover was completely closed.  I was devastated because we missed the opportunity to take pictures of sea turtles, baracuda, and all sorts of other amazing things all around us. Since we didn't take a backup camera, we now have no pictures from our trip.  So very sad. I contacted Kodak and they refused to do anything except try to repair it and determine the cause of its malfunction. I am returning it to Amazon and will try the replacement camera, because if it works like it's supposed to it will be great for taking out with the family.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera thinking the manufacturer has such great reputation.  Went snorkeling.  Used camera in 20 inches of water, took 4 pictures and camera shut down.  Really sucks I could not record the snorkeling in the Caribbean.

Reviews.Title: Barata y muy buena calidad
Reviews.Author: FranciscoM
Reviews.Content: Compre esta camara pensando en llevarla al campo sin preocupaciones y por su precio, por el precio es la mejor camara que se puede llevar a todo momento

Reviews.Title: Not Viable
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these Kodak Water Resistant cameras - one for me and one for my brother to take on a rafting trip through the Grand Canyon.  On the first day, my camera gave me problems. It kept asking me to reformat my disk and would shut down automatically.  Therefore, I didn't have a workable camera for this trip of a lifetime. Very disappointed - and I will be returning it shortly.

Reviews.Title: Tragic excuse for a camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Nature Grrl/Photographer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this at Wally's before it was available at Amazin Amazon. Took it on a two week vacatoion. First time I used it in a pool, it died. When I went to return it it was over fifteen days. No nothing. Then after trying a few things, we got it to work again. I took it for a short road trip, tried it in the pool in Hampton Beach, and the screen went white. It is still dead, so far as I know. I've had two great Kodaks, but this is pelican poop.

Reviews.Title: NOT WATERPROOF
Reviews.Author: Reese "."
Reviews.Content: This camera flooded on my first time in the water on my trip to Belize, and ruined my whole trip, i spent 5 days on the coral reef with no camera.

Reviews.Title: Underwater Camera? I think not!
Reviews.Author: teresa parkerson rogers
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to bring to Mexico. The second I got in the water the camera filled up with water. Never to work again. This Camera sucks. Underwater camer? I think not.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it for the water - it might be OK to use in high and dry situations.
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, this camera is not as advertised - it leaks like a sieve, so we returned it for a refund a few days after we received it.

Reviews.Title: I am not at all happy with this purchase.
Reviews.Author: Joanne Fray
Reviews.Content: I bought two.I didn't realize that they didn't come with a memory card - silly m.Second, one of them didn't work. The camera shop couldn't make it work either.  I have to figure out how to return it.What a nuisance.

Reviews.Title: BROKE IMMEDIATELY
Reviews.Author: Rachel Lodin
Reviews.Content: I don't know if I was sent a defective item or if this camera is just a piece of crap but it was broken upon arrival. I would not suggest ordering despite the low price.I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: very upset :(
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Sooo excited to go on vacation with my new first Waterproof Camera and then I used it One time and it leaked And it ruined the SD card I had in it so I lost ALL the Pictures I took on my first trip to Aruba:(  Pictures that cannot be replaced and It was a trip I will never get to go on again.  ******I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA*******

Reviews.Title: this camera didn't come with a charger, computer cord or any instructions
Reviews.Author: Eve M. Fowler
Reviews.Content: This camera, which appears to be possibly stolen, did not come with a battery charger, computer cord or any instructions.

Reviews.Title: Easily UNreliable
Reviews.Author: CoffeeandChocolate
Reviews.Content: Ok, here's the deal, DO NOT buy this camera!! If you despise being disappointed multiple times, don't do this to yourself. Splurge and get the Olympus camera. This is a piece of cr*p! I purchased this camera to go white water rafting, barely saw any water-it broke! It's called "sport" is it not and it broke on the first rapid?! I get back very disappointed because I wanted to document my whole excursion but could not. "Luckily" it was in the 30 day period to return the camera. So I had to pay an additional 11 dollars to ship it back to them, then I had to wait 2 weeks to get it back "refurbished". I go into the pool yesterday in a CENTIMETER of water, just below the surface it took one photo and broke again! (mind you BOTH instances my camera was completely closed, I always am OCD about that, and it filled with water the first and second time) Two chances too many on this camera. Save yourself the annoyance and just splurge if you want a reliable camera. Plus the "range" of shooting of the camera is very narrow and you won't get a "full" scene. I am so angry at myself that it's a 100.00 down the drain. I hope this review helps you. Plus their customer service is below par. Now I'm out of the second 30 day range so I probably will not get my money back because I definitely do not want to get another one of these again-ever.P.S Amazon made me give it a star, it would be a 0 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: MY CAMERA CAME WITH DEFECTS WATER
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Soto
Reviews.Content: Hello good evening mr Warehouse Deals, Inc.. problems came with my camera and take a picture that is starting to sound the camera and the screen goes black and I have to withdraw the batteries to get it working again, and also when connected to the PC USB cable not recognized camera and will not let me download the pictures for automatically turns on and turns off the display of the screen .. then please do need answers on how to solve problems with my computer or know how to make the team repogan me! thanks!

Reviews.Title: No audio playback from LCD
Reviews.Author: misph1re
Reviews.Content: We got this camera for our son because he was always borrowing our camera to record video and then play it back. There is no audio playback capability with this camera from the LCD. You must download the video to a PC in order to hear audio. W T Freak? really?

Reviews.Title: Crashed computer
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kodak camera for a trip to Galagapos.  While there, took about 70 photos.  Went to CostCo to process them and found that half of the photo files were corrupt and couldn't be printed.  Every time I tried to download the photos on my DELL laptop, it would crash my computer.  I thought perhaps it was a problem with the memory card so I tried another card and had the same problem. I returned the camera and got a replacement thinking that the camera was the problem.  However, I had the same problem with the replacement.  I even called in a computer tech to see if my computer was causing the problem.  When he tried to download to his computer, it crashed his as well.  If you buy one, hope you have better luck than I did.

Reviews.Title: what a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Doyle R. Dean "utilityus projectus"
Reviews.Content: the kodak easyshare system is decidedly lame.  why not let me import pictures directly from the flash drive?  i have no access to the files right now because easyshare is not working

Reviews.Title: Camera failed on the first day of use.
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Doyle
Reviews.Content: I had given my grandson a Kodak Easyshare Sport C123 Blue camera for his birthday.  After one use the camera no longer works.  We replaced the battery and it still doesn't work.  I was very disappointed in this product.  I would like to know if there is a warranty for the product?  I had purchased it with my Amazon rewards.  May I add that I have purchased many items on Amazon.com but this is the first time I have encountered a defective product!Your attention to this matter will be appreciated.Judith A. Doyle303 Lederer AvenuePittsburgh, Pa.  15209

Reviews.Title: Not worth the hassle
Reviews.Author: Marc Rosen
Reviews.Content: I can't blame anyone other than myself. I should have followed my own rules and not purchased a product for which more than 5% of the ratings are negative.  I thought my luck would be different.  I was wrong. Everything about the performance in the negative reviews came true for me.I received the camera 3 days before we left for vacation. I turned it on and tested it in dry circumstances. Everything worked fine. I did not have time to test it underwater before we left for vacation.  The day we arrived at our destination, I took it into a pool where the camera did not go more than 2 feet down.  It immediately started to break down after taking one photo in the following order:Screen would be too brightCamera would not allow me to view pictures takenCamera became slow to turn onCamera stopped turning onI followed recommendations of reviewers who stated the camera would work after it dried out.  That did not work. In fact, the LCD screen would show water in it and stopped working.  Also, water had seeped into the lense area and fogged it up.  After letting it dry out for another day, the canmera just ceased to work.  I checked the batteries thinking they shorted out, but they worked on a remote control and fresh batteries did not help.I have not spoken to Kodak to resolve this issue yet as I am still on vacation and do not want to waste my precious time with them.  I will update this posting once I have given them a chance to resolve this issue.Please take my advice! DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA. I don't care how good of a price it is. If you have a 50/50 chance of it working, it is not worth the gamble. I've already lost percious moments of my family having fun because of the crappy quality. I am probably going to ogo back to using underwater film cameras for $10/camera. I just hope by son can figure out how to use an old fashioned camera vs. the digital cameras he is accustomed to.

Reviews.Title: WASTE of time and money!!!!!! Dont Purchase
Reviews.Author: DBY
Reviews.Content: I should have heeded the warning of other reviews!!We went on a family vacation on a cruise ship. The first day we went into the fresh water pool on the ship and of course I wanted to document our antics. The camera took one picture and just stopped working. The power stayed on but the camera's software just seized up. What a waste of time and money. It is especially surprising because the manufacturer is well known. I eventually purchased one of those water proof throw-away ones on the ship. At leasst I know that would work.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely dreadful little camera
Reviews.Author: R. Stec "GLTPWR"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not worth the incredibly low $69.00 price of entry.  Does it work underwater?  I don't know; I got my return label printed before such tests could be conducted.  The real issue with this camera is the photo quality.  I do not know if my unit was defective (and it could have been as it is a new camera and the new batch could have problems),but the photo quality is absolutely dreadful.  I am not even going to bother to compare this camera to real point and shoots from other reputable brands; the photo quality is noticeably inferior to a 3.2 megapixel Nokia 5530 XpressMusic.The Kodak does not have a real autofocus, so anything that is within 1 inch to 3 feet is out of focus.  The shutter release button further emphasizes that there is no autofocus because there is no detent that indicates that the camera would be focusing.  In other words, the camera button pushes down one level like any other button you use for things such as a tv remote or a car stereo.  Even the aforementioned Nokia has a detent that helps the camera find an autofocus point before you fully depress the shutter to take the picture.  Also, the camera seems to be blurry/out of focus in the center of the shot even when you change the focus setting between face recognition, center, or multiple points.Flash pictures are also poor because the flash will make the subject in the center (which is already out of focus) very bright while any other part of the shot is incredibly dark.  It is very poor when compared to flash shots taken with other cameras, including the Nokia.Like other Kodak cameras, this one also has serious compression issues.  The pictures may be 12 megapixels, but the file size is typically around 2-2.5 MB.  My 12 megapixel Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS6 takes pictures that typically range from 4.5-5.5 MB in size.  While compression may sound like a nice memory space-saving feature, it noticeably lowers the quality of any details that are actually in focus in the shot.The camera also has serious noise reduction, which tries to lessen the grain you get in photos taken at a high ISO.  However, the noise reduction on this camera is so severe that it noticeably softens the portions of the shot that are in focus (if you can get portions of the shot in focus) so that you lose even more detail (and this is on top of the severe compression).In sum, this camera is an extremely disappointing product that is not worth more than $40.  My camera phone takes FAR better pictures, and I don't even want to begin to compare the Kodak's shortcomings to the superb photo quality of my Panasonic DMC-ZS6 or my Nikon D3000 DSLR.  If you want an acceptable entry level camera, buy a Canon Powershot A490 and stay out of the water.  Otherwise, spend the extra money and buy a Panasonic Lumix TS10 or an Olympus Tough Series camera.  You may be out of pocket more in the beginning, but you will be much happier.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: sminor
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter's 8th birthday. When I connected it to my computer via the internal software drivers would not upload. No problem I thought...I went to Kodak's website to download the drivers from there. Big problem! Kodak no longer provides the drivers for this camera on-line. So I tried to call customer service. Turns out they charge by the minute for phone calls, so I had to do an on-line chat with a customer service rep. If she had been ANY help this would have been okay, but all she kept saying was, "I'm sorry but we no longer offer those drivers on-line." No solution was ever offered to my problem and I have returned the camera. So disappointing.

Reviews.Title: very limited on the number of pictures. batteries don't last either
Reviews.Author: robin range-fontenot
Reviews.Content: was disappointed to find out it only takes 7 pictures. no way of upgrading it either. batteries don't last long as well

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare c123
Reviews.Author: Debora
Reviews.Content: Mi experiencia no fue para nada buena, en la primera sumergida la cámara se filtro, y a pesar de que seguí las recomendaciones de sacar memoria y baterías y dejar secar por más de 24 hrs... no funciono nuevamente..

Reviews.Title: i didn't work
Reviews.Author: KATINAJO
Reviews.Content: the camera did not even work when i recieved it, it had scratches and nicks all in it, and the orange strap that was supposed to come with it for free was not in the box, i'm assuming someone took it out because the box had been opened and taped back up with packing tape all the way around it and the box was all messed up. DO NOT BUY FROM THESE PEOPLE!!!! you will be wasting your money. and to make it all worse this was supposed to be a christmas gift for my daughter!

Reviews.Title: Fals Advertising
Reviews.Author: W. H. Brown
Reviews.Content: The camera is advertised to have optical zoom. It does not. It has digital zoom only.Otherwise the product is fine. Customer service is sketchy.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easyshare Sport Waterproof Camera
Reviews.Author: I RECEIVED THE PRODUCTS WITHOUT PROBLEM
Reviews.Content: this product is useful to me and I received it in good condition and recommend the optimal level of responsibility and seriousness of the store

Reviews.Title: Quality of pictures not good at all :-(
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this camera.  We tried it for a week.  It didn't leak underwater.  It did ok on underwater pictures and videos but the quality was not good.  The regular pictures were really poor quality and small.  I have a DSLR and did not expect it to be the same quality but the pictures were not crisp at all, the lighting was always off.  We tried various settings but to no avail.  I thought that as a 14 mp it would be good but the picture quality was really poor as we tried to enlarge it too.  The processing is very slow also.  Sadly I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Corresponsal
Reviews.Content: Dont buy this is a very bad quality camera. im sure this camera or an equal quality can be found for $20. i returned im purchase a panasonic 3 times better quality for same price.

Reviews.Title: No battery charger
Reviews.Author: Ana Moraes
Reviews.Content: The product arrived without a manual and battery charger.The review didn't say anything about  those missing items before purchase

Reviews.Title: Over-valued camera
Reviews.Author: Kinki
Reviews.Content: Quite good !!The photo quality is well~over valued!But the image shown on the little mon is very bad....

Reviews.Title: Good Performance, But Poor Cosmetics
Reviews.Author: Edward Walters "ed"
Reviews.Content: I've had this product just over a month and the blue paint is chipping in various spots only two weeks after expiration of the one-month Amazon returns policy.  So I am now stuck with a piece of $70 hardware that is mixed shades of blue and metallic gray.  I've not even really had time to use this product in the open environment, such as in water or outdoors, as it was advertised to be constructed for, prior to it becoming defective.I find it to be pretty poor that it costs $70 for an item that can't hold its basic paint job for a couple of months and that I can't even return the defective item to Amazon after only owning it for just over a month.  From now on, I will only be purchasing electronic items in physical stores where I can return or exchange grossly defective items.However, I gave the camera two stars because the peformance of the software is good.Be aware, your new camera may come blue in the mail but may soon change color.  Hope you like metallic gray!

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: charles hamilton
Reviews.Content: quit working the first time it hit water. its junk dont buy it. junk junk junk junk junk junk junk

Reviews.Title: No Sales Taxes online.
Reviews.Author: No Sales Taxes online
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera for the price , however , not many features and not many photos to take , even with a 8 gb SD card.Not purchasing from Amazon.com ever again if,  Arizona will start to charge sales taxes !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: not red its orange
Reviews.Author: CAPONESBRO
Reviews.Content: the camera works fine i did not test it underwater sent it back because it says red but its not its an ugly ugly orange was going to give it to my daughter for xmas but yuck to ugly

Reviews.Title: kodak underwater camera
Reviews.Author: thomas j ageeb
Reviews.Content: AFTER 2 FOTOS TAKEN UNDERWATER WATER GOT IN. THE ONLINE HELP SAID LET DRY FOR 24 HOURS. DID THAT NO HELP. NOW STUCK WITH A BIG BLUE PAPER WEIGHT.THE TWO PICTURES I DID TAKE CAME OUT NICE.

Reviews.Title: Ick
Reviews.Author: Rawrlll
Reviews.Content: Spend more money to get a camera that works well. The reason I purchased this cameravwas to use it under water, not really waterproof...

Reviews.Title: pure crap
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: the first time i used it it took on water sending it back today ...wrecked my vacation. don't buy this item

Equipped with Kodak's Smart Capture feature

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Sport C135 14MP Waterproof Digital camera with digital zoom (Red)
